src: د ټرایسیریپټاپس ډوله غاښونه نه یواځی کولای شي چې پاڼی وژوي بلکه د سختو ځانګو او جرړو د ژولو توان هم لري بعضی ساینسپوهان فکر کوي چې د triceratops ټرایسیریپټاپس سایکېډزcycads خوری، کوم چې د نباتاتو یوه نوعه ده او په کریتاسیوس cretaceous کې عامه وه دا نباتات د پام د کوچنی ونی په شان دي چې په سر کې د اغزنو او تیرو پاڼو یو تاج لري یو ټریسرټوپس کولی شي د لرګي خوړلو دمخه پاڼري پري کړي او خپل قوي چونچ وکاروي. نور ساینسپوهان په دي استدلال کوي چې دا نباتات ډیر زهر جن دي ، نو داسې نه ده چې دا دي داینوسور خوړلی وي حال دا چې سلات او د طوطی په شان نور حیوانات (د ډاینو سار پاتی شونی ) کولای شي چې زهرجنی میوې او پاڼی وخوری
mt: Triceratops had not only the ability to eat leaves, but also to eat toughs and cracks. Some scientists think that triceratops ate cycads, a type of plant that was common in the cretaceous. These plants are like the small head of a pin, with a crown of spikes on top. A triceratops could eat leaves before the wood and use its strong beak. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous, so it is unlikely that dinosaurs ate them. However, other animals such as the sloth and parrot (the surviving dinosaurs) can eat poisonous fruits and leaves.
ref: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous. These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves. A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.

src: د ایټالیې ملي فټ بال د جرمني ملي فټ بال ټیم سره په نړۍ کې دیوم بریالۍ ټیم ګڼل کیږي او د فیفا نړیوال کپ د 2006 کال قهرماني یې هم ګټلې وه. مشهورو لوبو کې فوټبال، باسکیټبال، والیبال، واټر پولو، فینسي، رګبي، سایکلینګ، آیس هاکي، رولر هاکي او د F1 موټرو ریسینګ شامل دي. په شمالي سیمو کې ژمني ورزشونه په نړیوالو لوبو او د المپیک په مراسمو کې د ایټالویي لوبو سره ډيرې مشهورې دي.
mt: Italy is considered one of the world's most successful football teams and won the FIFA World Cup in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and Formula One motor racing. Winter sports are more popular in the north and are featured in international competitions and the Olympic Games.
ref: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing. Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.

src: لوکزامبګluxembourg اوږد تاریخ لري مګر د آزادي نیټه یې د 1839 نه راپديخوا ده د بلجیم belgium اوسنی برخی پخوا د لوکزامبرګ luxembourg پورې تړلی وي چې په 1830 کې د بلجېم انقلاب نه وروسته د بلجیم پورې وتړل شوي لوګزمبرګ هر کله هڅه کړی یو بی طرفه ملک پاتی شی مګر دا په دواړو نړیوالو جګړو کی د جرمنی له خوا قبضه شو. په کال 1957 کې لوګزامبورګ د سازمان بنسټ ایښودونکي غړی شو، کوم چې نن ورځ د اروپایي اتحاديې په نوم پیژندل کیږي.
mt: Luxembourg has a long history, but its independence was established in 1839.  Belgium's current borders include Luxembourg, which was attached to Belgium after the Belgian Revolution of 1830.  Luxembourg has always tried to be a neutral country, but it was occupied by Germany in both world wars.  In 1957, Luxembourg became a founding member of the Organization, which is now known as the European Union.
ref: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.

src: اروپایي ترکیه (مغربي تریس یا رومیلیا به بالکان خلیج کې موقیعت لری) چې د هیواد %3 تشکیلوی. د ترکېی turkeyحدودات د 1600 کېلو مترو 1000 میله اوږدوالی او 800 کېلومتره 500 میله پراخوالی لري چې تقریبا مستطیل شکل یې غوره کړي دي د ترکیې ساحه، د جهيلونو په ګډون، 783,562 مربع کیلومتره (300,948 sq mi) موقعیت لري، چې له هغې څخه 755,688 مربع کیلومتره (291,773 sq mi) په سویل لویدیځې آسیا او په اروپا کې، 23,764 مربع کیلومتره (9,174 sq m) کې موقعیت لري. ترکېهturkey د ساحی په لحاظ د نړی 37 اوو ديرشم لوي هیواد دي ، تقریبا د فرانسی د میټرو پولیټن او برطانیې دواړو مساحت په اندازه ترکېه د درې خواوو نه سمندر نیولی : د ایچېن سمندر aegean sea د غرب له خوا تور سمندر black sea دشمال او د مديترانی سمندرmediterranean sea د مشرق د خوانه
mt: European Turkey (Western Thrace or Rumelia to the Black Sea) constitutes 3% of the country. Turkey's borders are 1600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 kilometres (500 mi) wide, approximately forming a rectangle. Turkey's area, including lakes, is 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in Southwestern Asia and in Europe, and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) are in the Sea of Marmara, the Black Sea, and the Mediterranean Sea. Turkey is the 37th largest country in the world, approximately the size of France and the United Kingdom combined. It is bordered by the Black Sea to the north, the Mediterranean Sea to the south, and the Aegean Sea to the west. The Bosphorus, the Sea of Marmara, and the Dardanelles (or the Turkish Straits) separate Turkey from European mainland.
ref: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

src: د واټیکان ښار ابادي 800 ده. دا په نړۍ کې تر ټولو ورکوټی ازاد هېواد دی او تر ټولو لږه ابادي لرونکی هېواد دی. واټیکان ښار په خپله قانون جوړونه او رسمي ارتباطاتو کې اطالوي کاروي. په دغه ریاست کارکوونکو څخه د اکثرو هره وځنۍ ژبه هم اطالوي خو په مذهبي رسوماتو کې لاطیني کارول کیږي. د واتیکان ښار ټول اوسیدونکي رومانیایی کاتولیک دي.
mt: Vatican City is the smallest country in the world. It is the only country in the world that is completely surrounded by another country. Vatican City has its own laws and official communications in Italian. Most of the people who work in Vatican City speak Italian, but in religious ceremonies Latin is used. All the people who live in Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
ref: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies. All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.

src: نن ورځ کمپوترونه د عکسونو او ویدیوګانو د تنظیمولو لپاره استعمالیږي. عصری او پر مختللی انیمیشن کولای شو په کمپیوټر باندي جوړ کړو، او د انیمیشنو دا ډول په ډیرښت سره په فلمونو او تلويزیون کې کارول کېږی موسیقی د ریکارډنګ لپاره زیاتره وخت د عصری کمپیوټرونو څخه کار اخستل کېږی چې د اوازونو دپروسس او د ګډولو لپاره هم تری کار اخستل کېږی
mt: Today computers are used for image and video editing. Modern and sophisticated animations can be created on computers, and this type of animation is used extensively in films and television. Music is recorded on computers for a large amount of time, and computers are also used for audio processing and mixing.
ref: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.

src: د هارپارا او موهینجودوړو ښارونو په هر کور کې د فلش سیسټم تشناب لري او ورسره د فاضله اوبو یو پيچیده سیسټم لري. د فاضله اوبو سیسټمونه د یونان د مینون د کرېټ او سنټوریني (Crete and Santorini) ښارونو په کورونو کې موندل کېږي. په لرغوني مصر، فارس او چین کې هم تشنابونه و. په روماني تمدن کې، تشنابونه بعضې وخت د عامه حمام خونو برخې وې چیرته چې به سړیو او ښځو ګډ ول.
mt: In the cities of Harpārā and Mōhīnjodarō, every home has a flush toilet and a complex system for sewage. Sewage systems are found in the homes of the cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. In ancient Egypt, Persia, and China, toilets were also used. In the Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes parts of public bathhouses where men and women bathed together.
ref: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

ref: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

src: "د دوی پخوانۍ انرژي کچې ته د بیرته راستنیدو لپاره، دوی باید د اضافي انرژي څخه چې دوی له رڼا څخه ترلاسه کړي لرې شي. هغوی د کوچنۍ زرې په مټ چې ""Photon"" یې بولي رڼا بیرون ته خارجوي. ساینسپوهان دا پروسه د سټیمیولیټډ امیژن اف ریډیشن په نامه یادوي ، دا ځکه چې اتومونه د روښانه رڼا له خوا تحریک کېږی د فوټون photonد رڼا د وتلو سبب کېږی چې رڼا د ریډیشن یو نوعه ده راتلونکی عکس هغه اټومونه چې د فوټانو اخراج کوي ښايي. البته، په واقعیت کې فوټانونه د عکس په پرتله خورا کوچني دي. فوټون نور هم د هغې مادي څخه کوچنی دي چې اتومونه جوړی!"
mt: "To return to their original energy state, they must be removed from the extra energy they have gained from the light. They expel photons, which are the smallest particles of light. The process is called stimulated emission of radiation, because atoms are stimulated by the light to emit photons. The following image shows the atoms that emit photons. Of course, photons are much smaller than the image. Photons are even smaller than the material that atoms are made of!"
ref: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"

src: د سلګونو ساعتونو د استعمال وروسته د څراغ دننه ریښکۍ سوځي او څراغ له کاره غورځي. د ڼړا بلب بیا بدلولو ته اړتیا لري، دا اړینه ده چې د رڼړا بلب بدلولو کې پاملرنه وکړئ۔ لومړۍ باید د رڼا د فیکسچرlight fixture لپاره سويچ بند شي او یا هم کېبل قطع شي دا ځکه چې که چېرته ته د ساکټ دننه برخه یا فلزی قاعده چې تر اوسه یو څه په ساکټ کې ده په تماس کې شي نو هغه بریښنا چې ساکټ ته راځي د څراغ فلزی برخه د تیز برقی شارټ سبب کېدای شي
mt: After several hours of use, the filament inside the bulb burns out and the bulb stops working. The bulb needs to be replaced, be sure to pay attention to the replacement of the bulb. First, the light fixture for the light fixture should be turned off or the cable should be cut because if the part inside the socket or the metal base that is still something in the socket comes into contact, the current that goes to the bulb can cause a short circuit in the metal part of the bulb
ref: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.

src: د انشقاق بم په دې اصول کاربند دی چې ګڼشمېر پروټانونه او نیوټرانونه لرونکی یوه هسته جوړولو لپاره د انرژۍ اړتیا وي. لکه د یوې غونډۍ ته د دروند ګاډۍ رغړولو په څیر دي. نیوکلیوس بیا ویشل بیا د هغې ځینې انرژي خوشې کوي. د ځنو ایټمونو هستې یعني مرکزونه ناثباته وي چې دا په دې مانه چې دوی لږ یا هیڅ فشار پرته ماتیږي.
mt: A nuclear bomb works by splitting the nuclei of many protons and neutrons to form a nucleus. Like a big truck hitting a small car. The nucleus then releases some of its energy. The nuclei of some atoms are unstable, meaning they die without much or any pressure.
ref: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

src: کله چې ته یو چاته ټیلیفون کوي چې هغه له تا څخه زرګونه میله لرې وي نو تاسې له سټلایټ استفاده کوئ. په فضا کې سپوږمکۍ زنګ ترلاسه کوي او بیا یې بیرته په سمدستي توګه منعکس کوي. فضا ته سټلایټ د راکټ په مرسته ولیږل شو. ساینسپوهان په فضل کې له ټيلی سکوپ څخه استفاده کوي ځکه چې د ځمکې اتومسفیر زمونږ نظر او لیدل کله کله کږوي. دا یو لوی راکټ ته اړتیا لري چې لوړوالی یې له 100 فوټ څخه ډیر وي تر څو یو سټلایټ یا ټيلی سکوپ په فضا کې پرې ځای پر ځای شي.
mt: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you use satellites. Satellites reflect light from the moon and back to you quickly. Scientists use satellites in space because the Earth's atmosphere sometimes distorts our view. It takes a big rocket, one that is more than 100 feet tall, to put a satellite or a telescope in space.
ref: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.

src: وخت داسې یو شي دي چې زموږ خوا او شا کې موجود دي ،او هر څه چې موږ یې کوو په هغې اغیز لري خو تر اوسه پری پوهیدل ستونزمن دي دا د اديانو ،فیلسوفانو او ساینس د پوهانو له خوا په زرهاو کلونه مطالعه شوي موږ وخت د پیښو د لړۍ په توګه تجربه کوو چې د راتلونکې څخه تير شوي وخت ته په اوسني وخت کې رسيږي. وخت همدارنګه د پیښو د جریان (اوږدوالی) مقایسه ده چې څرنګه یې موږ ترسره کوو. تاسو کولای شي چې د وخت تیریدل ديوه تکراریدونکې پیښی د تکرار ته په کتلو په نښه کړي، تکراریدونکې پیښی هغه څه دي چې په منظم ډول بیا بیا تکراریږی
mt: What is time? It is what we experience as the passage of events, and it is also the distance between events, as we experience them. You can mark the passage of time by counting the repetitions of a recurring event, a recurring event being one that happens regularly.
ref: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: وخت داسې یو شي دي چې زموږ خوا او شا کې موجود دي ،او هر څه چې موږ یې کوو په هغې اغیز لري خو تر اوسه پری پوهیدل ستونزمن دي دا د اديانو ،فیلسوفانو او ساینس د پوهانو له خوا په زرهاو کلونه مطالعه شوي موږ وخت د پیښو د لړۍ په توګه تجربه کوو چې د راتلونکې څخه تير شوي وخت ته په اوسني وخت کې رسيږي. وخت همدارنګه د پیښو د جریان (اوږدوالی) مقایسه ده چې څرنګه یې موږ ترسره کوو. تاسو کولای شي چې د وخت تیریدل ديوه تکراریدونکې پیښی د تکرار ته په کتلو په نښه کړي، تکراریدونکې پیښی هغه څه دي چې په منظم ډول بیا بیا تکراریږی
mt: What is time? It is what we experience as the passage of events, and it is also the distance between events, as we experience them. You can mark the passage of time by counting the repetitions of a recurring event, a recurring event being one that happens regularly.
ref: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: له پخوا راهیسې، د تاج و تخت وارث د ښوونځي له فراغت وروسته مستقماً امنیت ته ځي. په هرصورت، چارلس د کیمبرج په ټرینیټ کالج کې پوهنتون ته لاړ چېرته چې هغه د انسان پیژند او لرغون پیژندنه او وروسته تاریخ زده کړې، ۲:۲ لاسته راوړی. (د دویمې درجې ټیټ رتبه). چارلس د برطانیی د شاهی کورنۍ لومړی غړی وه چی د پوهنتون سند یی تر لاسه کړ
mt: Charles has been preparing for the military since leaving school. However, he went to Cambridge University's Trinity College, where he studied human, social and political sciences and later history, graduating with a 2:2 (a low second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British royal family to graduate from university.
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: انګلستان وروسته د Danelaw د بیا فتح کولو د ډیر زیات وخت راهیسې سوله تجربه کوي. په هر صورت په 991 کې ایتیلرد ethelred د یو وایکنګ viking د کښتیو لښکر سره چې د هر یو نه لوي و یواځی د ګوتروم guthrum نه چې یو پیړی مخکې و ټرایګواسن trygvassonد کښتیو د لښکر سر لښکر و ، نارويژی norvegian نژاد چې د هالنډی danish د تسلط څخه د خپل هیواد د بیرته لاس ته راوړلو شوق او خواهش لرونکې و وروسته د اولنی عسکری په شا تګ څخه ایترلرډethelred د اولفOlaf سره په شرایطو رضا شو ، څوک چې ناروي ته ددې لپاره راګرځیدلی و چې خپل بادشاهت د رنګارنګ بریا سره لاس ته راوړی
mt: 991 is the last time England has seen peace since the Danes conquered the Danelaw. However, in 991, Ethelred faced a fleet of Viking ships led by only Guthrum, who was a Norwegian, and a descendant of the Danish conquest, with a desire to regain his homeland. After the first military defeat, Ethelred agreed to terms with Olaf, who had come from Norway to secure his kingdom with a victory.
ref: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

src: د 15 سلیزی شاوخوا ،شمالی استونیا د ډیره د آلمان کلتوری اغیز لاندې وه ځینو آلماني راهبانو غوښتل چې خدای ځایي خلکو ته نژدې کړي نو له دې لپاره یې استونیایي اصلي ژبه ایجاد کړه. دا د آلمان په الفبای باندي ولاړه وه او یو توری پکې اضافه کړل شو لکه څنګه چې وخت تیریده، ډیری ټکي چې د آلمان له ترکیب څخه پور شوي دي. دا د روښانتیا پیل و.
mt: 15th century, Northern Estonia was under the influence of German culture. Some German priests wanted to bring God closer to local people, so they created the Estonian language. It was written in the German alphabet and a new letter was added, like the time passed, many words that were related to the German combination. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
ref: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."

src: د هندی ژبی ویونکو د شمیر په اړه مختلفی تخمینونه شته دی . چی په تخمینی ډول د دوهمی او څلورمی درجی تر منځ ژبه ګنل شوی چی په نړی کی ویل کیږی د مورنی ژبی ويونکو فرق په دي باندي دي چې ددوي نږدې لهچې شمیرل کېږی که نه د ويونکو اټکل شوي اندازه د 340 ملیونو نه تر 500 ملیونو پورې ده او د 800 ملیونو خلکو پورې خلک په دي ژبه پوهیږی هندي او اردو د لغاتو له مخی یو دي مګر په لیکلو کې توپیر لري :په ټولو خبرو اترو کې ويونکې د یو بل په خبرو پوهیږی
mt: The number of speakers of Hindi is estimated as between 300 and 500 million, including secondary language speakers.  Hindi and Urdu are mutually intelligible in written form, but differ in their use of the Devanagari and Perso-Arabic scripts, respectively.  Hindi is the lingua franca of the Hindi Belt of India, and is also spoken in parts of Pakistan, Nepal, Mauritius, Fiji, Suriname, Guyana, Trinidad and Tobago, South Africa, and the Caribbean.
ref: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

src: "هانګیول hangeul د موخی له مخی اختراع شوي الفابیت دي چې په عام ورڅنی استعمال کې ، د الفبا په 1444 کې د سیجانګ باچا sejong kingپه وخت کې اختراع شوي دي (1418-1450) باچا Sejong د Joseon Dynasy څلورم باچا وو او یوله ډیر درناوي شخصیتونو څخه وو. هغه په اصل کې هنګول الفبا د هنیمجینجوم نوم ورکړ، چې ""د خلکو لارښوونې لپاره سم غږونه"" معنی یې لري."
mt: "Hangeul is a phonetic alphabet invented according to the shape of the mouth, which was first used in common speech, invented in 1443 in the time of King Sejong (1418-1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and one of the most respected personalities. He originally called the alphabet Hanyujinjum, which means "good sounds for the people."
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

src: ډیر نظريات شتون لري چې څنګه سنسکرت په وجود کې راغلی. له دوی څخه یوه نظريه له لویدیځ څخه هندوستان ته د آرین مهاجرت په اړه ده، چې خپله ژبه یې ورسره راوړې وه. سانسکرت یوه لرغونې ژبه ده او د لاتیني ژبې سره چې په اروپا کې ویل کیږي د مقایسې وړ ده. په نړی کې پیژندل شوي د ټولو نه لومړۍ کتاب په سانسکریټ ژبه لیکل شوي ،د اوپنی شاد upanishads د راټولولو نه وروسته سانسکریټ د درجه بندي له مخی له منځه ولاړه سانسکریت یوه ډیره سخته او غنی ژبه ده ، کومي ژبی چې د څو عصری هندي ژبو د منبع په توګه خدمت کړي دي لکه څرنګه چې لاتینی ژبه د اروپایې ژبو منبع ده ، لکه هسپانوي او فرانسوي
mt: There are many theories about how Sanskrit came into existence. One theory is that it was brought to India by the Aryan migration from the West. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to Latin, which is spoken in Europe. The oldest known book in the world is written in Sanskrit, the Upanishads, after which Sanskrit fell out of use. Sanskrit is a very difficult and rich language, which has served as the source of many modern Indian languages, as Latin has served as the source of many European languages, such as Spanish and French.
ref: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

src: څنګه به دي لو د جا‌‌ ذبی قوه ما راکش کړي ؟ که چېرته تاسی د لو په سطحه ودرېږی ستاسې وزن به د هغه وزن څخه کم وي کوم وزن چې ستاسې په ځمکه باندي دي یو کس په ځمکه 200 پاونډه (90کېلو ) وزن لري په لو Loباندي به یې وزن 36 پاونډه (16 کېلو) وي. نو د جاذبی قوه یقینی په تا سی باندي لږ عمل کوي
mt: How can you fly to the moon? If you go to the surface of the moon, your weight will be less than the weight on the earth. A person weighs 200 pounds (90 kilograms) on the earth, but on the moon, it will be 36 pounds (16 kilograms). So the gravitational force acts less on the surface of the moon.
ref: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: د سپوږمۍ سطحه د ډبرو او خاورو څخه جوړه ده. د سپوږمۍ بهرنۍ طبقه د Crust په نامه یادیږي. د زمکې د پوړ يا قشر70 کیلو متره نيږدي او په لرې اړخ کې 100 کیلو متره ضخامت لري۔ دا د ماریاګانو لاندې زیات نری دی او د لوړو وطنونو لاندې زیات غټ دی. په نږدې خوا ښايي زیاتې ماریاګانې وي ځکه چې هلته پوستکی زیات نری دی. لاوا په زیاته اسانۍ سره سطحې ته راوچتیږي.
mt: The Moon's crust is composed of both rock and soil. The Moon's outer layer is called the crust. The Earth's crust is about 70 kilometers thick and up to 100 kilometers thick at its thickest. It is less dense than the mantle and more dense than the crust. There may be more volcanoes in the near future because the crust is less dense.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: "ډیر خلک د ورځې خوب ګوري چې انسانان نورو ستورو ته سفر کولی شي او نوره نړۍ پلټلی شي، ځینې خلک حیران دي چې هلته به څه وي او ځینې نور فکر کوي چې د نورو سیارو د مخلوقاتو ژوند به په نورو سیارو بل ډول وي. خو که چیرې دا کله هم واقع کیږي نو شاید تر ډیر وخت پورې واقع نه شي. ستوري ډیر لرې له یو بله پراته دي، یعنی د یو ستوري له بل ""همسایه"" تر منځه په ټریلیونونو میله واټن پروت دی. شاید یو ورځ، ستا لمسیان یو ورځ په بیګانه جهان کې ودرېږي او د خپلو پخوانیو نیکونو په اړه تعجب وکړي."
mt: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to other stars and explore the universe. Some are curious about what they will find there, and some think that life on other planets will be different from life on Earth. But if this ever happens, it may not happen for a long time. Stars are very far apart, meaning that the distance between one star and its nearest "neighbor" is in trillions of miles. One day, your grandchildren may travel to a world without Earth and wonder about their ancestors."
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: لمر د څمکې په شان قشر نه لري چې ته پری ودرېږی ، ټول لمر د غازونو، اور او د پلازما څخه جوړ شوي دي د ګازونو تراکم نور هم کمیږی کله چې ته د لمر د مرکز څخه نور هم وړاندي ځی د لمر بیرونی برخه چې موږ کومه ګورو د فوتوسفیر په نامه یاديږی چې د رڼا د پنډوسکې په معنی ده
mt: The sun's surface is not a solid crust that you can walk on, but is made up of gas, plasma and fire. The density of the gases decreases as you move further away from the sun's center. The outer layer of the sun that we see is called the photosphere, meaning the source of light.
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: نږدې درې زره کاله مخکې په 1610 کې د علم نجوم عالم ګالیلو ګالیلیgalileo galilei; د یو تیلیسکوپ په کارولو سره دا مشاهده وکړه چې زحل سیاره هم پړاونه لري لکه څرنګه چې سپوږمی پړاونه لري مرحلې ځکه واقع کیږي چې یوازې زهره (یا د سپوږمۍ) د لمر رڼاوو سره مخ کېږي. د زهره دا مرحلې د کوپرنیکس یا Copernicus دا نظریه تقویه کوي چې سیارې د لمر څخه تاوویږي. انګریز هوروم پوه د جیریا هوراکس په نوم بیا، یو څو کاله وروسته په 1639کې د وینس یوه لاره ليدلي۔

ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: د ایمازان دریاب په زمکه ټولو کې دویم اوږد او ټولو کې غټ دریاب دی. دا دویم غټ دریاب څخه 8 چنده زیاتې اوبه وړي. ایمازان د نړۍ تر ټولو زیات پلن دریاب هم چې ځنه وخت شپږ میله پلن شي. ټول 20 سلنه اوبه چې ددې سیارې له سیندونو څخه سمندرونو ته توییږې د امازون څخه راځي. مرکزی ایمازان دریاب 6387 کلومیټره (3980 میله) دی. دا زرګونو لاکوچنیو دریابونو څخه اوبه راټولوي.
mt: The Amazon River is the second longest river in the world and the largest river by volume in the world. The river's source is in the Marañon Mountains of Peru, and its mouth is in the Atlantic Ocean, near the Brazilian city of Belém. The Amazon drains all of Brazil, and most of Peru, Ecuador, Bolivia, Colombia, and Venezuela. The Amazon basin is the largest drainage basin in the world, accounting for nearly one fifth of the Earth's fresh water. The Amazon is 6,400 km (4,000 mi) long. It is 2,400 km (1,500 mi) wide at its mouth. The Amazon is 20 times larger than the Mississippi River, which drains 31% of the United States. The Amazon River is the largest river in the world by volume, with a mean discharge of about 209,000 cubic meters per second (7,400,000 cu ft/s). The Amazon, which has the largest water flow on Earth, discharges about 20% of the world's fresh water into the Atlantic Ocean. ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: اتلس سلنه د وينزولاvenezuela خلک کار نه لري ، او اکثریت د هغه خلکو چې کار لري په غیر رسمی اقتصاد کې کار کوي د خدماتو په سکتور service sector کې ددرېو څخه دوه برخی خلک کار کوي نږدې څلورمه برخه یې په صنعت industry کې او پنځمه یې په زراعت agricultureکې کار کوي د وينزويلاvenezuela لپاره مهم د تیلو صنعت دي ، چېرته چې هیواد یې نیټ صادرونکې دي سره ددې چې یواځې یو سلنه پکې کار کوي
mt: 90% of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two-thirds of the workforce is employed in the service sector, with about one-fourth in industry and one-fifth in agriculture. Oil is the most important industry, where the country is a net exporter, despite the fact that only one percent of the population is employed in the industry.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: ستوری رنا او حرارت ورکوي ځکه چې د هایدروجن اتومونه سره د یو ډیر وزن لرونکې مادي د جوړولو په خاطر یو ځای کېږی او انرژی تولیدوي ساینس پوهان کار کوي چې یو داسې رییکټر جوړ کړي چې کولی شي په ورته طريقه انرژي جوړه کړي. تر اوسه، ددې حل کول ډیره ستونزمنه ده او له دې څخه وړاندې چې مونږ مفید فیوژن د عکس العمل عامل و نه وینو، کلونو وخت به ونیسي.
mt: The star burns and radiates heat because the hydrogen atoms are fused together to form a heavier material, producing energy. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can do the same thing to produce energy. So far, solving this problem has been difficult and it will take years before we have a viable fusion reactor before we can have a viable fusion reaction.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: عناصر او مرکبات پرته له کوم تغیر له یو حالت څخه بل حالت ته بدلیدای شي. نایتروجن د غاز په شکل کې د مایع نایتروجن یو شان ټول خاصیتونه لري ، مایع حالت یې متراکم وي خو مالیکولونه یې یو شان وي اوبه یو بل مثال دی۔ مرکب اوبه له دوه هایدروجن اتومونو او د اکسیجن اتوم څخه جوړ دي۔ د غاز ،مایع او جامد ټولو حالتونو کې دا یو شان مالیکولی حالت لري که څه هم ددې فزیکې حالت تغیر وکړي ،ددې کېمیاوي حالت یو شان پاتی کېږی
mt: Elements and compounds can change from one state to another. Nitrogen in gaseous form has the same properties as liquid nitrogen, which is denser but has the same molecules. Water is a compound made of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. In all three states, it has the same molecular structure, even though its physical state changes, its chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: عناصر او مرکبات پرته له کوم تغیر له یو حالت څخه بل حالت ته بدلیدای شي. نایتروجن د غاز په شکل کې د مایع نایتروجن یو شان ټول خاصیتونه لري ، مایع حالت یې متراکم وي خو مالیکولونه یې یو شان وي اوبه یو بل مثال دی۔ مرکب اوبه له دوه هایدروجن اتومونو او د اکسیجن اتوم څخه جوړ دي۔ د غاز ،مایع او جامد ټولو حالتونو کې دا یو شان مالیکولی حالت لري که څه هم ددې فزیکې حالت تغیر وکړي ،ددې کېمیاوي حالت یو شان پاتی کېږی
mt: Elements and compounds can change from one state to another. Nitrogen in gaseous form has the same properties as liquid nitrogen, which is denser but has the same molecules. Water is a compound made of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. In all three states, it has the same molecular structure, even though its physical state changes, its chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: د انقلابي جګړې په جریان کې — دیارلس ایالتونو د کنفیډریشن مادې لاندې لومړی يو ضعیف مرکزي حکومت جوړ کړ— په داسې حال کې چې کانګرس د هغې یوازینۍ برخه وه. کانګرس د مالیاتو لګولو لپاره د ځواک نشتوالې درلود، او ځکه چې هیڅ ملي اجراییه قوه یا قضایه قوه شتون نه درلود، نو دا په دولتي چارواکو تکیه وکړه، څوک چې اکثراً د دې ټولو عملونو پلي کولو کې همکاري نه کوي. دې واک نه لرلو چې د دولتونو ترمینځ د مالیې قوانين او تعرفونه لغوه کړي. دې خط کې د تغیر راوستلو وړاندې د ټولو ریاستونو بېشمېره رضایت ته اړتیا ده او ریاستونه مرکزي حکومت ډیر عادي اخلي چې خپل استازي یې کله کله غیرحاضر هم وي.
mt: During the Revolutionary War — the first weak central government under the Articles of Confederation — Congress had no power to levy taxes, and since there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on the states, who often did not cooperate in carrying out its acts. It had no power to invalidate state laws or tariffs. A unanimous vote of all the states was required to amend the Articles, and the states treated the central government as an ordinary state, with its representatives often absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: "که چیرې تاسې د نیشنل ټریژر فلم کتلی وي، تاسې شاید فکر وکړئ چې د خزانې (ټریژر) نقشه یې د استقلال د اعلانیدو وروسته لیکل شوي وي. حال دا چې، هغه صحیح نه ده. په داسې حال کې د سند په شا باندې ځینې شیان لیکل شوي دي، دا د خزانې (ټریژر) نقشه نه ده. د استقلال د اعلان په شا باندې لیکلي لفظونه ""د استقلال اعلانیدلو اصلي نیټه د جولایي 4مه 1776 ده"" دا خط د سند په وروستۍ برخه کې له پورته څخه ښکته خوا ته ښکاره کېږي. حال دا چې هیڅوک هم دقیق نه پوهیږي چې دا به چا لیکلي وي، خو په دې پوهېږي چې ددې د ژوند څخه وړاندې، غټ پوستین سند (چې اندازه یې ¾29 پر ½24 انچه وه) د ساتنې په موخه تاو شوی وو. نو، احتمال لري چې اشاري په ساده ډول د لیبل په توګه اضافه شوی وي."
mt: "If you have seen the National Treasure movie, you may think that the treasure map was written after the Declaration of Independence. However, this is not true. Some things were written on the back of the document, not the treasure map. The words "The original Declaration of Independence was dated July 4, 1776" are written on the bottom of the document. No one knows exactly what this was written for, but they know that the document was folded for storage before this. So, it is possible that this was written as a label."
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: د هیواد د خپلواکې په پیل کې ،د سنګاپورsingapore د نباتاتو باغچو مهارتونو جزیره په یو ساحلی باغچه ښار باندي اړولو کې مرسته وکړه په 1981 کې ، واندا مس جواکېم ( vanda mis joaquim) یو ډول اصلاح شوي ګل د ملی ګل په توګه اتخاب شو
mt: In the early days of independence, Singapore's Botanic Gardens helped to spread the horticultural expertise of its tropical plants to a coastal city in 1981, the Vanda Miss Joaquim was chosen as the national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: که څه هم د اهرامونو جوړونه د زاړه سلطنت تر پایه جاري وه خو په لویوالی او د جوړښت په تخنیکي ښه والی کې هیڅوخت ګیزا څخه تېری نه و شوی. نوي سلطنت د مصریانو پخواني تاریخي میراثي ځایونو حیران کړي دي کوم چې پخپل وخت کې د د زرګونو کلونو لپاره ښه ګڼل کیدل.
mt: Although the pyramids were built during the Old Kingdom, they were never surpassed in size or engineering sophistication. The New Kingdom left the ancient Egyptians in awe of their own history, which had been forgotten for thousands of years.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: هر کالد اکتوبر په اوږدو کې نږدې 1.5 میلیونه بوټي خوړونکي جنوبي ساحو ته سفر کوي او د مارا سمندر څخه د شمالي تپو له لارې د باران لپاره تیرېږي. او بیا بیرته شمال ته د غرب د لارې ،یو وار بیا د مارا سیند نه تیریدل، بارانونه د اپریل په شا او خوا کې د سیرینګیټی ساحه د سیرنګیټیserengiti په نیشنل پارک باندي مشتمله ده ، د نګورنګورو ngorongoro ساتل شوي ساحه او په تنزانیا tanzaniaکې د مسوا ګیم maswa game ساتل شوي ساحه او په کېنیا kenya کې د مسای مارا نیشنل پارک masai mara national park ساتل شوي ځای
mt: 1.5 million wildebeest migrate south in October, crossing the Mara River to escape the rains. They then return north, crossing the Mara River again, to the Serengeti National Park in Tanzania, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area, the Maswa Game Controlled Area, and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: "د فرانسې د جګړې په ختمیدو سره، آلمان د برطانیې د جزیزې د نیولو لپاره تیاریانې پیل کړې. آلمان بريد ته د کوډ-نوم ” آپریشن سیلیان” ورکړی- د برتانیا د اردو ډیری درنې وسلې او اکمالات هغه وخت له لاسه ورکړل، کله چې دوئ له ډنکرک څخه وایستل شو، نو اردو په بشپړه توګه ضعیف و۔ خو سلطنتي سمندري ځواکونه لاهم د آلمان بحري ځواک (""کریګسمارین"") څخه خورا پیاوړي وو او کيدي شې چې د انګلیسي چینل په اوږدو کې لیږل شوي د هر ډول برید کښتۍ تباه کړي وې. حال دا چې، ډیرې کمې د شاهي امنیتیانو کښتۍ د احتمالي مسیر سره نږدې پاتې دي نو د کښتیو مشران ویرېږي چې د جرمنيانو په برید کې غرق نشي."
mt: "With the end of the war in France, Germany began preparations for the invasion of Britain. Germany gave the code name "Operation Sealion" to the attack. Britain's army had lost most of its heavy weapons and equipment when it was evacuated from Dunkirk, leaving the army completely weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and had been able to sink any kind of ship that sailed through the English Channel. However, most of the ships of the Royal Navy were close to the possible route of the German attack, so the commanders of the ships were worried that they would be overwhelmed by the Germans."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: راځئ چې د ایټالیا د پلان د تشریح څخه پیل وکړو . ایټالیا اصل کې د آلمان او جاپان کوچنی ورور و. دي کمزوری پوځ او یوه کمزوری بحری قوه لرله ، سره ددې چې دوي هم دا اوس څلور نوي کښتی د جنګ د پیل څخه مخکې جوړی کړي وي د ایټالیا اصلی هدف افریقایې هیوادونه و چې و یې نیسی ، دوي باید یو د عسکرو د لیږلو لپاره یو ځای لرلی، تر څو عسکر په دي توانیدلی وای چې د مديترانی څخه تیر شوي و او افریقا یې نیولی وای ددې لپاره یې باید په مصر کې د برطانوي اډو او کښتیو د ختمولو لپاره اقدام کړي و . ددې اقداماتو سره سره باید د ایټالیې جنګی کښتیو ته نور د هیڅ اقدام اړتیا نه وه اوس د جاپان لپاره، جاپان د برطانیې په څیر یو جزیروي هیواد دي
mt: Let's start with the explanation of the Italian plan. Italy was originally a small brother of Germany and Japan. It had a weak army and a weak navy, but it had already built four new warships before the war began. Italy's original goal was to conquer the African countries, and it needed a place to send troops to be able to cross the Mediterranean and conquer Africa. To do this, it had to act to destroy the British bases and ships in Egypt. Despite these actions, Italian warships did not need any further action, and now for Japan, Japan is a small island country like Britain.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "د D -ورځې ښکته کیدل او ورپسې جنګونو د فرانس شمال خلاص کړل خو جنوب یې تر اوسه نه دی خلاص. دا د ""وچي"" فرانسوي حکومت کاوه۔ دا فرانسوي خلک وو چي په 1940 کي يي د آلمان سره سوله کړې وه، او بريد کوونکو سره د جنګ پرځای کار کاوه۔ د 1940 اګست 15مه، یرغلګرو جنوبي فرانس ته داخل شول، دا یرغل ""ډراګوان عملیاتو"" یادېږي. علمي_ژوندپالوژي_ او_ معرفت_نوروس سائنس / پروسږم_ژوند کولو_فرم_ان_وایولوژي_پریوسټ یوازې په دوه اونیو کې امریکایانو او آزاد فرانسوي ځواکونو سویلي فرانسه خپلواکي له لاسه ورکړه او جرمني ته مخه کړه."
mt: "The fall of the D-Day and subsequent battles cleared the north of France, but the south was not yet cleared. This was the French government of "Vichy". These were the French people who had made peace with Germany in 1940, and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On August 15, 1944, the invaders entered southern France, this is called the "Dragoon operations".  Science, life, and knowledge / I am a prosumer of life forms and prehistory. Only in two weeks, Americans and free French forces gave up southern France to the Germans and turned it back."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: آبدوزونه هغه کښتۍ دي چې د اوبو لاندې سفر کولو لپاره جوړې شوي دي، او هلته کې د اوږد وخت لپاره پاتې کیږي. پخ لومړي نړیوال جنګ او دویم نړیوال جنګ کې د اوبو لاندې بیړۍ یا Submarines ووکارول شوی. وروسته له هغې بیا دا ډیر کمزوري شول او تر ډیرې محدودې ساحې یې نښه ویشتلی شوه. د جنګ په پیل کې ډیری وخت دوي د سمندر د پاسه تلل، مګر د رادار د ښه کېدو او لا ډیر دقیق کېدو نه وروسته سمندرې انګوټونه submarines ددې لپاره چې ونه لیدل شي ، دي ته اړکړل شو چې داوبو لاندې تګ وکړي جرمني سبمراین ته U-Boats وایې. جرمنیان د خپلو سمندري بیړیو په ګرځولو او کارولو کې ډیر ښه دي. د انګوټونو لرلو سره د بریالی کېدو نه وروسته په آلمان اعتبار نه کېده چې دوي سره دي نور څو دانی پاتی وي
mt: Submarines are boats designed for travel under water, and staying there for long periods of time. They were used in the First World War and the Second World War. At first they were mostly used to travel on the surface of the sea, but after the invention of the radar and more precise radars, submarines were made to be able to not be seen, and so they had to travel under water. The Germans are very good at using and moving their submarines. After the invention of submarines, Germany was not allowed to have them anymore.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 17 ستمبر 1939 پورې پولېنډي دفاع وختي ماته شوې وه، او شاته تلنه او رومانیايي پل خواوشا سیمه کې بیا ځان سنبالېونه یواځې امېد و. په هرصورت، دا پلانونه شاوخوا د شپې ناڅرګند وپیژندل شول، کله چې د شوروي اتحاد سره صلیب څخه ۸۰۰.۰۰۰ سرتیري ورننوتل او د ریګا سولې تړون، د شوروي - پولینډی د نه يرغل تړون او نور نړیوال تړونونه، دواړه دوه اړخیز او څو اړخیز سرغړونو کې د پولینډ ختیځو سیمو باندې له برید وروسته د بیلاروس او اوکراین لیکبڼې جوړی کړئ.
mt: 17 September 1939, Polish defense was defeated, and retreat and Romanian bridgehead in the area of ​​Równe was only hoped for. However, these plans were not recognized around the night, when 800,000 troops were sent to the cross with the Soviet Union and the Riga Peace Treaty, the Polish-Soviet non-aggression treaty and other international treaties, the Polish eastern areas were written on the maps of Belarus and Ukraine after the attack.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: ، د ایټالیې د 1940 د جون په 10 د جنګ د رسمی اعلان په یوه اوونی کې دننه د برطانیې 11 یوولسم هوسر hussar په لیبیا کې ديکپوزو بندرcapuzzo fort ونیوه په د بارډیا په مشرق کې د یوکمین په نتیجه کې برطانوي پوځونو د ایټالیا د لسم پوځ مشر انچېنیر جنرال لسټوکې general lastucci ونیو د جون په 28، مارشال اټالو بابلو italo bablo د لیبیا ګورنر جنرال او د مسولینی mussolini څرګند وارث په یوه دوستانه اور کې هغه مهال ووژل چې د توبروک په هوایي میدان کې کوزیده
mt: 10 June 1940, in a single day, the British 11th Hussars captured the Italian fort of Capuzzo in Libya, in the east of Bardia, and captured General Lastucci, commander of the 10th Italian Army, on 28 June, Marshal Italo Bablo, Governor of Libya and Mussolini's most likely successor, was killed in a friendly fire while flying to Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: تبتي بودمت د بودا په ښوونو بنسټ لري، خو دا د ماهایانا د مینې لارې او هندي یوګا څخه ګڼ شمېر تخنیکونو په برکت غځېدلی دی. په اصولو کې د تبت بودیزم ډير ساده دی. په دې د کونډالیني یوګا، مراقبه او مینې ته د غیږې ورکولو لار شاملې دي. کونډالیني یوګا کې کونډالیني انرژي (د روحاني ویښتیا انرژي) د یوګا د ناستې ولاړې ترتیبونو، د ساه ورزشونو، تکراري ذکرونو او بصري تخیلاتي عکسونو له لارې راویښول کیږي. د تبتي یوګا مرکز یوګا نومي دیوتا دی. په بصري تخیل کې د مختلفو دیوتاوو د راوستلو له لارې د انرژۍ لارې صفا کیږي، چاکرې فعالې شي او د روحاني ویښتا شعور تخلیق شي.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but has incorporated many techniques from Hindu Kundalini Yoga, meditation and love. Tibetan Buddhism is much simpler in its principles. In this Kundalini Yoga, Kundalini energy (spiritual energy) is awakened through Kundalini Yoga poses, breathing exercises, repetitive mantras and visual imagery. The Tibetan Yoga Center is called Kundalini. In visual imagination, the energy of various deities is purified through the way of awakening of different deities, chakras are activated and spiritual awareness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: برنامه د ماښام په ۸:۳۰ په ساعت کي پیل شوه ځایی وخت (۱۵:۰۰ د نړیوال وخت همغږی شوی)۔ د هیواد مشهورو سندرغاړو د Bhajans یا عقیدتي سندرې د Shri Shyam پښو ته وړاندې کړي. سندرغاړي Sanju Sharma په ماښام کې پیل وکړ چې وروسته یې بیا Jai Shankar Choudhary n د Chappan Bhog Bhajan هم وړاندې کړ. سندرغاړي Raju Khandelwal د هغې ملتیا کوله. بیا Lakkha Singh د بهاجنونو د ویلو مشري پر غاړه واخیسته د چپپن بوګ ۱۰۸ پلیټونه (په هندو مذهب کې، ۵۶ مختلف خوراکي توکي، لکه خواږه، میوې، مغز، ډیشونه او نور کوم چې دیوتا ته وړاندې کیږي) بابا شیم ته ورکړل شول. لاکا سینګ (Lakkha Singh) هم د Chappan Bhog Bhajan وړاندې کړ. سندرغاړي Raju Khandelwal د هغې ملتیا کوله.
mt: 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC) the program began. Local famous singers performed Bhajans or devotional songs to Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary singing Chappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then Lakkha Singh took over the singing of the Bhajans. 108 plates of Chappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different food items, such as meat, fruits, nuts, dishes and other items offered to deity) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also sang Chappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: برنامه د ماښام په ۸:۳۰ په ساعت کي پیل شوه ځایی وخت (۱۵:۰۰ د نړیوال وخت همغږی شوی)۔ د هیواد مشهورو سندرغاړو د Bhajans یا عقیدتي سندرې د Shri Shyam پښو ته وړاندې کړي. سندرغاړي Sanju Sharma په ماښام کې پیل وکړ چې وروسته یې بیا Jai Shankar Choudhary n د Chappan Bhog Bhajan هم وړاندې کړ. سندرغاړي Raju Khandelwal د هغې ملتیا کوله. بیا Lakkha Singh د بهاجنونو د ویلو مشري پر غاړه واخیسته د چپپن بوګ ۱۰۸ پلیټونه (په هندو مذهب کې، ۵۶ مختلف خوراکي توکي، لکه خواږه، میوې، مغز، ډیشونه او نور کوم چې دیوتا ته وړاندې کیږي) بابا شیم ته ورکړل شول. لاکا سینګ (Lakkha Singh) هم د Chappan Bhog Bhajan وړاندې کړ. سندرغاړي Raju Khandelwal د هغې ملتیا کوله.
mt: 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC) the program began. Local famous singers performed Bhajans or devotional songs to Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary singing Chappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then Lakkha Singh took over the singing of the Bhajans. 108 plates of Chappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different food items, such as meat, fruits, nuts, dishes and other items offered to deity) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also sang Chappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "نمانځنی د نړیوال پیژندل شوی ډلی خاصی ننداری سره پیل شوی. د استانبول سټیت سیمفونی ارکېسټرا istanbul state symphony orchestra دا تعقیب کړ، یو جنیسری janissary band د موسیقی ډله ، سندرغاړی فتح ارکوکfatah erkoc مسلم ګارسیس muslum gurces بیا ويرلنګ درویشس سټیج ته بوتلي شو. ترکې ديوا سیزن diva sezen اکسو aksu د ایټالوي ټینر الیسینډرو سفینا italian tenor safina او یونانی سندرغاړی حارس الیګزو haris alexiou سره یو ځای سندرې وويلی پای ته رسیدو لپاره، د ترکیه د ډانس ډله فائیر آف اناتولیا نندره ""ټرائ"" ترسره کړه."
mt: "The international festival of music and dance has begun. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra followed, a Janissary band, singer Fatah Erkoc, violinist Muslum Gurces, and Turkish diva Sezen Aksu, Italian tenor Safina, and Greek singer Haris Alexiou sang together to end the festival. The Turkish dance group Fair of Anatolia performed the "Trai" dance."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: دا چی سورلی په 90 درجو د فارن هایت کی منتظرې وې ، مسافرینو ته اوبه وویشلی شوې . د اور وژنی کپتان سکاټ کونس scott couns وويل چې ، هغه په سنټا کلارا santa clara کې یوه ګرمه ورڅ وه چې حرارت 90 کې و هر څومره وخت د رولر کاستر roller coasterکې په عذابوونکې دي چې کله ونښلی ، که خبره لنډه کړو نو د اولنی کس د سورلی را کوزولو لږ تر لږه یو ساعت وخت ونیوه.
mt: 90 degree Fahrenheit in the Far North, passengers were given water. Captain Scott Couns said in Santa Clara, a hot day that was 90 degrees, how long the roller coaster was in agony when it was turned on, if we shorten the story, the first person to ride the roller coaster took at least an hour.
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: د وروستۍ خبري ټولګې مطابق، د سمندر د سطحې لوستل ښایي چې سونامي تولید کړل شواي. د (Pago Pago او Niue) سره نژدې دقیقاٌ د سونامي فعالیتونه موجود و. په Tonga کې د مهم زیان او زخمیانو په اړه راپور ندی ورکړل شوی خو برق په مؤقت ډول قطع شوي چې ټونګیایي مسؤلین یې د تسونامي په اړه د PTWC لخوا صادرې شوې اخطاریې د ترلاسه کولو څخه منع کړي. په هوائي کې څوارلس ښوونځي د ساحلونو په شاوخوا کې یا نږدې موقعیت لري د خبرتیا د لرې کیدو سره د چهارشنبه ټولې تړل شوې وې۔
mt: According to the latest news, the tsunami may have been generated by the earthquake. Tsunami activity was reported near Pago Pago and Niue. No reports of damage or injuries have been received from Tonga, but power has been cut off temporarily to prevent Tongan officials from receiving the tsunami warnings issued by PTWC. Fourteen schools are located near or on the coast and all were closed on Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: چان ریډ john reid د A1GP د نیوې زیلاند د ډلې مرستیال موټر چلوونکې نن تاریخ جوړ کړ کله چې هغه په قانونی ډول د اته څلويښت کلن 48آکلنډ هاربر بریج نوي زیلاند auckland harbour bridge newzealand باندي د ټو لو څخه کړندی موټر وځغلوو ښاغلي ریډ د نیوزیلینډ A1GP موټر، بلیک بیوټی د ۱۶۰ کلومیتره/ساعت په پل باندي اووه ځله وچلوه. د نوزیلینډ پولیسو ته ستونزمن وه چې د سرعت معلومونکې رادار لرونکې ټوپک په واسطه د ریډ سرعت معلوم کړي چې څومره سرعت یې درلود ځکه چې بلیک بیوټی ډیره ټیټه ده، یواځنی وار چې پولیسو وکولای شول چې سرعت اندازه کړي ، کله چې رید خپل سرعت 160 کیلومتره فی ساعت ته راکم کړ.
mt: 48-year-old John Reid, the deputy driver of the New Zealand team of A1GP, made a legal U-turn on the Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand on Monday, when he drove a car from the top of the bridge. The New Zealand police had difficulty determining the speed of Reid's radar gun, because the Black Beetle is too low, the only time the police could measure the speed, when Reid reduced his speed to 160 kilometers per hour.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: یوې اعتدال زلزلې لویدیز مونټانا ولړزاوه په ۱۰:۰۸ د شپي د يکشنبي په ورځ. د زیان په اړه هیڅ ډول بیړني راپورونه د امریکا د متحده آیالاتو د جیولوجیکي سروې (USGS) او د زلزلې د معلوماتو ملي مرکز لخوا لاسته ندي راوړل شوي. د زلزلې مرکز تقریباً د دیلون شمال- شمال شرق 20 کیلومترۍ (15 میله) کې او د Butte په جنوب کې تقریباً په 65 کیلومترۍ (40 میلو) کې وه.
mt: A 3.8 magnitude earthquake shook central Montana at 10:08 p.m. Sunday. No damage reports were immediately available from the U.S. Geological Survey and the National Earthquake Information Center. The epicenter was about 20 kilometers (12 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: د عراق د ابوغریب زندان د یوه فساد په وخت کې خالی پریښودل شو محبس وروسته له هغې بدنام شو کله چې هلته د بندي سپکاوي رابرسیره شو چې وروسته له هغې د امریکا متحده آیالاتو ځواکونو ولکه واخیسته.
mt: The prison was emptied during a riot, and later became notorious when abuse of detainees was revealed, which led to the U.S. military taking control of the facility.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: ډلې په مایو یادګاری ستیديم کې خپله ننداره لغوه کړه . کومه چې نهه زره کسانو لپاره جوړه شوي وه . دوي له خپلو خوښونکو څخه بخښنه هم غوښتی د ډلې مديریت کوونکې کمپنی ایچ کې منجمنت ای این سی کله چې په 20 سپتمبر ننداره لغوه کړه کو م لامل په ګوته نه کړ . مګر په سبا یې لوژستیکې مشکل ددې لپاره ګرم و ګاڼه
mt: The group pulled its exhibit from the May 20th event, which was designed for 9,000 people. The group's management company, ICM, was not happy when the event was moved to September 20th. But on Sunday, logistical problems made it too hot to handle.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: د بشکیک په کوڅو کې د قانون د نافذ کولو چارواکو په نشتون کې د شپې په جریان کې په پراخه کچه د چور راپورونه ورکړل شوي څرنګه چې ډله خلک په کوڅو کې ګرځیدل او د مصرفي شیانو دوکانونه یې چور کړل، د یو څارونکي لخوا بشکیک د انارشۍ په ډوبیدونکی حالت کې بیان کړای. د بیشکیک ډیرو اوسیدونکو د جنوب څخه راغلي مظاهره کوونکي پر بی قانونۍ تورن کړل
mt: In the absence of law enforcement, widespread reports of thefts were made as a group of people roamed the streets and looted stores, a watchman said Bishkek was on the verge of anarchy. Many residents of Bishkek blamed the rioters from the south for lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: وړاندې له دې، د رینګ اجراییه رییس جیمي سیمیناف څرګندونه کړې وه چې دده شرکت هغه وخت پیل وکړ چې د دروازې زنګ یې له دوکان څخه دده په ګراج کې نه اوریدل کېدل. هغه د وائي فائي دروازې زنګ جوړ کړو، هغه وویل. سمینوف وویل چې د هغه د شارک ټینک په خپرونه کې د څرګندیدو وروسته چیرته چې د خپرونې ټیم د نوي شروع شوي تجارت د تمویلول ودرول خرڅلاو زیات شو. د 2017 کال په وروستیو کې سیمینوف د QVC د پیرلو په چینل کې را څرګند شو. د Ring د خپل امنیتي سیال شرکت ADT Corporation د حقوقي دعوې پیسې هم ورکړې.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had said the company started when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his garage. He invented the Wi-Fi doorbell. Siminoff said that after the Shark Tank appearance, the company's funding dried up. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on QVC's shopping channel. Ring's security rival company ADT Corporation also paid legal fees.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "د پی بی ایس ننداره د دوه درجنو څخه زیان د ایمی ایوارډونو لرونکې ده . ددې موده یوازې د سیسیم ستریټ او مسټر روجرز څخه لنډه ده د نندارې هره برخه به د یو مشخص کتاب په یوه موضوع تمرکز وکړي او بیا به هغه موضوع د یو شمیر قصو په واسطه وڅیړي. هره ننداره به د کوجنیانو لپاره کتابونه هم وړانديز کړي ، کله چې هغوي کتابتون ته ځي جان د WNED buffalo څخه چې رینبو هوم سټیشن (Reading Rainbow's home station ) یې لوسته وويل ""د رینبو لوستل کوچنیانو ته دا ښودنه کوي چې ولی باید لوست وکړي ،د لوست مینې نندارې کوچنیان و هڅول چې یو کتاب را پورته کړي او لوست وکړي."" د John Grant په شمول ځینې په دې باور دي چې دواړه د بحرانونو تمویل او د تعلیمي تلویزیوني پروګرام د فلسفې تغیرول د سلسلې پایته رسیدو کې ونډه لري."
mt: "The PBS series is a loss for the children. The short time span of the series is only a fraction of the time of Sesame Street and Mister Rogers. Each episode will focus on a specific book and then explore that topic through a number of vignettes. Each episode will also recommend books to the viewers, when they go to the library, John of WNED buffalo said "Reading Rainbow shows children that they should read, the reading series showed children how to get a book and read it." John Grant among others believe that both the funding and the educational television program's philosophy change is part of the series' end.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: د امستردام د ښار او د Anne Frank Meuseum چارواکي وایي چې ونه د فنجی پواسطه ککړه شوې او د عامه صحت لپاره یو خطر دی او هغوۍ استدلال کوي چې د غورځیدو د جدي خطر سره مخامخ وه. د سه شنبی په ورځ به غوڅ شی ټاکل شوې وه، مګر د بیړنۍ محکمې پریکړې وروسته وژغورل شو۔
mt: City and Anne Frank Museum officials say the building was not contaminated by the fungus and is not a health hazard. The building was scheduled to be demolished on Monday, but was saved by a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: د ژوو د آزادي او په ژوو د ظلم دمخنیوې لپاره شاهي ټولنې ار اس پی سی ای RSPCA دوهم څل لپاره د استرالیا په مسلخونو کې د د سی سی ټی وي CCTVکمرو د حتمی لګولو خبره کړي ده RSPCA نيو ساؤتھ ویلز رییس انسپکټر ډیویډ او شانسي ABC ته وویل دا چې په اسټرالیا کې د مسلخ نظارت او تفتیش باید یو عام شی وي. د سی سی ټی وي CCTV کمرو لګول به هغه خلکو ته کلک پیغام ورسیږی چې د ژوو سره کار کوي چې ددوي رفاه زموږ تر ټولو اولنی ترجیح ده
mt: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) has called for CCTV cameras to be installed in all Australian abattoirs for the second time. RSPCA New South Wales Inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that abattoir inspections and audits should be a common practice. "Having CCTV cameras in abattoirs would send a strong message to those who work with animals that animal welfare is our highest priority," he said.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: د ریډ لیک red lakeپه ټولنه کې نن خبر هغه وخت خپور شو چې دجیف ويس jeff weise او د نهو څخه د درې نورو متاثرو جنازی مراسم تر سره کېدل . چې یو بل زده کوونکې د مارچ د 21 په ډزو کې د لاس لرلو په تور و نیول شو چارواکو د نن ورځې د نیونې د تصدیق نه ډیر لږ هاخوا رسمي وویل. په هر صورت نن د پلټنی يه اړه یوې با خبرې سر چېنی مینیا پولیس ستار ټریبیون minneapolis star- tribune ته وويل شپاړلس کلن لويس جورډین louis jourdain د ریډ لیک red lake د قبیلوي مشر فلاید جورډین floyd jourdain زوی دي تر اوسه معلومه ده چې کومه سزا به پرې ایښودل کېږي او یا به پر هلک محکمې څه پرېکړه کوي خو ځوان باندې د فدرالي محکمې پروسه پیل شوله.
mt: 21 March 2009, the funeral of Jeff Weise and three other victims was held. One other student was arrested on March 21 for allegedly having a gun. Authorities have not confirmed the arrest, but a police spokesman told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that 15-year-old Louis Jourdain, son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain, is charged with making terroristic threats. It is not yet known what sentence he will receive or whether he will be committed to a mental institution. A federal commitment process has begun.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: د مظاهرې ترتیب کوونکي وایي چې د آلمان په ښارونو کې یو لک را پا څیدلی لکه برلین berlin کولونcologne همبرکhamburg او هنورhanover په برلین berlin کې پولیسو 6،500 کسان اټکل کړي وه مظاهرې په پاریس ، سوفیا په بلغاریا کې د لیتوانیا په ويلنیوس vilniusکې د مالټاmalta په والیټا valettaکې د اسټونیاestonia په ټالین tallinnکې او د سکاټلینډscotland په اډنبر ګ edinburgh او ګلاسګو glasgow کې هم وشوي په لندن کې نږدې 200 کسانو د کاپی رایټ لرونکو د دفترونو بیرون مظاهره وکړه تیره میاشت، په پولينډ کي هغه وخت لوي لاریونونه پورته شول چي دغه هيواد اکټا لاس ليک کړه، کوم چي پولينډي حکومت ته دي پریکړه واک ورکړه چي اوس مهال تړون تايد ونکړي. لیتويا latviaاو سلواکېا slovakia دواړو د ای سی ټی ای ACTA سره د یو ځای کېدو پروسه معطل کړه
mt: 6,500 people were expected to protest in Berlin, Germany, like in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valletta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the Royal Courts of Justice. In Poland, large protests were held when the country signed the ACTA treaty, giving the Polish government the power to stop the treaty. Latvia and Slovakia both halted the process of joining the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "د آئي پاډز د ناوړه کارونې شاوخوا ۶۰ قضیې راپور شوي، په ټولیزه توګه د شپږ اور سوځیدنې لامل شوی او څلور کسان د کوچني سوځیدنې سره پریږدي. د جاپان د اقتصاد، سوداګري او صنعت وزیر (METI) وویل چې دا وسایلو پورې اړوند 27مه حادثه ده چې دۍ پرې خبرېږي. تېره اونۍ METI اعلان وکړل چې ایپل (Apple) د 34 نور حادثو د ګرمیدلو خبر ورکړ چې شرکت ""غیر جدي"" وګڼل. وزارت د ایپل د راپور ځنډولو په ځواب کې دا ""په ریښتیا سره مایوسه کوونکي"" وبلل."
mt: 60 incidents of improper use of the iPads have been reported, in total six fires have been caused and four people have been injured by small fires. The Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that this is the 27th incident that has been reported. Last week METI announced that Apple had reported 34 more incidents of overheating, which the company had deemed "not serious". The ministry called the Apple report "disappointing".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "د آئي پاډز د ناوړه کارونې شاوخوا ۶۰ قضیې راپور شوي، په ټولیزه توګه د شپږ اور سوځیدنې لامل شوی او څلور کسان د کوچني سوځیدنې سره پریږدي. د جاپان د اقتصاد، سوداګري او صنعت وزیر (METI) وویل چې دا وسایلو پورې اړوند 27مه حادثه ده چې دۍ پرې خبرېږي. تېره اونۍ METI اعلان وکړل چې ایپل (Apple) د 34 نور حادثو د ګرمیدلو خبر ورکړ چې شرکت ""غیر جدي"" وګڼل. وزارت د ایپل د راپور ځنډولو په ځواب کې دا ""په ریښتیا سره مایوسه کوونکي"" وبلل."
mt: 60 incidents of improper use of the iPads have been reported, in total six fires have been caused and four people have been injured by small fires. The Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that this is the 27th incident that has been reported. Last week METI announced that Apple had reported 34 more incidents of overheating, which the company had deemed "not serious". The ministry called the Apple report "disappointing".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone 4, saying "Today Apple reinvents the phone." He said, "Today, Apple reinvents the phone. Every year, the world's top carriers invest billions of dollars building out networks to deliver voice, data, and other services to their customers. But the network operators are not the only ones investing. Every year, consumers spend billions of dollars buying phones. But the phone companies don't make the phones. They just sell them. So, the phone companies are stuck in the middle. They have to invest billions to build out the network, and they have to sell the phones. And they have to do it all with a tiny profit margin.
