src: کارنو karno یو پیژندل شوي مګر متنازع د انګلیسی ژبی ښوونکې دي چا چې د عصری ښوونی او کنګ ګلوری king's Glory له مخی تدرېس کړي څوک چې دعوه کوي چې د خپل کېریر په اوج کې یې 9000 شا ګردان لرل هغه په خپل درسی ڼوټ کې دداسې کلمو څخه کار اخستی دي چې بعضی والدين یې بدي ګنی او د راپور له مخی هغه په ټولګی کې د مقدساتو توهین نه هم کار اخستی عصری هغه په دي تورنو چې په بسونو باندي یې بغیر د رسمی اجازی لوي اعلانات لګولی او په هغې کې یې ځا ن دانګلیسی ژبی مشر لارښود ښوونکې اعلان کړي دي هغه مخکې هم د کاپي حق سرغړونې تورن شوی و، مګر چارج شوي نه وو۔ یو پخوانی زده کوونکې وويل چې هغه په ټولګی کې په غیر ادبی الفاظ کارولی او یې په درسی موادو کې د هلک او جلی د ملاقات کولو مهارتونه په باره کې ښوونی کړي، او داسې رويه یې کوله لکه د زده کوونکو ملګری وي
mt: A known but controversial English teacher, who claims to have taught 9,000 students, used words in her lesson plan that some parents found offensive, according to reports. She was also accused of using the name of a famous English teacher in an unauthorized advertisement, and of copyright infringement. A former student said she used vulgar language in class and taught students how to meet girls and boys in a way that was "like a friend of the students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: د فلپاینی پولیسو یو پخوانی کارکوونکی د فلپین په مرکز منیلا کی د سیاحانو یو بس تښتولی او سیل کوونکی یی یرغمل نیولی. رونالډو مینډوزا خپله M16 تفانچه پر سیاحینو باندې وډزوله. تر دې دمه څو برمته شوي کسان ژغورل شوي دي او د شپږو مړینه تأیید شوي ده. د ماشومانو او لویانو په شمول شپږ یرغمل شوي وختي خوشې شول، لکه د فیلپینو عکاسانو عکاسانو وروسته د هغې عمرخوړلي زړې ښځې ځای ونیو کومې چې lavatory ته اړتیا لیده. مندوزا په مرمۍ لګیدلې وه.
mt: A former police officer hijacked a bus full of tourists in the Philippine capital Manila and took hostages. Ronald Mendosa fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. So far, several injured have been rescued and six deaths have been confirmed. Six hostages, including children and adults, were released, including the elderly woman who was later found by the Philippine photographers who needed to use the lavatory. Mendosa was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: برازیل د ځمکې پر مخ تر ټولو لوي رومي کاتولیک هیواد دي ، او رومي کاتولیک کلیسا په مسلسل ډول په هیواد کې د هم جنس واده مخالفت کړي دي د برازیل ملي کانګرس ددې د قانونی کولو لپاره لس کاله بحث کړي. په دا رنګ ملکې ودونه یوازې په ریو ګرانډی ډی سول rio grande do suR کې قانونی دي . د بل اصلی بڼه د ساو پاولو sao paulo د پخوانی ښاروال مارټا سپلیسی marta suplicy له خوا وړاندي شوي.وړانديز شوي قانون جوړونه وروسته د تعديل اوس د روبرټو چېفر سن roberto jefforsonپه لاس کې ده مظاهرېن امید کوي چې د 1.2 ملیون لاسلیکونه په یو قرارداد باندي راجمع کړي اوپه نومبر کې ملي کانګریس ته وسپاری
mt: Brazil is the most populous Roman Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed same-sex marriage. The national congress has debated the legalization of such unions for ten years. In Rio Grande do Sul, the only state where same-sex marriages are legal, the proposal was originally made by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposal was later amended by Roberto Jefferson, and the bill is expected to be signed by 1.2 million people in a petition and sent to the national congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "پنځه دقیقې نمایش ته پاتې وي چې د باد شور پیل شو، یوه دقیقه وروسته باد 70km/h ته ورسیدل . . . چې بیا باران پیل شول خو دومره تېز چې په مخ به لکه ستن لګیدل، ورپسې له آسمانه ږلۍ وریدل پیل شول، خلکو شور او غوغا پيل کړله او منډې یې هاخوا دیخوا پيل کړي. ما خپله خور او د هغې ملګری له لاسه ورکړ او زما په لاره کې دوه معزور درلودل، ""خلک یوازې ټوپونه او فشار راوړي،"" ارمند ورسیس وویل."
mt: "Five minutes before the show started, a wind storm began, one minute later the wind reached 70 km/h... then it started to rain, but not so fast that it would be like a stampede, then hail came down from the sky, people started to scream and shout and run in all directions. I lost my sister and her friend on the way, I had two elderly people with me, ""people just take their hats and run away,"" Armand Versois said.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: پيش بينى كوونكې واې چي توپان د کيپ وردي ټاپوګانو څخه په سمال کي645 ميلونه (1040 کلوميره) لرې دي، احتمال لري د ځمکو هر ډول سیمې ته له ګواښ وړاندې دمخه راښکته شي۔ فریډ اوس مهال په ساعت کې 105 میله (165 کیلومتره/ساعت) باد لري او شمال لوېدیځ ته حرکت کوي. فریډ ترټولو قوي د تودې سيمې طوفان دی چې د سپوږمکۍ انځورنې څخه راهیسې په اتلانټیک کې تر دې دمه تل په سویل او ختیځ کې ثبت شوی، او د ختیځ °W۳۵ په ریکارډ کې یوازې دریم لوی طوفان دی.
mt: Forecasters say the storm is expected to hit land anywhere from the Cape Verde Islands 645 miles (1040 kilometers) away, and could threaten any type of land. Fred is currently moving at 105 mph (165 kph) to the northwest. Fred is the strongest hurricane to form in the Atlantic since the satellite era began, and the third largest hurricane to form in the eastern Atlantic at 35 degrees west, according to records.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: د 802.11n معیار 2.4Ghz او 5.0Ghz فریکونسۍ په دواړو کار کوې۔ دا به دې ته اجازه ورکړي چې د 802.11a, 802.11b او 802.11g سره په مخالف جهت کې کار وکړي، په هغه صورت کې چې Base Station دوه رادیوګانې ولري. د ۸-۲.۱۱ n سرعت د دې د مخکینیو په پرتله د ۶۰۰ ميګابټ/سيکنډ ترټولو زیاته نظرياتي تېره شوې اندازه سره د پام وړ ګړندی دی.
mt: 802.11n uses both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies. This allows it to coexist with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g, in the case where a base station has two radios. 802.11n's theoretical maximum speed is significantly faster than the previous standards, up to 600 megabits per second.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: د المپیک د سرو زرو میډال ګټونکي د 100 مترو او 200 مترو تر منځ د آزادو لامبو او د کامنویلت لوبو په دریو ځلو تګ راتګ په پای کې ورکوي، خو د هغې د شکایتونو په پایله کې د هغه پر فټنس باندې شک دی. هغه نشول کولی چې اړینه دوا واخلي تر څو پرې خپل درد آرام کړي ځکه چې هغه پرې د لوبو څخه پرې منع شوی وو.
mt: 100 and 200 meter freestyle gold medalist, but was unable to take the necessary medication to ease his pain, as he was banned from using it during the competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: د متحده ایالاتو د جیولوجیکي سروي د زلزلو نړیواله نقشه ددې اوونی په پیل کې په ایسلینډ کې هیڅ زلزله نه ښایې د ایسلنیډ میتیو رو چېکل دفتر هم په هیکلاhekla ساحه کې د زلزلی فعالیت په اړه په تیرو اته څلویښتو ساعتونو کې کوم راپور نه دي ورکړي د زلزلی یو ډیراغیزمن فعالیت چې په نتیجه کې یې فیز چېنج منځ ته راغی د مارچ په 10 لسمه نیټه د کالډیرا caldira د اور غورڅونکې څوکې شما ل مشرقی خوا کې صورت ونیو تورې وريځې، چې د اتش فشان غر د فعاليت سره يې تړاو نه لرلو، د غر په لمنه کې راپور شوي وې. ورېځو د وار خطا يۍ لپاره امکان وړاندې کړ چې ایا په ریښتیا سره چاودنه شوی ده.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's Global Earthquake Map showed no earthquakes in Iceland as of the start of this day. The Icelandic Meteorological Office has not reported any seismic activity in the Hekla area in the past eight hours. A major earthquake occurred on March 10, 2010, in the Caldera of the active volcano, which is not related to the eruption. Reports were made in the area of the mountain. The possibility of a real explosion was raised.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: د متحده ایالاتو د جیولوجیکي سروي د زلزلو نړیواله نقشه ددې اوونی په پیل کې په ایسلینډ کې هیڅ زلزله نه ښایې د ایسلنیډ میتیو رو چېکل دفتر هم په هیکلاhekla ساحه کې د زلزلی فعالیت په اړه په تیرو اته څلویښتو ساعتونو کې کوم راپور نه دي ورکړي د زلزلی یو ډیراغیزمن فعالیت چې په نتیجه کې یې فیز چېنج منځ ته راغی د مارچ په 10 لسمه نیټه د کالډیرا caldira د اور غورڅونکې څوکې شما ل مشرقی خوا کې صورت ونیو تورې وريځې، چې د اتش فشان غر د فعاليت سره يې تړاو نه لرلو، د غر په لمنه کې راپور شوي وې. ورېځو د وار خطا يۍ لپاره امکان وړاندې کړ چې ایا په ریښتیا سره چاودنه شوی ده.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's Global Earthquake Map showed no earthquakes in Iceland as of the start of this day. The Icelandic Meteorological Office has not reported any seismic activity in the Hekla area in the past eight hours. A major earthquake occurred on March 10, 2010, in the Caldera of the active volcano, which is not related to the eruption. Reports were made in the area of the mountain. The possibility of a real explosion was raised.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: بې پیلوټه شمسی سیاره چندرېان -1 خپله سپوږمکۍ پلټنیز اوزار moon impact probe (MIP) پریښوده . چې د سپوږمی د سطحی نه په یوه ثانیه کې 1.5 کېلومتره (3000) میله په سرعت سره تاويده او په بریالۍ توګه یې د سپوږمۍ په مشرقی نقطه کې ځان وغورځاوه ددې په خوا کې چې درې مهم ساینسي اوزار یې لیږدول ، شمسی پلټنیز اوزار په هرې خوا د هند د بیرغ رنګ شوي انځور هم لیږدولو.
mt: The unmanned probe, called the moon impact probe (MIP), was ejected from the orbiter at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 mph) and successfully flew around the moon's eastern limb, carrying with it three scientific instruments and a flag of India, colored in the national colors of saffron, green and white.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: د مرض په اړه ددې فصل لومړنۍ پیښې د جولای د میاشتې په آخره کې راپور کړل شوې. دا مرض په خوګانو کې وي چې بیا انسانانو ته د ماشو په واسطه انتقالیږي د مرض خپریدا د هند حکومت اقداماتو ته اړ کړی لکه په ډیرو سختو ځپل شویو ځایونو کې د خوګانو نیونکي ګمارل، په زرهاوو پشخانو او د دوایانو شیندل. څو میلیونه د Incephalitis واکسینو وایلونه د حکومت لخوا هم تعهد شوي کوم چې به د صحت ادارې د راتلونکي کال لپاره آماده کولو کې مرسته وکړي. د واکسینو په اړه پلانونه چې په دې کال کې تر ټولو زیاتو ځپل شویو منطقو ته ورسول شي د نورو مرضوونو د لومړیتوبونو په نسبت او د پیسو د کمبود له امله وځنډیدل.
mt: The first reports of the disease were made in late July. The disease is in dogs, which are then transmitted to humans through their pups. The spread of the disease has forced the government to take measures such as hiring dog catchers in heavily infested areas, slaughtering millions of dogs and spraying insecticides. Millions of Incephalitis vaccines have also been committed by the government to help the health department prepare for the next year. Plans to vaccinate the most heavily infested areas this year have been delayed due to the priority of other diseases and a lack of funds.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: وړاندیز شوی تعدیل لا د مخکې په ۲۰۱۱ کې دواړه کورونه تصویب کړ. په دي قانون ساز مجلس کې تغیر راوستلی شو او دوهمه جمله یې حذف شوه اول د نماینده ګانو د مجلس له خوا او بیا په همدي بڼه د دوشنبی په ورځ د سنا مجلس له خوا نه د دوهمی جملی ناکامی چې د هم جنس ملکې اتحاديو باندي د بنديز وړانديز پکې و ممکن په راتلونکې کې ملکې اتحاديو ته لاره خلاصه کړي د پروسی په تعقیب ایچ چې آر -3- HJR به بیا څلی د راتلونکې انتخاب شوي قانون جوړونکو له خوا په 2015 یا هم 2016 کې وکتل شي تر څو په پروسه کې پاتی شي
mt: 2011 was expected to be the year both houses of Congress passed the bill. The bill was amended in the House of Representatives and the second sentence was removed, then passed by the Senate on Monday without the second sentence, which would have banned same-sex marriage, could pave the way for the Supreme Court to rule on the constitutionality of the Defense of Marriage Act in the future. The bill will be sent back to the House of Representatives for a vote, where it will be sent to the House Judiciary Committee for review in 2015 or 2016 to be considered by the bill's authors.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """پانامه کاغذ"" د یوې اندازی سره د لس ملیونو اسنادود هغه اسنادو یو مجموعي نوم ده چې د پانامه “Panama هیواد د موسک فونیسکا Mossack Fonesca دار الوکالی حقوقي دفتر څخه د کال 2016 په سپرلی کې د رسنیو ته خپاره شو اسنادو وښودله چې څوارلس بانکونو د شتمنو پیرودونکو سره مرسته کړې چې د ملیاردونو ډالرو مال پټ کړی ترڅو د مالیې او نورو مقرراتو نه ډډه وکړي. برطانوي اخبار د ګارډین وایي چې ډوچ بانک Deutsche Bank شا وخوا د 1200 شيل کمپنیو څخه درېمه برخه په کنترول کې لرله چې دا کار سر ته ورسوي په نړیواله سطحه مظاهرې روانی وي ، معددو څارنوالانو ،او د آیس لینډ Ice land او پاکستان د حکومت لوړ پوړو چارواکو دواړو استعفا ګانی ورکړي"
mt: """Panama Papers""" is a collection of 11.5 million leaked documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were published by media in April 2016. The documents show how 12 major banks helped clients launder money and dodge sanctions. The Guardian reports that Deutsche Bank had a hand in 1,200 companies, or 30 percent of the total, that were involved in suspicious transactions. The revelations have led to the resignation of the Icelandic prime minister, the Pakistani prime minister's chief of staff, and the Panama-based law firm that helped clients hide their money.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: په ایران کې هوایي حادثې عامې دي کوم چې زړې الوتکې لري او د مدني او پوځي عملیاتو لپاره ډیر بد حالت کې ساتل شوي. د بین المللي محدودیتونو معنی داده چې نوې الوتکې پیرل کیدای نشي. ددی اوونی په پیل کی د پولیسود هیلی کاپتر یوی حادثی د دری کسان وژلی او دری نور ټپیان کړی وه تیره میاشت ایران وويل چي په تيرو کلونو کې يې خپل خورا خراب هوایی ناورین ولیدو کله چي يوه الوتکه چي د ارمينيا په لور روانه وه، راوغورځېده، او 168 کسان پکي سپاره و۔ په ورته میاشت کې یوه بله هوایي الوتکه په مشهد کې په رن وې وښوېده او په دیوال سره يې ټکر وخوړو چې په پایله کې یې اولس تنه ووژل شول.
mt: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has a large fleet of old aircraft and poorly maintained military and civilian aircraft. International sanctions mean that new aircraft cannot be purchased. In the early days of the year, the police said that a helicopter crash killed three people and injured three others. In the same month, an aircraft crashed in Mashhad and collided with a wall, killing 15 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: د عراق څیړنیزه ډله به نن په 12 بجو خپل راپور وړاندی کړی. دا ګوتڅنډنه کوي چې هیڅوک دا تضمین نشوي ورکولای چې په دې وخت کې هر رنګه کړنه په عراق کې د ډلییزې جکړې، زیاتیدونکي تاوتریخوالي او یا مشکلاتو طرف ته د ورتلو مخنیوی وکړي. دا راپور د امریکا په متحده ایالاتو کې د منځني ختیځ لپاره د پالیسۍ په اړه د یو نظر د رامنځته کیدو او خلاص بحث لپاره د غوښتنې سره شروع کیږي. دا راپور د عراق په اړه د اوسنۍ پالیسۍ له اړخه په هر اړخیزه ډول مهم دی او په عاجله ډول د هدف د تغیر غوښتنه کوي. ددې لومړني 78 وړاندیزونه دادې چې نوی سیاسي قدم باید ددې کال تر ختمیدو مخکې واخیستل شي چې د عراق پولې د مداخلو څخه خوندي او د ګاونډیانو سره یې سیاسي اړیکې بیرته رامنځته شي.
mt: The Iraqi Study Group will release its report on Monday at 12:00 pm. This report is skeptical that anyone can guarantee that any of the three options of increased sectarian violence, increased violence or increased problems will be prevented in Iraq. This report is a call for a new policy towards the Middle East and a debate on the current policy towards Iraq. This report is important in all aspects of the current policy towards Iraq and calls for a change in the current policy. The first 78 recommendations are that new political steps should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from interference and to reestablish political relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: د عراق څیړنیزه ډله به نن په 12 بجو خپل راپور وړاندی کړی. دا ګوتڅنډنه کوي چې هیڅوک دا تضمین نشوي ورکولای چې په دې وخت کې هر رنګه کړنه په عراق کې د ډلییزې جکړې، زیاتیدونکي تاوتریخوالي او یا مشکلاتو طرف ته د ورتلو مخنیوی وکړي. دا راپور د امریکا په متحده ایالاتو کې د منځني ختیځ لپاره د پالیسۍ په اړه د یو نظر د رامنځته کیدو او خلاص بحث لپاره د غوښتنې سره شروع کیږي. دا راپور د عراق په اړه د اوسنۍ پالیسۍ له اړخه په هر اړخیزه ډول مهم دی او په عاجله ډول د هدف د تغیر غوښتنه کوي. ددې لومړني 78 وړاندیزونه دادې چې نوی سیاسي قدم باید ددې کال تر ختمیدو مخکې واخیستل شي چې د عراق پولې د مداخلو څخه خوندي او د ګاونډیانو سره یې سیاسي اړیکې بیرته رامنځته شي.
mt: The Iraqi Study Group will release its report on Monday at 12:00 pm. This report is skeptical that anyone can guarantee that any of the three options of increased sectarian violence, increased violence or increased problems will be prevented in Iraq. This report is a call for a new policy towards the Middle East and a debate on the current policy towards Iraq. This report is important in all aspects of the current policy towards Iraq and calls for a change in the current policy. The first 78 recommendations are that new political steps should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from interference and to reestablish political relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "د انسا () له قوله ""پولیس د څو لوړو مواردو څخه په اندیښنه کې دي، ویرېږي چې یو د ځای پر سر جنګ ترې جوړ نه شي"" پولیس وویل چې Lo Piccolo لومړۍ خبره کوله ځکه چې هغه په Palermo کې د Provenzano ښۍ لاس سړی وو او د هغه د زیاتې تجربې له امله یې پخوانیو مشرانو زیات احترام کول ځکه هغه د پرووینزانو پالیسي تعقیبوله چې له مخې یې د امکان تر حده ټیټ پاتېدلو سره په ضمن کې په قدرت کې د خپلې شبکې د زیات قوت لامل شي. د مشرانو د پرووزانو لخوا ساتل شوي و۔ کله چې هغه په برخلاف 1992په کال کې د هغه دولت پر ضد د ریینا تر مشرۍ لاندې جګړې ته د پای ټکی کېښود چې د مافیا صلیبي یرغلګرو جیواني فالکن او پاولو بورسیلوو ژوند یې واخیست۔ """
mt: "According to the police, they are concerned that a local war will break out. The police said that Lo Piccolo was the first to speak because he was Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and was highly respected by the former bosses because he followed Provenzano's policy of keeping his network as strong as possible while keeping it as low-profile as possible. He was kept safe by the bosses of the Provenzano faction. When he went against the government in 1992 under the leadership of the Mafia's crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, he was killed."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: جاپانی جوډوکا هیټوشي سایټو judoka hitoshi saitoد اولمپک د سرو زرو مډال دوه څل ګټونکې د 54 کالو په عمر ومړ د مړینی سبب د ځیګر سرطان یا Intrahepatic Bile Duct Cancer وپیژندل شو . هغه د سه شنبې په ورځ په اوساکا ښار کې ومړ. پخوانی د اولمپیک او نړیوال اتل، سیتو د خپل مرګ پر مهال د ټول جاپان د جودو فدراسیون د روزنې د کمیتې مشر هم و.
mt: 54-year-old judoka Hitoshi Saito, a two-time Olympic silver medalist, died of liver cancer or Intrahepatic Bile Duct Cancer. He died on Monday in Osaka. The former Olympic and world champion, Saito was also the chairman of the committee for the training of the entire Japan Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: د هغه د سفر په جریان کې، Lwasaki په ډیرو حالاتو کې مشکل سره مخامخ شو هغه سمندري غلو وشوکولو، په Tibet کې ورباندې قهریدلي سپۍ خمله وکړه، په Nepal کې د واده وتښتید او په هند کې ونیول شو.
mt: During his journey, Lwasaki encountered many difficulties, including being attacked by sea gulls, chased by angry yaks in Tibet, being jilted at the altar in Nepal, and being arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella پخپل موټر ډیر کنټرول لري او د ځغاستې له پیلیدو ډیر زر یې پایته رسوي. د هغه د ډلې غړی Fernando Alonos تر ډیره په ځغاسته کې مخکښ و خو موټر ته ددمې لپاره تر ودریدو وروسته پاتې شو شاید د راسته لاسته مخکیني ټیر په بده توګه نصبیدلو له وجې. مایکل شماخر خپله ځغاستلوبه د الونوسو نه ډیر ژر وروسته د ځغاستې په جریان کې په ډیرو جګړو کې د اوښتي زیان له وجې پایته ورسوله
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella is in control of his car and finishes the race in the lead. Fernando Alonso was leading the race but his car broke down after a pit stop, perhaps due to a poorly installed tire. Michael Schumacher finished the race in the lead after a series of crashes due to damage to his car.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: په تیرو درې میاشتو کښې, اتیا نیول شوي کسان د توقیف مرکز څخه بغیر د کومي دوسیې او تور څخه خوشي کړي شوي دي سږ کال د اپریل په میاشت کې قاضی ګلین یو موقت ریسټینینګ ارډر restaining order اجرا کړ چې له مخی یې توقیف ته امر شوي چې هغه کسان خوشي کړي چې د نیول کېدو د وخت څخه یې 24 ساعتونو څخه زیات وخت شوي دي .او د محکمی کمیشنر له خوا محکمی ته نه دي غوښتل شوي کمیشنر ازادي ورکوي . که چېرته ازادي ورکړل شوه ، او په رسمی ډول د حراست افسر له خوا لږیدلی تو رونه ناکام شي ، بیا تورونه د ریاستی کمپیوټر سیستم ته اچول کېږی او دهغه ځای څخه بیا د دوسیې تعقیب کېږی اوریدنه هم د شکمن سمدستي محاکمې حق لپاره نیټه په نښه کوي.
mt: In the last three months, 18 people have been released from detention without any charges or warrants. In April, Judge Gleen issued a temporary restraining order that required detention to release those who had been held for more than 24 hours. The commissioner has not been asked to issue a warrant for release. If released, and the officer's little note is unsuccessful, the charges are entered into the state computer system and the case is pursued from there. The note also serves as a reminder for speedy trial rights.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: لودین دا هم وویل چې چارواکو پریکړه وکړه چې ټاکنې منسوخ کړي ترڅو د نورو ټاکنو لګښت او د امنیتي خطر څخه افغانان خوندي کړي. ډیپلوماټان وایې چې دوی د افغانستان په اساسي قانون کې کافي شکونه پیداکړي دي تر څو ترې دا غیرضروري برخې لرې کړي. دا د مخکېنی راپورونو سره په تناقض کې دي چې ويلی یې وي د رن افrunoff لغو کول به د اساسی قانون څخه خلاف وي
mt: Lodin also said that the government decided to cancel the elections in order to save the cost of further elections and to protect the Afghan people from security risks. Diplomats said they had enough doubts in the Afghan constitution to remove the unnecessary parts from it. This contradicts earlier reports that said that canceling the runoff would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: په 1947 کې د برطانیې څخه د ازادي د تر لاسه کولو نه را په ديخوا پاکستان د مرکز د کنترول لاندې قبایلی علاقو کې ولسمشر یو سیاسی نږدې خپلواک استازی مقرر کړي چې په ساحه باندې کنټرول وساتي دا استازی مکف دي چې دولتي او عدلی خدمات د پاکستان د اساسی قانون 247 قانونی مادي له مخې وړاندي کړي
mt: 1947, the British independence of Pakistan under the control of the center of the tribal areas of the president appointed a political close to the independent envoy to control the area, the envoy is a state and judicial services under the Pakistan Constitution 247 material law
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: فلم چې Ryan Gosling او Emma Stone پکې کار کړې د ټولو مهمو کتګوریو لپاره کاندید شوی ګوسلنګ او سټون پّه ترتیب سره د غوره ممثل او غوره ممثلې لپاره کاندیدان ټاکل شوي. نورې نوماندۍ عبارت دي له غوره انځور، لارښود، سینیماتوګرافي، د جامي ډیزان، د فلم ترتیبول،اصلي شمیرې، د تولید ډیزاین، د غږ ترتیبول، د غږ مخلوطول او اصلي سکرینپلی. د فیلم د ازمایښت دوه سندرې (The fools who dream) او (City of Stars) د غوره اصلي سندرې لپاره نوماندۍ لاسته راوړه. د Lionsgate Studio د نورو ستودیوګانو په پرتله زیاتې 26 نوماندۍ لاسته راوړې.
mt: Gosling and Stone are both nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress. Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Production Design, Sound Mixing, Sound Editing, Original Score, Original Screenplay, Original Song ("The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars"), and Visual Effects. Lionsgate has the most nominations of any studio with 26.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: فلم چې Ryan Gosling او Emma Stone پکې کار کړې د ټولو مهمو کتګوریو لپاره کاندید شوی ګوسلنګ او سټون پّه ترتیب سره د غوره ممثل او غوره ممثلې لپاره کاندیدان ټاکل شوي. نورې نوماندۍ عبارت دي له غوره انځور، لارښود، سینیماتوګرافي، د جامي ډیزان، د فلم ترتیبول،اصلي شمیرې، د تولید ډیزاین، د غږ ترتیبول، د غږ مخلوطول او اصلي سکرینپلی. د فیلم د ازمایښت دوه سندرې (The fools who dream) او (City of Stars) د غوره اصلي سندرې لپاره نوماندۍ لاسته راوړه. د Lionsgate Studio د نورو ستودیوګانو په پرتله زیاتې 26 نوماندۍ لاسته راوړې.
mt: Gosling and Stone are both nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress. Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Production Design, Sound Mixing, Sound Editing, Original Score, Original Screenplay, Original Song ("The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars"), and Visual Effects. Lionsgate has the most nominations of any studio with 26.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK همدارنګه راپور ورکوي چې په Niigata ریاست کې واقع د Kashiwazaki Kariwa هستوي کارخانه په نورمال ډول فعالیت کوي. د هوکوریکو بریښنا کمپنۍ راپور ورکړل چې د زلزلې له امله هیڅ زیان نلري خو د شیکا اتومي بټۍ کې لومړۍ او دویم شمیره ریاکټوره بند شوي وو. داسې راپورونه ورکول کیږي چې په دې سیمه کې 9400 کورونه اوبه او نږدې 100 بریښنا نلري. ځینې سړکونه خراب شوي دي او په متاثره شوي ځایونو کې د ریل پټلۍ تخریب شوي دي او په ایشیکاوا (Ishikawa) کي د نوټو (Noto) هوايي میدان د ریاست اداره بنده وه.
mt: NHK also reports that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear plant in Niigata Prefecture is operating normally.  The Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported that the first and second units of the Shika atomic power plant were shut down due to the earthquake.  It is reported that 9,400 homes are without water and nearly 100,000 are without power.  Some roads are damaged and rail tracks are destroyed in affected areas and the Ishikawa (Ishikawa) Noto airport is closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: دې سند ته د لیک له مخې باید د پولو د جنجال لپاره مراجعه وشي، کوم چې فلسطین د 1967 د منځني جنګ څخه وړاندې د پولو لپاره اساس غواړي. د راپورونو له مخې، په نورو پوښل شويو موضوعاتو کې د بیت المقدس راتلونکی وضعيت، چې د دواړو هیوادونو لپاره يو مقدس ځای دی، او د اردن وادۍ مسله شامله ده. اسرائیل غواړي چې یو ځل تړون لاسلیک شي، په دره کې لس کلن پوځي شتون ولري خو د عامه اړیکو دفتر یا PA د پنځو کلونو د حضور په اړه توافق لري.
mt: The text of the letter should be referred to the dispute over the borders, which the Palestinians want to base on the pre-1967 borders. The report includes other disputed issues, such as the future of Jerusalem, which is a holy place for both countries, and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel wants a one-time agreement, a ten-year military presence in the valley, but the public relations office or PA agrees on a five-year presence.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "په هانګ کانګ کې زیږیدلی ، ماستری یې د نیو یارک د پوهنتون د هاورد د قانون د مکتب څخه کړي. یو وخت کې یې د امریکا د دایمی اوسیدو ""green card اسناد لرل Hsieh د ټاکنو پر وخت یوې نقطې ته اشاره وکړله چې ډیر امکان شته چې Ma د بحران په وخت کې له وطن څخه وتښتي. هسیه هم ټينګار وکړ چې د خوش شکل ما د اصل په نسبت ښه ډول لري. ددې تورونو به شتون کې ام ایMA په دي بریالی شو چې د خپلو دلایلو او وکالت سره د چېن د وچې سره نږدې اړیکې ولري"
mt: "Born in Hong Kong, educated at Howard University School of Law, Hsieh once held a green card in the United States. Hsieh also pointed out that the original Ma is better looking than the original. With his legal and lobbying skills, Ma was able to establish close ties with the aridness of China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: وروسته ددې چې معلومه شوه چې یو شمیر کورنۍ ددې لپاره چې د کورونو څخه و یستلو سره مبارزی لپاره د قانونی مرستی په لټه کې دي . د مارچ په 20 نیټه د ایسټ بی په ټولنیز قانونی مرکز کې د کورونو د جعل ښکار شوي خلکو لپاره غونډه را وبلل شوه کله چې کرایه دارانوهغه څه چې ددوي سره شوي وه شریک کړل . اکثرو کورنۍو چې په دي ښکېل وي پوه شوي چې د او ایج ای کېرولن ويلسنOHA caroline welson ددوي پیشګی ورکړل شوي پیسی غلا کړي دي او د ښار څخه تښتیدلی دي د لاک وډ ګارډن کرایه دار په دي باور دي چې 40 نوری کورنۍ داسې دي چې کېدای شي چې د خپلو کورونو څخه وويستل شي. ځکه چې دوي ته خبر شوي چې د او ایچ ای OHAپولیس په اکلند oacklandکې نور د کورونو څمکو په اړه پلټنی کوي چې ګمان کېږی چې د کورونو د جعل ښکار شوي دي
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center in Oakland to help people who have been evicted from their homes. Many people who were affected by the OHA Oakland Housing Authority's eviction of 40 families were present. They were told that the Oakland Police Department was investigating other suspected fraudulent evictions in the area.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: د ریس په تعقیب ، کیسلوسکي د موټر چلوونکو پاتې کیدل، د ۲،۲۵۰ پوائنټونو سره د چامپين شپ مشر. جانسن johnson د 2،243 نمرو به لرلو سره دوهم دي چې 7 نمری شاته دي په درېم مقام کې ، هیملن hamlin شل نمری شاته دي ، مګر د بوير کېنbowyer kahneاو ټریوکس treuxڅخه پنځه نمری مخکې دي . دواړه بوير کېن bowyer kahne او ټریوکسtreux په پنځم او شپږم مقام کې 2,220 او نمرو 2,207 په لرلو سره په ځپل ځای دي سټيوارټ، ګورډن، کینسنت، او هارویک د موټر چلوونکو اتلولۍ لپاره په لسو غوره پوستونو کې څلور سیالۍ لري
mt: 1. In pursuit of the leader, Kesselowski leads the motorcyclists with 2,250 points. Johnson is second with 2,243 points, seven points behind. In third place, Hamlin is nine points behind, but Bowyer Kahne and Treux are five points ahead. Both Bowyer Kahne and Treux are in fifth and sixth place with 2,220 and 2,207 points, respectively. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick have four contenders for the motorcyclists' championship in the top ten.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: دا په تاریخ کې پنځم ځل ګڼل کيږي چې خلکو هغه څه لیدلي چې په کیمیاوي توګه تایید شوي د مریخ مواد وو چې په ځمکه راغوځار شوي ول. شاوخوا د ۲۴،۰۰۰ پیژندل شوي اسماني کاڼي ځمکې ته راغورځیدلي، یوازې ۳۴ شاوخوا یې په اصل کې اسماني کاڼي تایید شويدي . د تیر جولای میاشت د اسمانی ډبرو د ورښتmeteorite shower څخه پنځلس ډبری منسوب شوي دي یوه اندازه ډبری چې د څمکې پر مخ نه موندل کېږی . یو اونس یې د 11،000 ‌ډالرو څخه تر 22،500 ډالرو پورې پلورل کېږی . چې دا د سرو زرو د قیمت څخه لس واری لوړ قیمت دي
mt: This is the fourth time that people have seen what are believed to be Martian meteorites on Earth. About 24,000 meteorites have been identified as having come from space, only 34 of which have been confirmed as Martian meteorites. A shower of meteorites in July 2004 was attributed to 16 meteorites, one of which was estimated to be worth between $11,000 and $22,500, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: شوماکر څوک چې په ۲۰۰۶ کال کې د فارمول ۱ جام اتلولي اوه ځله ترلاسه کولو وروسته تقاعد وکړ، د ټپي فیلپ مسره ځای په ځای کولو لپاره و. برازیلیان د ۲۰۰۹ ګرانډ هنګري پراکس پرمهال د یوې پیښې نه وروسته د سر سخت ټپي شو. ماسا massaبه لږ تر لږه د 2009 کال د ټول سیزن څخه بیرون وي
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Kimi Raikkonen retired after winning eight races in 2006. Brazilian Felipe Massa was seriously injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa missed at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

mt: 2006 Formula One champion Kimi Raikkonen retired after winning eight races in 2006. Brazilian Felipe Massa was seriously injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa missed at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: تر اوسه ای او ایل AOL په دي توانیدلی چې په امریکه کې د خپل پراخه خپور استعمال به سبب په خپل وړتیا او رفتار آی امIM مارکېټ جوړ او حرکت ورکړي . ددې انتظام سره چې دوام کوي ، دا ازادي ممکن پای ته ورسیږی د یاهو د استعمالوونکو او مایکرسافت د استعمالوونکو جمع به وکولای شي چې د ای او ایل د شمیری سره مقا بله وکړي
mt: AOL has been able to maintain its market share in the U.S. despite the growth of IM services such as Yahoo and Microsoft. With this continued growth, the combined user base of AOL and Yahoo could challenge Microsoft's market share.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: پرون سهار د ترکی د Gaziantep د پولیسو مرکز د یوه موټر بم په واسطه والوزول شو چی دوه د پولیسو افسران یی ووژل او د شلو څخه زیات نور خلک یی ټپیان کړل د والي دفتر وایي چې د زخمیانو څخه نورلس د پولیس کارکوونکي دي. پولیسو وویل چې دوی شک لري چې تش په نامه داعش (ISIL) وسله وال د بريد پړه پر غاړه اخیستې ده.
mt: A car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning, killing two police officers and injuring dozens of others. The governor's office said that most of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect the attack was carried out by the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: د ماسوچېسټسپخوانی والی په فلوریډا کې بریا تر لاسه کړه د رپبلکن ګوند د مشرۍ اولنی مرحله ټاکنو کې د سه شنبی په ورځ 46 سلنو څخه زیاتو رایو باندي وګټله د متحده ایالاتو د مشرانو جرګې رییس نیوت ګینګریچ د 32 سلنې سره دوهم ځای کې راغلی. د ګټونکې په حیث ټول ایالتونه اخلی ، فلوریډا خپل ټول پنځوس استازی رومنی romney ته اعزازی ورکړل . ددې لپاره چې د ریپبلکن ګوند مشر او نوماند شي
mt: 46% of the votes in the first round of the Republican Party's presidential nomination, Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida primary on Tuesday. With 100% of precincts reporting, Romney had 46% of the vote, with Newt Gingrich at 32%. Romney won all 50 delegates from Florida. To become the Republican Party's nominee, Romney must win the majority of delegates from the state primaries and caucuses.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "د کانګرس میرمنې Michele Bachmann په ترتیب سره په څلورم، پنځم او شپږم ځای کې ختمه کړه. څرنګه چې پایلې راغلې، Gingrich د Santorum ستاینه وکړه خو د Romney لپاره یې سختې کلمې وکارولې د چا په نمایندګۍ چې په لووا کې د Gingrich پر ضد د کمپاین منفي اعلانونه خپاره شوي و. پیری ووئيل چې هغه به ""د نن شپې د مجلس پایلې ارزولو لپاره ټیکساس ته په واپسي راستون شي، معلومه کړئ چې آیا پدې سیالۍ کې زما لپاره مخکې لاره شتون لري "".مګر وروسته وویل چې هغه به پدې سیالۍ کې پاتې شي او د جنوري ۲۱ په جنوبي کارولینا لومړني کې سیالي وکړي. باکمن چا چې په آګست کې د Ames Straw نظر غوښتنه ګټلې وه، پریکړه وکړه چې خپل کمپاین پایته ورسوي."
mt: "Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth and sixth place. As the results came in, Gingrich praised Santorum but attacked Romney harshly, in the wake of negative ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would return to Texas to assess the results of the caucus and "see if there's a path forward for me." He later said he would stay in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "د سټیشن ویبپاڼه دا خپرونه د "" ښوونځې زوړ تیاتر سره د نوي او بد اخلاقه، بې خونده دوکې "" په شان تشریح کوي په لومړیو ورځو کې خپرونه یواځې د اوږد مهاله چلیدونکې د انترنیت رادیو په پاڼه Toginet رادیو کې مطرح کیده چې دا یوه پاڼه وه چې د راډیوي خبرو باندې یې تمرکز درلود. د2015 کال په پای کې TogiNet د AstroNet Radio د خپل فرعي سټیشن په ټوګه تأسیس کړ په خپروني کي اصل د شوقيانو اداکارانو غږ وړاندي شو، کومي چي د ټيکساس مقامي اوسيدونکي وي۔"
mt: "The station's website describes the show as "a new and improved, unscripted, unedited, and uncensored" version of the old school theater of the radio. In its early days, the show was only available on the long-running Internet radio station Toginet Radio, which was a page that focused on radio news. In late 2015, TogiNet launched AstroNet Radio as a substation of Toginet, and original voice actors were added, who are based in Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: د ممبۍ حمله کوونکې د کښتی د لارې د 2008 د نومبر په 26 نیټه رارسیدلی و . چې له ځان سره ګرنیټونه او اتومات وسلی راوړی وي . چې په متعددو هدفونو یې د چتر پتی شيوا چې chatar pati shivaji د اور ګاډی په تمځاې او مشهور تاج محل هوټل په ګډون باندي یې حملی وکړي د ډیود هیډلې ګرڅیدو او معلوماتو را ټولولو دپاکستانی عسکری ګروپ لشکر طیبه د لس ټوپک لرونکو سره مرسته وکړه چې دا عملیات تر سره کړي دي حملی د پاکستان او هند تر منځ په اړیکو ډیر لوي منفی تاثیر وکړ
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attacks began when 10 members of Lashkar-e-Taiba, a Pakistan-based terrorist group, sailed from Karachi, Pakistan to Mumbai and attacked Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus, the Taj Hotel, the Leopold Cafe, the Nariman House, the Oberoi Hotel, and the Chabad House, killing 164 people and wounding at least 308 others. The attacks ended on 29 November 2008, after Indian security forces cleared Chabad House and the Taj Hotel of terrorists. The attacks were coordinated by a group based in Pakistan and carried out by 10 men, including members of Lashkar-e-Taiba, a Pakistan-based terrorist group. The attackers killed 164 people and wounded at least 308 others. The attackers killed 164 people and wounded at least 308 others. The attacks were coordinated by a group based in Pakistan and carried out by 10 men
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "د نډال Nadal د کاناډایانو په خلاف سر په سر ریکارډ 2-7 دي هغه په دې وروستیو کې په Brisbane Open کې د Raonic پر وړاندې وبایلله. نډال Nadal په 76 ګټنیز و نمرو کې 88٪ نومرې په اولنۍ برخه کې لاس ته راوړل د لوبې نه وروسته کنګ اف کلی King of Clay وويل "" زه یواځی دي ته لیواله یمه چې په لويو مقابلو کې اخری مرحلو ته بیرته راوګرځیدمه . زه دلته ددې لپاره یم چې کوښښ وکړم چې دي کې بریالی شم."""
mt: "Nadal beat Raonic 7-6 (7-5) in Brisbane last week. Nadal said after the match, "I'm just happy to be back in the big time. I'm here to try to win.""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: "د نډال Nadal د کاناډایانو په خلاف سر په سر ریکارډ 2-7 دي هغه په دې وروستیو کې په Brisbane Open کې د Raonic پر وړاندې وبایلله. نډال Nadal په 76 ګټنیز و نمرو کې 88٪ نومرې په اولنۍ برخه کې لاس ته راوړل د لوبې نه وروسته کنګ اف کلی King of Clay وويل "" زه یواځی دي ته لیواله یمه چې په لويو مقابلو کې اخری مرحلو ته بیرته راوګرځیدمه . زه دلته ددې لپاره یم چې کوښښ وکړم چې دي کې بریالی شم."""
mt: "Nadal beat Raonic 7-6 (7-5) in Brisbane last week. Nadal said after the match, "I'm just happy to be back in the big time. I'm here to try to win.""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: تیره اوونی ښکاره خبر ددې خبری اعلان وکړ چې ډرامایې ډول به د درې نوي خپرونو سره د نړیوالو ژبو راپور ورکولو مقرری زیاته کړي ګلوبل ارګنایزیشن د مخکې نه په جاپانی او انګلیسی ژبو راپور ورکوي اوس د هسپانوي ، ایټالوي او کوریایې ژبو پروګرامونه د تلويزیون ، انټر نیټ او موبایل ماشينونو لپاره پیل کوي،
mt: 2010 will see the addition of three new languages to the Global Organization's news reports, which are currently in Japanese and English. The organization will now offer programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "د چهارشنبې له واقعې وروسته، کارپنډو د قهرمانۍ مسابقو په دوه جلا ځغاستو کې سیالي وکړله. د هغې لومړۍ سلالوم وو، له کوم ځایه چې ""خپله لومړۍ منډه یې پوره نکړله"" ترلاسه کړ. د 116 ګډون کوونکو څخه یې 36 کسانو همدا پایله ولیدله. د هغې بلې ریس، جینټ سلالم، هغې په لسم پړاو کې د ښځینه ناستې ډلې کې د ۴:۴۱.۳۰ of ګډ ځنډ سره ویني، ۲:۱۱.۶۰ دقیقې د لومړي ځای فینشیر آسټریا کلاډیا لوشچ څخه ورو او ۱:۰۹.۰۲ دقیقې د هنګري د نهم ځای پایونکی ګیانګی داني په پرتله سست. څلور اسکي بازان د ښځو له ګروپ څخه ونتوانید خپلې ځغاستې پوره کړي. او په ګیانټ سلالوم کې د ټولو 117 څخه 45 اسکي بازانو د مقام په ترلاسه کیدلو ونتوانیدل."
mt: "After the Wednesday's race, the men's races were split into two separate heats. The first heat was won by the one who didn't finish the first lap. Of the 116 competitors, 36 failed to finish. The second heat, the giant slalom, was won by Austrian Claudia Loshch in 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes ahead of the first place finisher, and 1:09.02 minutes ahead of the ninth place finisher, Hungarian Giani Danyi. Four skiers failed to finish the women's race. In the giant slalom, of the 117 competitors, 45 failed to finish."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: د څلورنی په ورځ، د امریکا د باسکټ بال اتحادیه خپل مسلکې برخه د کوويد 19 د ملاحظاتو په سبب معطل کړ د این بی ای NBA پریکړه د یوټا د چېز د یو لوبغاړی د کوويد 19 وایرس معاینه د مثبت کېدو تعقیب کې وشوه
mt: 4/1/2020, The NBA suspended its season after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the coronavirus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: د نن ورځې غوره لوبغاړی د واشنګټن کیپیټلز ، Alex Ovechkin دي. هغه د واشنګټن پر Atlanta Thrashers د 5-3 برتري کې دوه ګولونه او دوه کومکونه درلودل. د اويچکن ovechken د شپې لومړۍ مرسته د روکې نکلاس بیک سټورم rookie nicklas backstorm لوبه کټونکې هدف لپاره وه د شپې دوهم ګول د هغه ددې موسم شپېتم ګول وه . ددې سره هغه د لومړۍ لوبغاړی شو چې 1995-96 کال را په ديخوا یې په یو سیزن کې شپېته 60 یا د هغې څخه زیات ګولونه کړي وي . کله چې چېرومیر جګرjaromir jagr او میری لیمیکس Mario lemieux دواړه دي هدف ته رسیدلی دي
mt: Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals was named the NHL's first star of the day. He had two goals and two assists in a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. His first assist was on rookie Nicklas Backstrom's first NHL goal. His second goal was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 goals in a season since 1995-96. Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux are the only other players to have done so.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: د ناردرن راک بینک northern rock bank په 2008 کې قومی شو وروسته د هغې چې ښکاره شوه چې کمپنی د برطانوي حکومت څخه عاجله مرسته تر لاسه کړي ده Northern Rock په 2007 کال کې د مشکل لرونکو ګرویو یا Subprime Mortgage د بحران سره د مخامخ کیدو له وجې د ملاتړ غوښتنه کړې. د سر رچرډ برینسنsir richard branson ورجن ګروپ دبانک د قومی کېدلو نه مخکې د بانک لپاره داوطلبي وراندي کړي و چې ونه منل شو په 2010 کې د قومي کېدو نه وروسته اوسنی های سټریټ بینک ناردن راک پی ایل سی د خراب بانک ناردرن راک ایسیټ منجمنټ څخه بیل شو. باکرو یواځې د شمالي راک 'ښه بانک' وپیرل، نه د کمپنۍ د ادارې دارایي.
mt: 2008, the bank was nationalized after it was revealed that the company had received emergency support from the British government. Northern Rock was hit by the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had previously offered to buy the bank before it was nationalized in 2010. The current owner of the bank, Northern Rock plc, was formerly known as Northern Rock (Asset Management) plc. The bank was known as "good bank" not the company's management.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: د رودز فیصله چې د کېوټو kyotoد اقلیم په باره کې معاهده لاسلیک کړي، دا متحده ایالات انزوا کوي چې او س به دا یواځنی پرمختللی هیواد وي چې دا معاهده نه منی د استرالیا پخوانی محافظه کار حکومت د کېوټو معاهده په دي خاطر رد کړي وه چې ويل یې دا به زمونړ اقتصاد چې ډیر د ډبرو د سکرو د صادراتو باندي ولار دي زیان ورسوي . دا په داسې حال کې ده چې چېن او هند د هوا د ککړتیا د اندازی د بنديز بابند نه دي
mt: The Kyoto Protocol is a 1997 treaty that commits signatory countries to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. The United States is the only developed country that has not signed the treaty. Australia's former conservative government rejected the Kyoto Protocol on the grounds that it would harm the economy, which is heavily reliant on coal exports. This is despite China and India not being bound by the treaty's emissions limits.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: د اضافې آفاتو د مخنیوي لپاره د نښه ویشتونکو د کنټرول ازمایښت د رینجرز له لورې له نږدې څخه څارل کیږي، ځکه د ازمایښت کنټرول او اغیرمنتوب یې ارزیابي شو. د NPWS او د آسټرالیا د ورزشي نښه ویشتونکو سازمان (NSW) په شراکت کې، د ورزشي نښه ویشتونکو انجمن د ښکار پروګرام لاندې وړ داوطلب کسان استخدام شول. د میک او قلین له قوله د پارک او میراثي څیزونو د ساتنې سرپرست رییس د NPWS سره، څلور نښه ویشتونکي د لومړۍ نښه ویشتلو او د جامع ساتنې او تربیوي لارښوونو په عملیاتو کې انتخاب کړل.
mt: The control of the trial is being closely monitored by rangers, as the trial's control and effectiveness is being evaluated. In partnership with the NSW Parks and Wildlife Service, the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia has employed volunteer shooters under the Sporting Shooters Program. According to the Director of the NSW National Parks and Wildlife Service, four shooters were selected for the first shoot and for operations in the comprehensive protection and training guidelines.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: """د دې فوسیل پراساس، پدې معنی چې تفرقه د مولیکولر شواهدو له مخې وړاندوینه کې ډیره وه. ددې معنی داده چې هر څه باید پخوانی حالت ته راوستل شي، دا خبره یو محقق د ریفټ ويلی د تحقیقی خدماتو په ایتیوپیا کې او د تحقیق مرستیال لیکونکې برهین افساوberhane asfaw کړي"
mt: """Based on the fossil, the split was much more recent than expected. Everything should be pushed back to the original state, a researcher said in Ethiopia and co-author Berhane Asfaw wrote.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: د پنجشنبې په ورځ د توکیو د لوبې خپرونې مهم پرزنتیشن کې، Nintendo President Satoru Lwata د شرکت د Nintendo Revolution Console لپاره کنترولر ډیزان ښکاره کړ. لکه د تلویزون د ریموټ په شان، کنټرولر هم دوه سنسرونه استعمالوي چې د تلویزون سره نږدې نصب شوي تر څو خپل موقعیت په درې بعدي فضا کې درې زاویوي کړي. دا به لوبغاړو ته په ویډیویي لوبو کې د آلې د هوا په مرسته حرکت پر مټ د کړنو او حرکتونو د کنټرول اجازه ورکړي.
mt: At the Tokyo Game Show's important press conference on Monday, Nintendo President Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's Nintendo Revolution console. Like a TV remote, the controller uses two sensors that are mounted close to the TV to track its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control video games with the motion of their hands, allowing for more realistic movements and actions.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: مخکې چینایي خبري شبکې Xinhua خبر ورکړی چې الوتکه به یرغمل کیږي. وروسته راپورونو د الوتکې وینا وکړه چې د بم ګواښ یې ترلاسه شو او بیرته افغاسنتان ته ستون شوه په کندهاره کې ناسته وکړه. لومړني راپورونه وایي چې چې په ارقومي کې د اضطراري ناستې د اجازه نه ورکول کیدو وروسته طیاره بیرته افغانستان ته ستنه شوې ده.
mt: Earlier Chinese news agency Xinhua reported the plane was shot down. Later reports said the plane was hit by a bomb and returned to Afghanistan. Initial reports said the plane was denied an emergency landing in Arqam.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "د دوشنبې په ورځ Sara Danius په سویدني اکادمۍ کې د ادبیاتو لپاره د نوبل کمیتې دایمې سکرترې په سویدن کې د Sveriges Radio د رادیو پروګرام له لارې عام اعلان وکړ چې کمیتې ددې له وجې چې په مستقیم ډول په ادبیاتو کې د کال 2016 د نوبل جایزې د ګټلو په اړه Bob Dylan ته رسیدلو کې پاتې راغلي، هغې ته د رسیدلو په پار خپل کوښښونه درولي دي. دانیوس وویل "" اوسمهال موږ څه نه کوو. ما د هغه ډیر نژدې ملګري ته تلیفونونه او ایمیلونه کړي او د هغې څخه مې ډیر دوستانه ځوابونه ترلاسه کړي، د اوس لپاره دا په ښکاره ډول کافي ده"""
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy of Letters in Sweden, announced on the Swedish Radio program that the committee, which is still waiting for Bob Dylan to accept the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016, has stopped trying to reach him. Danius said, "We are doing nothing now. I have called and emailed his close friends and received very friendly responses, for now that is enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "د امریکا د متحده آیالاتو ولسمشر George W.Bush د اعلان څخه هرکلی کړی د بوش ویاند Gordon Johdroe د شمالي کوریا تعهد ته وویل ""دا د کوریايي جزیرو د غیراتومي کولو هدف پر وړاندې یو مهم قدم وو."""
mt: "President George W. Bush has rejected a North Korean demand for a declaration of its nuclear programs, saying it would be a "major step" toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "په 1956 کې Slania سویدن ته ولاړ چې درې کاله وروسته یې هلته په سویدش پوستخانه کې دنده شروع کړه او د هغوۍ مشر حکاک شو هغه د د سویډن او نورو 28 هیوادونو لپاره له 1000 زیات مهرونه تولید کړل د هغه کار تر دې پورې د منل شوي کیفیت او تفصیل دي چې هغه یو هغه یو څو تمبر شناسو یا Philatelists د نومونو څخه دی. بعضې یواځې د هغې د کارونو د راټولولو کې ځانګرتیا لري. د هغه زرم سټامپ په 2000 کال کې د ستاینې وړ "" Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" د David Klocker Enrenstrahl لخوا و چې د ګینس په نړیوال ریکارډونو په کتاب کې ثبت دی هغه ډیرو هیوادونو ته د بانکنوټونو په حکاکي کولو کې هم مصروف و، د هغې د کار په اوسنیو مثالونو کې د کاناډا د 100 او 5 دالري نوټونو پر مخ باندې د صدر اعظم انځورونه شامل دي."
mt: 1956 Slania moved to Sweden, where he started working at the Swedish Post Office three years later and became its chief engraver. He produced stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is still considered the standard of quality and detail, and he is one of the most famous stamp collectors or Philatelists. Some are only interested in collecting his work. His stamp was in 2000 the "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klocker Enrenstrahl, which is recorded in the Guinness World Records book. He was also busy engraving banknotes for many countries, including the portraits of the Prime Minister on the front of the Canadian $100 and $5 bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: د ټرانس الاسکا د ۸۰۰ میلونو د پایپ لاین سیسټم د الاسکا په جنوب کې د فییربانکس سویل د زرګونو بیرلو خامو تیلو بهیدلو وروسته وتړل شو. د بریښنا ناکامي د ورځني اور-کمانډ سیسټم ازموینې تعقيب کولو ریليف والونه خلاص کړل او خام تیل د فورټ ګریلي پمپ سټیشن 9 ته نږدې راووتل. د والونو پرانستل د سیسټم لپاره د فشار خوشي کول او تیل په یوه پیډ کې یو ټانک ته بهیدو ته اجازه ورکړه چې ۵۵،۰۰۰ بیرل (۲.۳ ملیون ګیلنه) ساتلی شي. د چهارشنبې تر ماسپښین پورې، د ټانک درزونو غالپاً د ټانک دننه د تودوخي پراختیا څخه لوس هم څڅیدو. د ټانګونو لاندې یوه بله ثانوي ساحه چې د 104,500 بیرل ساتلو ظرفیت لري تر دې مهاله نه وه ډکه شوي.
mt: 8,000-mile Trans-Alaska pipeline system in southern Alaska was shut down after a fireball erupted in the pipeline following a lightning strike. Relief valves opened and crude oil flowed to a pump station 9 miles (14 km) south of Fort Greely. Valves were closed to allow pressure to build and oil to be pumped into a tank holding 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons) of crude. By midday, the tank was being cooled to prevent further expansion of the oil. A second secondary tank, with a capacity to hold 104,500 barrels, had not yet been filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: د امریکا د متحده آیالاتو د انجینرانو ټولی تخمین کړی چې شپږ انچه باران کولای شي له وړاندې نه تخریب شوی بند ماتولای شي. نهم وارډ، کوم چې د طوفان کټرینا په مهال د ۲۰ فوټو پورې لوړ سیلاب لیدلی، دا مهال په کمر کې لوړې اوبو کې دی لکه څنګه چې نزدې بدن ډیر ژور شوی و. اوبه په تنګي کې په یوه برخه کې ۱۰۰ فوټه پلنو کې تیریږي.
mt: 6 inches of rain could be enough to wash away the previous flood-damaged levee, the ninth ward, which was hit by Hurricane Katrina with 20 feet of flooding, is now in the high water mark, as the nearby body of water is much deeper. The water is flowing through a channel in one place that is 100 feet wide.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: هاملتن تائید کړه چې د هاورد د پوهنتون روغتون ناروغ په ثابت وضعیت کې داخل کړی. مریض نایجیریا ته تللی و چیرته چې د Ebola ویروس ځینې پیښې واقع شوې وې شفاخانه د سرایت کنټرول لپاره وسایل لري چې په دې کې مریضان له نورو خلکو څخه جلا ساتي تر څو د نورو خلکو د مرض د سرایت څخه ممانعت وکړي.
mt: Hambleton confirmed that the patient at Howard University Hospital was admitted in stable condition. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where some Ebola virus cases had occurred. The hospital has equipment to control the spread of the disease, which keeps patients separate from other people to prevent the spread of the disease to others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: لکۍ داره ستوري ځمکې ته او د عضوي اشیاو ته د اوبو لیږلو سرچینه وي چې پروټین جوړوي او ژوند ته مرسته ورکوي. ساینسپوهان هیله لري چې وپوهېږي سیارې څه ډول جوړې شوي دي، په ځانګړي ډول د ځمکې جوړښت په اړه. ځکه چې ډیر پخوا ځمکه د لکۍ داره ستورو سره ټکر شوي وه.
mt: The origin of life on Earth and the origin of organic compounds on Earth are closely related. Scientists hope to learn how planets are formed, especially the formation of the Earth. Because the Earth collided with a planet with a tail long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: په داسې حال کې چې اداری د خطر په اړه یقینی نه دي د میری لینډ maryland ټرانسپورټ اداری د ایف بی ای FBIپه هڅونه بنديز کړي دي د تونلونو د داخلي لارو د بندولو په خاطر د ټرکونو او اتیا پولیسو منتظره کومک کارول شوي و چې موټر چلونکي نورو لارو ته واړوي. د ښار په متبادله لار او د لوي سرکونو غاړو باندي د ترافیک د ډیر وخت لپاره د بنديدو کوم راپور نه دي تر لاسه شوي
mt: In the meantime, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnel's inner roadways to traffic and called in state troopers and Maryland State Police to help direct motorists to alternate routes. No reports of traffic backups on the city's beltway or major roads have been received.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "انځورګر د Ronal Reagan UCLA طبې مرکز ته انتقال شو چیرته چې بالاخره هغه ومړ. هغه د راپور له مخې 20 کلن و. په یوه بیان کې Bieber وویل؛ ""چې زه په مستقیم یا غیر مستقیم ډول په دې غمجنه پیښه کې شامل نه یم، زما فکرونه او دعاګانې د قرباني د کورنۍ سره دي"". د Entertainment News ویبپاڼه TMZ پوهیږي چې انځورګر ځبل موټر د Sepulveda سړک هغه طرف ته ودروو او د سرک څخه د تیریدلو مخکې یې کوښښ وکړ چې د پولیس د تمځای عکس واخلي او دوام ورکوي، د کلیفورنیا د لوی سرک ګرځیدونکی پولیس چارواکی چې د ترافیکي پولیس تمځای کې کارکوي دې ته یې اړ کړ چې دوه ځله د بیرته تګ حکم ورته وکړي. د پولیسو مطابق امکان نلري چې هغه موټر چلوونکی چې انځورګر یې وهلي د جرمي سزا سره مخ شي."
mt: "The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center where he eventually died. He was reportedly 20 years old. In a statement, Bieber said, "While I was not at the scene of this tragic accident, my prayers and thoughts go out to the family of the victim, as well as his friends and colleagues." Entertainment news site TMZ reports that the photographer was driving a motorcycle on Sepulveda Boulevard when he attempted to turn around and take a picture of the police stop, but was struck by a car. The CHP officer who works at the traffic stop told him to turn around twice. Police say it is unlikely that the driver of the car that struck the photographer will face criminal charges."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "صدارتی وزیر روډریګو اریاسrodrigo arias وويل : چې اریاس د وایرس په یوه معمولي قضیې په یوه ټسټ کې مثبت راغلی د جمهور ریېس حالت اوس متوازن دی ، داسې فکر کېږی چې هغه به په کور کې د څو ورځو لپاره قرنطین وي ""د تبې او ستوني درد سربیره، زه د تلیفون مخابراتو له لارې خپل کار سرته رسولو لپاره ښه او ښه وضعیت احساس کوم. اریاس arias په یو بیان کې ويلی دي : زه تمه لرم چې ددوشنبی په ورځ په خپلو ټولو کارونو ته را وګرځم"
mt: "Vice President Rodrigo Duterte said that he tested positive for the coronavirus in a routine case in a test. The president's condition is stable, he is expected to be quarantined at home for a few days." In addition to fever and cough, I feel good and good in my work through telephone communications. In a statement, Duterte said he expected to return to all his work on Monday.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."
