src: اعتدال سره الکول څښاکونه وڅښئ.الکول هرڅوک په مختلف ډول اغیزه کوي، او د خپل حد پیژندل خورا مهم دي. د شرابو د زياتو څښلو له کبله د اوږدې مودې په ممکنه روغتیایی پیښو کې د ځيګر زیان او حتی ړوندتیا او مرګ شامل کيدې شي. احتمالي خطر ډیريږي کله چې په غیرقانوني ډول تولید شوي الکوهل استعمال کړئ.احتمالي خطر ډیريږي کله چې په غیرقانوني ډول تولید شوي الکوهل استعمال کړئ. غیر قانوي سپریټ مختلف ډوله خطرناک ګډ شوي شيان لري د میتانول په شمول کوم چې د ړنديدو او مرګ سبب کېدلای شي تر که په لږه اندازه هم وکارول شي
mt: 1. Drink in moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limits is important. Possible health risks include liver damage and even death from excessive drinking. Risks increase when drinking illegally produced alcohol, which may contain methanol, which can cause blindness and death even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: د کانال ولسوالۍ (ډچ: ګرينټن ګورډل) د امستردام د بينن سټډ شاوخوا 17 پیړۍ مشهوره ولسوالۍ ده. ټوله ولسوالۍ د نادره کلتوري او تاریخي ارزښت له وجې د یونیسکو د نړیوال میراث د ساحې په توګه ټاکل شوې او د ملکیت ارزښتونه یې د هیواد په کچه تر ټولو لوړ دی
mt: 17th century district of the city of Amsterdam, famous for its rare cultural and historical value, has been designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site and its property values are the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom، کوم چي د Siem Reap په شمال مغرب کي 12 کلوميتره پوري شتون لرې۔ دا د غونډۍ ټاپو معبد د 9 همي پیړۍ په پای کې، د پاچا یاسوارمان د واکمنۍ پرمهال جوړ شوی و۔ د معبد نسبتا تیاره اتموسفیر او د ټونل سیپ جهیل ننداری لپاره غونډی ته ختل د وخت اود زیار ارزښت لري دي ځاته ته تګ کولای شو جهیل ته د کښتی د یو مناسب سفر سره یوځای کړو د انګکور اجازتنامه معبد ته دداخلیدو لپاره لازمي ده نو کله چې د Tonle Sap په طرف ځې ځان سره د پاسپورت راوړل مه هیروه.
mt: 12 kilometers north-west of Phnom Krom, the temple was built in the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The temple has a relatively dark atmosphere and a visit to the Tonle Sap canal is worth the trip with a suitable boat trip. A Tonle Sap permit is required to enter the temple, so when you are heading towards Tonle Sap, don't forget to bring your passport with you.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: انتراکتیکا د ځمکې پر مخ تر ټولو یخ ځای دی او د جنوبي قطب څخه را چاپیر دی. د چکر وهونکو تګ راتګ ډیر قیمتي دی، د فزیکي روغتیا تقاضا کوي او یواځې د اوړي کې نومبر څخه تر فرورۍ پورې) کیدای شي او تر ډیره د ټاپو وزمو، جزیرو او راس سیند پورې محدود دي. په اوړې کې په څلورو درجن اډو کې اکثره په دې سیمو کې یو څو زره کارمندان دلته ژوند کوي؛ یو لږ شمیر په ژمي کې پاتې کیږئ۔ د انتراکتیکا داخلي برخه یو خالي میدان دی چې له دوه څخه تر دریو کلومیترو پورې په یخ پوښل شوې. د هوا غیر عادي مسلکي سیلانیان د غر ختنې او یا قطب ته د رسیدو لپاره چیرته چې لوی اساس وجود لري، دننه ځي.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest, driest, and windiest continent and is known as the "top of the world." Circumnavigation is expensive, physically demanding, and requires special health precautions. It can only be visited in the summer (November through March) and is limited to a few dozen research stations, most of which are located along the coast. The interior of Antarctica is a vast ice desert with no permanent inhabitants. Professional adventurers who want to climb mountains or reach the South Pole must go where there is a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: وړاندې له مدرن له وختونو د ستورو کتنځایونه اوس عموماً متروک دي، او د میوزیمونو یا د زدکړېځایونو په شکل پاته دي. ځکه چې د دوی د اوج په وختونو کې د رڼا کثافت د نن هومره ستونزه نه وه، نو دا عموما ښارونو یا کامپسونو کې دي، چې مدرنو وختونو کې جوړو هغو په پرتله ورتلل اسانتره دي. د څیړنې عصري ټیلیسکوپونه په وروسته پاتې ساحو کې بې شمېره آسانتیاوې د غوره موسمي حالاتو سره رامنځته کړي دي.
mt: Before modern times, observatories were generally abandoned, and are now mostly in museums or educational institutions.  Because light pollution was not as much of a problem in the times of their peak, they were generally in cities or camps, which are easier to build in modern times.  Modern telescopes have been built in many remote areas, taking advantage of better weather conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: دا چې آکلېنډ په دوو سمندري بندرونو پروت دی نو ډېر ساحلونه لري. تر ټولو مشهور په درو سیمو کې دي. د شمالي سمندری ساحل (په شمالي هاربر ولسوالۍ کې) د آرام سمندر په غاړه دي او د شمال له لونګ بي څخه په سویل کې ډیونپورټ پورې غځیدلی دی۔ دا تقریباً ټول شګلن ساحلونه دي چې لامبویه پکې خوندي ده، او اکثرو کې د پوهوتوکاوه بوټي سیوري وي. د Tamaki Drive ساحلونه د Waitemata Harbour باندې واقع دي، د Mission Bay او په مرکزي آکلیند د St Heliers په پورته پرتو اطرافو کې. دا ځیني وختونه د سمند په غاړه د پلورنځیو یو ښه لړئ سره د ګڼې ګوڼې کورنۍ ساحلونه دي. لامبو وهل خوندي ده.
mt: Because Auckland is on two harbours, it has many beaches. The most famous are in the North Shore (in the North Harbour) and stretch from North Head down to Devonport in the south. These are mostly sheltered beaches, and many have pohutukawa trees. The beaches on Tamaki Drive are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the suburbs of Mission Bay and central Auckland, and St Heliers. These are sometimes a good place to go shopping with the family, and swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: مهرباني وکړئ په یاد ولرئ چې تاسو په حقیقت کې د یو ډله ییز قبر ځای ته ورغلي یاست، چې هم داسې ځای دی چې د نړۍ د پام وړ یوې برخه لپاره تقریبا د نه کېدونکې اندازې معنا لري. اوس هم ګڼ شمېر سړي او ښځې شته چې هلته خپل وخت کې ژوندي پاتې شوي و، او ډېر شته چې ګران خپلوان يې هلته وژل شوي ول یا په کار کار يې مرګ ته رسولي ول، چې دواړه یهودیان او غېریهودیان پکې شامل و. مهرباني وکړئ دغه ځای ته ټول وقار، شرف او احترام ورکړئ چې حق يې لري. د هولوکاسټ یا نازیانو په اړه ټوکې مه کوئ. ځای په ساختمانونو باندې د نښانونو یا د نقاشي کولو پواسطه مه بدرنګه کوۍ.
mt: Please remember that you are standing on the site of an event which is, to millions of people, of the same significance as the events of September 11, 2001.  It is a site which is sacred to Jews and non-Jews alike.  Treat it with respect, reverence, and dignity.  Do not speak ill of the Holocaust or the Nazis.  Do not deface the buildings with graffiti or other markings.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: کومکي ژبې مصنوعي یا جوړې شوې ژبې دي چې د خلکو ترمنځ د اړیکو د ترسره کیدو لپاره د اسانتیاوو د برابرولو په هدف جوړې شوي چې ددې نه بغیر به دا خلک په اړیکو درلودلو کې مشکل ولري دوی د عامه ژبو څخه جلا دي، کومې چې طبیعي یا اساسي ژبې دي چې د يو لامل يا بل لامل له کبله د نورو ژبو ویونکو ترمنځ د خبرو اترو د وسيلې په توګه غالب شوې.
mt: Artificial or constructed languages are created for the purpose of facilitating communication among people who would otherwise have difficulty doing so, and are distinct from natural or naturalistic languages, which are dominant for some reason or another.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: که په ژمي که په شمالي بالتیک تېرېږئ، د کېبن ځای وګورئ، ځکه چې د واورې دپاسه تلنه د تر ټولو زیاتو اغېزمن کېدونکو لپاره سخت بد شور جوړوي. د Siant Petersburg په سمندري سفرونو کې د ښار وخت هم شامل دی. د سمندري سفرونو مسافرو لپاره د ویزې شرطونه معاف دي (شرایط وګورئ)
mt: If you're traveling to the Baltic states in winter, look for the sign "Icebreaker," because the most popular tours are the most difficult. The city time is included in the sea cruises. The visa requirements for cruise passengers are waived (see conditions)
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: د بارسلونا رسمي ژبې کېټالان او اسپانوي دي. نږدې نیمايي خلک کېټالان وېلو تر لومړیتوب ورکوي، یو پراخ اکثریت پرې پوهیږي، او عملاً هر څوک په اسپانوئ پوهیږي. لیکن، اکثره نښانونه یواځې په Catalan ژبه ښودل کیږي دا ځکه چې د قانون له مخې دا لومړۍ رسمي ژبه ده. بیا هم، هسپانوي ژبه په دولتي ترانسپورت او نورو اسانتیاو کې په پراخه کچه استعمالیږي. په مټرو کې عام اعلانونه په کېټالان کې کیږي، خو غېرمتوقع خللونو په اړه د خپکاره سسټم له لارې د ژبو پراخې تنوع، په شمول د اسپانوي، انګرېزي، فرانسوي، عربي او جاپاني، کې اعلانونه کیږي.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Most people speak Catalan as their first language, most people understand it, and practically everyone speaks Spanish. However, most signs are only in Catalan, because it is the first official language by law. Nevertheless, Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other facilities. In the metro, announcements are made in Catalan, but unexpected announcements are made in the multilingual system, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: په 2022 که به د چېن بیجنګ ښار د ژمنی اولمپک لوبو کوربه وي ، چې دي سره به اولنی ښار شي چې د دوبی او ژمی دواړه اولمپکونو کوربه شوي وي بیجنګ به د يخ د انډور لوبو د پرانیستلو او پای مراسمو کوربه وي. نور د سکې لوبې به په تایزیچېنګ د سکې منطقه کې وي چې د بیچنګ نه دوه سوه شل کېلو متره (140میله) لري دي
mt: 2022 will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics, and Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies of the Winter Games. Other events will be held in the ski resort of Taiyuan, 200 kilometers (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: سکاندیناوي خلکو یا Vikings د روسیې د اوبو لارې تور سمندر او کاسپین سمندر ته درسیدو لپاره استعمالولې. ددې لارو بعضې برخې تر اوسه استعمالیدای شي. د ممکنو ځانکړو اجازتنامو په اړه څیړنه وکړه کوم چې په مشکله لاسته راوړل کیدای شي. د سپینې بحیرې–د اونګا جھیل، لاډوګا جهیل او سینټ پیټرزبرګ له لارې، ډیری د سیندونو او جهيلونو په واسطه بالتیک کانال د آرټیک بحر سمندر د بالتیک بحیرې سره وصل کوي. اونيګا جهيل له هم وولگا سره وصل دی، نو د روسیې له لارې د کسپین سمندر څخه راوتل لاهم امکان لري۔
mt: The Vikings used the Russian waterways of the White Sea, the Barents Sea, and the Caspian Sea. Some of these routes are still in use. A study of possible unique routes found that the White Sea–Onega Lake, Ladoga Lake, and Saint Petersburg via the rivers and lakes, the Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea. Onega Lake is connected to the Volga, so a route from the Caspian Sea is also possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: د امګریشن چک پواینټ په عام طور لومړۍ د ودرېدو ځای وي چې کله تاسی د الوتکې، کښتۍ یا هم بل کومي سورلۍ نه راکوزیږۍ په ځینو د سرحد هغې خوا ته اورګاډو کې پلټنی په روان اورګاډی کې کېږی ، ته باید د اعتبار وړ د پېژندنی اسناد ولري کله چې ته داسې یو اوګاډی کې خیژی د شپې د ويده کېدو اورګاډو کې پاسپورټ کېدای شي چې د کنډکټر له جمع شي ددې په خاطر چې ستاسې خو ب کې مذاحمت ونه شي
mt: 1. Immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when entering a country, where you must show valid identification documents when boarding a plane, boat or other vessel, you may be required to show a passport when passing through customs at night, to avoid any problems with your stay.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "سنګاپور په عمومي توګه د اوسېدو لپاره خوندي ځای چې ګرځېدل پکې اسان دي، او رارسېدو نه پس تقریبا د هر څه د اخستلو اجازه شته. خو ځکه چې تاسې اوس ""زیات ګرمسېره"" ځای چې خط استوا څخه څو درجې شمال ته دی کې یئ نو مجبوره یاست چې دواړه ګرمي (چې تل به وي) او تېز لمر (چې د صفا اسمان په وخت به راځي، چې زیات نادر دی) سره لاس او ګرېوان شئ."
mt: "Singapore is generally a safe place to live, and after you settle in, you can get almost anything. But since you are in a "rather hot" place that is a few degrees north of the equator, you have to deal with both heat (which will always be there) and intense sun (which will come out when the sky is clear, which is rare)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: المانۍ پېسټرۍ کافي غوره دي، او په باوېریا کې، د دوی سوېلي ګاونډي اتریش یعني آسټریا ته ورته، تر کافي حده غني او مختلفې دي. د میوو پیستري عام دي، د مڼو سره چې د کال په اوږدو کې پیستري کې پخه شوي، او چیري او پلمه د دوبي په جریان کې خپل ظهور کوي. ډېر الماني بېکرۍ سامان کې بادام، فندقونه، او د نورو بوټو دانې اچول کیږي. مشهور کېکونه اکثره وخت د کافي یوې غښتلې پیالې سره ځانګړې ټوټ خوري. که تاسو غواړې یو څو وړې خو غني پېسټرۍ غواړئ، نو هغه یوې امتحان کړئ چې، سیمه کې يې نوم ته په نظر، برلنر، فانکوچېن یا کراپفن نومیږي.
mt: German pastries are generally excellent, and in Bavaria, their southern neighbor Austria, are rich and varied to a sufficient degree. Apple pastries are common, with plums that are pastries baked throughout the year, and where and green in the course of the summer. Many German biscuits are filled with almonds, hazelnuts, and other nuts. Famous cakes are often cut into a few large pieces with a fine cup. If you want a few small but rich pastries, try those with a name to look at, Berliner, Fanchon or Crappfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: که ته غواړی چې دنیا په کم قیمت وګوری د ارتیا په بنا ،د ژوند د طور طریقی په بنا یا د ننګونی په بنا ددې لپاره څه کړنلارې شته دي په اساسی ډول ،دوي په دوه کتګوریو کې اچول کېږی: یا خو کار کوه د سفر سره یوځای او یا کوښښ وکړه چې خپل لګښتونه کم کړي دا ارټیکل په وروستنی باندي تمرکز کوي د هغوي لپاره چې دارام قربانی ورکړي، وخت او وړاندوينه چې مصارف به لاندې صفر ته راولی ، باید د ټولو کمی بودچې سفر وګوری مشوره داسې انګیرل کوي چې سیلانیان غلا، تر پولې ورتېرېدل، په غیرقانوني بازار کې برخه اخیستل، سوال کول یا په بل ډول د خپلو ګټو لپاره نور خلک استحصال نه کوي.
mt: If you want to see the world on a budget, there are a few ways to go about it. They can be divided into two categories: either travel with a group or try to cut your costs. This article focuses on the latter, for those willing to make sacrifices, time and forethought that expenses will go below zero, should be all of the travelers' budget. The advice is to not steal, cross borders, participate in illegal markets, ask questions or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: په بفالو-پټسبرګ لویه لاره باندې د ګاډي چلونې لپاره تر ټولو زیات ننګونکې وضع د پواینټ ماریان او فېیرمانټ په منځ کې پرته اوږدې باندې شتون لري ځکه چې دا لاره بیا بیا شاته لرې او یواځې پرتو ځنګلي سیمو کې تېرېږي. که چیرې تاسي د هیواد په سړکونو کې د موټر چلولو عادی نه یاست، نو خپل ځانونه باید په اړه هوښیار وساتئ: پیچومي درجې، تنګي لاري، او تیره کږلکی پردې غالب دي. د خپور شوي سرعت محدودیتونه د تیرو او ورپسې برخو څخه د پام وړ ټیټ دي — په عمومي ډول ۴۰-۳۵ میل فی ساعت (۵۶-۶۴ کلومتره/سعت) — او د دوی په سختي سره اطاعت د له بل پلوه خورا مهم دی. عجبه دا چې دلته، په دې لارې نورو اوږدو لکه د پنسالوینیا وایلډ په پرتله، د موبایل سګنلې زیاتې غښتلې دي.
mt: The most dangerous stretch of road in the United States is the 32-mile (51 km) Point Marion–Fairmont section of the Pennsylvania Turnpike. It is dangerous because it is winding, narrow, and dark. Speed limits are much lower than in the preceding and following sections—typically 40–35 miles per hour (56–64 km/h)—and compliance with them is very important. This is because here, unlike in the longer stretches like the Pennsylvania Turnpike, cell phone signals are much stronger.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: کنیوېنګ (یا:کېنیونیرنګ) د درې بیخ ته د تلو څخه عبارت ده چې د درې لاندې ځای وچ دي او که هلته اوبه شته کېنیوېنګ د لمبلو، غره ته ختلو او د ټوپ وهلو عناصر را یوځای کوي مګر نورور لوبو په نسبت د لوبې د پیل لپاره د کم ټریننګ اويا هم فزیکې بڼی ته اړتیا لري د مثال په ډول راک کلایمبنګ،سکوبا ډاونګ او الپاین سکېنګ
mt: Canyoneering is the sport of descending canyons by a variety of means, including rappelling, climbing, jumping, and swimming. It is a combination of rock climbing, mountaineering, and canyoning. It is a relatively new sport, and is not as well known as rock climbing or mountaineering. It is a physically demanding sport, requiring a high level of fitness and skill. It is also a dangerous sport, with a high risk of injury or death. It is important to be well prepared and to have the necessary skills and equipment before attempting a canyoneering trip.
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: کنیوېنګ (یا:کېنیونیرنګ) د درې بیخ ته د تلو څخه عبارت ده چې د درې لاندې ځای وچ دي او که هلته اوبه شته کېنیوېنګ د لمبلو، غره ته ختلو او د ټوپ وهلو عناصر را یوځای کوي مګر نورور لوبو په نسبت د لوبې د پیل لپاره د کم ټریننګ اويا هم فزیکې بڼی ته اړتیا لري د مثال په ډول راک کلایمبنګ،سکوبا ډاونګ او الپاین سکېنګ
mt: Canyoneering is the sport of descending canyons by a variety of means, including rappelling, climbing, jumping, and swimming. It is a combination of rock climbing, mountaineering, and canyoning. It is a relatively new sport, and is not as well known as rock climbing or mountaineering. It is a physically demanding sport, requiring a high level of fitness and skill. It is also a dangerous sport, with a high risk of injury or death. It is important to be well prepared and to have the necessary skills and equipment before attempting a canyoneering trip.
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "په خپل موټر کې سوریدل او په یو اوږد سفر باندي وتل د خپلی سادګۍ سره یو بیل خوند لري د لوي عراده جاتو غوندي نه ،تاسی شاید د مخکې نه د خپل موټر چلولو سره بلد یاستۍ او د ټول محدوديتونه درته معلوم دي په شخصي ملکیت یا د هري اندازې په ښار کې د خیمو تنظیم کول په اسانۍ سره ناخوالې توجه راجلب کړي. خلاصه دا چې د سړک چکر لپاره خپل موټر غوره لار ده خو ندرتاً دا پخپله د ""کیمپ"" لاره ګرځي. د موټر کېمپنګ ممکن ده که چېرته تاسی یو غټ منیوېن، اسی یو وي،سیډان او یا سټیشن ويګن چې قت کېدونکې چوکۍ ولري"
mt: "In your car, you burn gas and go on a long trip with a pleasant smell, you may be familiar with the operation of your car and all the restrictions are known to you, setting up tents in personal property or in any city of any size can easily attract attention. In short, your car is the best way for a road trip, but it is rarely itself a "camp" route. Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, a large SUV, a station wagon with removable seats."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: د کاسابلانکا د جدید ښار مدربونه بربرو ماهیګرانو لخوا په 10مه پېړۍ قبل مسیح کې اېښودل شوي دي، او دا د فونیکسیانو، رومنیانو، او میریندیانو لخوا د انفا په نوم یوه ستراتیجیک بندر په توګه شوی و. پرتګالیانو دا راوپرځاوه او بیا يې د کاسا برانکا په نوم جوړ کړ، چې دوی هم په 1755 کې زلزلې نه وروسته پرېښود. مراکشي سلطان دا د دار البدایه په نوم بیا راجوړ کړ او ده ته د هغه اسپانوي تاجرانو لخوا چې هلته يې د تجارت اډې جوړې کړې وې د کاسابلانکا نوم ورکړ. کاسابلانکا یو له ترټولو په زړه پورې ځای دی چې په ټول مراکش کې پلورنځي لري. د مدینه په نوم د ښار زړې برخه کې داسې ځایونه شته چې دودیز مراکشي شیان، لکه طجینونه، خټین لوښي، د څرمنې شیان، چیلمونه، او د مختلفو جیګاوونو یو طیف، خرڅوي خو دا ټول د سېګرانو لپاره دي.
mt: The city was founded in the 10th century BC by the Phoenicians as a trading post. The city was later annexed by the Romans, who called it Anfa, and later by the Portuguese, who called it Cazaz (or Cascar) and who made it a fortress under the rule of King Manuel I of Portugal. The Sultan of Morocco, Moulay Ismail, later rebuilt the city as Dar al-Bayda, and it was renamed Casablanca by the Spanish traders who frequented the city. Casablanca is one of the most important cities in Morocco, and is the largest financial center and the economic capital of the country. The old medina is the oldest part of the city, and contains the oldest mosque in Casablanca, the Mosque of the Fishermen. The medina contains the souks, where traditional Moroccan goods are sold, and the Habous district, which was built in the 1930s by the French to house Moroccan immigrants from the countryside. The city is also home to the largest Jewish community in Morocco, and the city is home to the largest synagogue in the country.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: په شمال او خورا نږدې د سنترا رومانچیک او زړه راښکونکی ښارګوټی دی او چې د نواب بایرن د دی د زرق و برق یوه ځلیدونکي بیان سره بهرنیانو منځ کې مشهور کړ. سکوټرب بس 403 سنترا ته باقاعده ځي، چې په کابو دا روکا کې تم کیږي. هم د شمال خوا ته زموږ د مېرمن فاطمه عظیم مقدس حرم (مزار) دی، چې د ماریا روحاني ظهور لپاره ټوله نړۍ کې مشهور دی.
mt: 403 is a regular route to Centra, which is famous for its beauty and romance. It is also close to the North, where our lady Fatima is sacred, and is famous for the spiritual revelation of Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: په 1994 کي د آزربایجان ارمنیایی ناګورنو کاراباخ قومي منطقې د آزریس په خلاف جنګ وکړ د ارمنیایي ملاتړ له وجې یو نوی جمهوریت منځته راغی لیکن هیڅ یو منل شوي قوم حتی ارمنیا یې په رسمي ډول نه پیژني د منطقي په اړه ډیپلوماټیک بحثونه د ارمنستان او آذربایجان تر منځ اړیکې لپاره جاري دي.
mt: 1994 Nagorno-Karabakh War was fought by the Republic of Armenia and the Republic of Azerbaijan over the disputed territory of Nagorno-Karabakh. The war ended with a ceasefire in 1994, but the status of the region remains unresolved. The conflict has been described as a "frozen conflict" by some observers. The conflict has been described as a "frozen conflict" by some observers.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: د چیرولیت، شمالي کارولینا په اړه قوي خبره داده چې د کورنیو لپاره بې شمیره د ښه کیفیت انتخابونه لري د نورو ځایونو اوسیدونکي بعضې وختونه د کورنۍ سره دوستانه اړیکې د انتقال لپاره اساسي دلیل یادوي او زیارت کوونکي اکثره وخت ښار د خپلو ماشونو سره د وخت تیرولو لپاره راحته ویني. په تیرو شلو کلونو کې د ماشوم دوسته انتخابونو په شمالي چارولیت کې په تناسبي ډول وده کړې په عمومي ډول په چارولیت کې د تیکسي موټرې د کورنیو لخوا نه استعمالیږي خو په بعضوحالاتو کې د هغوی لخوا استعمالیدای شي. د دوه مسافرو څخه زیاتو په حالت کې اضافي مصرف وجود لري چې دا انتخاب شاید د ضرورت څخه زیات قیمتي وي
mt: Chirulit, North Carolina is known for its many family-friendly options. Some people cite the family-friendly atmosphere as a reason to move to the area, and many visitors come to the city to spend time with their families. In the last 60 years, family-friendly options in Chirulit have grown in a proportional manner. In general, taxis are not used by families in Chirulit, but in some cases they can be used. In cases where more than two passengers are involved, additional costs are incurred, which may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: مخکې لدې چې اسپانیا په ۱۶ پیړۍ کې راشي، شمالي چیلي د انکا د واکمنۍ پرمهال وه په داسې حال کې چې آراوکانييان (ماپوکي) مرکزي او سویلي چلي مېشته دي. Mapuche هم یو له هغو اخیري مستقلو امریکایی ځایي ډلو څخه دی چې د چیلي د استقلال پورې د هسپانوي خبرې کوونکي دولت کې په مکمل ډول جذب نشول. که څه هم چلی خپلواکې په 1810کې اعلان کړه ،(د کډوډونکې ناپلیونی جنګ کوم چې هسپانیه یې د کلونه د یو فعال حکومت څخه محرمه کړه) په هسپانیه باندي پریکنده بریا د 1818 پورې لاس ته رانغله
mt: Before Spain arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was part of the Inca Empire, while the Mapuche inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche are one of the few indigenous groups in the Americas that were not completely absorbed by the Spanish-speaking government of independent Chile during its independence in 1810 (after the Napoleonic Wars had left Spain without a functioning government for years). The war against Spain continued until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. src: سینک تیري د پنځو ځمکو په معنی دي چې د ایتالیوي منطقې لیګوریا د ریوماګیور، مانارولا، کارنګلیا، ورنازا او مونتروسو پنځو کوچنیو ساحلي کلیو څخه تشکیل شوې دوی د يونيسکو نړیوال میراث لیست کې درج شويدي . د پیړیو په جریان کې، خلکو په احتیاط سره په خراب، ګړنګ منظره د غونډی په سر چتونه جوړ کړي چې د بحر لیده کړي. ددې د زړه راښکلو یوه برخه د شرکتي پرمختګ د ظاهري بڼې کمښت دي. لارې، اورګاړي او کیښتۍ کلي سره نښلوي او موټرې د بهر څخه ورته رسیدای نشي
mt: 5 villages in the Italian region of Liguria, Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, make up the Cinque Terre. Over the centuries, people have carefully built houses on the cliffside, overlooking the sea. One of the most striking aspects of the Cinque Terre is the lack of development. Roads, cars and trains connect the villages to the outside world, but the villages themselves are isolated from the rest of the country. The Cinque Terre is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: په ژمي کې د حادثو تر ټولو عادي علت ښویه سړکونه، پیاده رو او په ځانګړي ډول سطحې دي. کم نه کم تاسې د مناسبو تلیو لرونکو بوټانو ته اړتیا لرئ. د اوړي بوټان په واوره او یخ باندې اکثره وخت ښویه وي او حتي ځینې د ژمي بوټان ناقص وي. دا لاره باید 5 ملی متره ( نیم انچ) یا زیات کافي ژور وي، او کافي نرم مواد په یخ حرارتي درجه کې. ځینې بوټان ګل میخونه لري او دلته د ښوينده حالاتو لپاره اضافي تجهیزات شتون لري، د ډیرو پیزارو او بوټانو، د پوندو یا پوندو او تلو لپاره مناسب دي. د بوټانو پوندې باید ټیټې او پلنې وي. شګه، چغل او مالګه ( کلسیم کلوراید) بعضې وختونه د لارو او سړکونو دپاسه د اصطکاک د زیاتیدو په خاطر شیندل کیږي.
mt: 1. In winter, the most common cause of accidents is slippery roads, sidewalks and especially surfaces. You need to have appropriate tires. Summer tires are often slippery on snow and ice, and some winter tires are not good. The road should be at least 5 millimeters (half an inch) or more thick, and enough soft material at ice temperature. Some tires have studs and here are additional equipment for good conditions, for example, for many snows and tires, for paws or paws. Tire pads should be low and thick. Salt, sand and lime (calcium chloride) are sometimes sprinkled on roads and sidewalks to reduce friction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: د کوک جزیری یو جزیروي هیواد دي چې د نوي زیلاند سره وړیا تړلی دي ، په پولینیزا کې موقعیت لري د جنوبی ارام سمندر په منځ کې واقع دي دا یوه د پنځلس جزایرو یو ګروپ دي چې په سمندرکې په 2.2 ملیونو کلومترو باندي خپور شوي دي د هاوايي په شان د وخت د ساحی لرلو سره په جزیزو هم کله د هوای لاندی ګڼل کیږی سره ددې چې وړوکې دي، دا د هوایي زړو ورتلونکو د ریاست کېدو نه مخکې ت هغه وخت ور یادوي چې دلته د تورزم لوي هوټلونه او نور پړمختګ نه و د کوک جزیری ښارونه نه لري مګر د پنځلس جزیرو څخه مرکب مختلف جزایر دي ، چې مهم یې راروټونګا او ایتوتاکې دي
mt: Cook Islands is a group of islands in the South Pacific, south of Hawaii. It is a self-governing territory of New Zealand. The islands are spread out over 2.2 million square kilometers. The time zone is the same as Hawaii, but the islands are small, so they are often referred to as being in the air. There are no large cities, no hotels, and no airports before the islands were discovered. The Cook Islands have no cities, but are made up of 15 islands, the most important of which are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: اړین ده چی جوازونه دمخه خوندي شي۔ په سرینا کې د شپې پاتې کیدو لپاره تاسو لپاره اجازه ساتل اړین دی۔ سیرینا یواځنی رینچر سټیشن دي چې د اوسیدو لپاره د لیلیې او ګرم خواړه د کېمپنګ لپاره لري. لا لیونا سانla leons san, پیډریلوpedrillo ، او لاس پا توس las patos یواځی د کمپنګ سهولت ورکوي بغیر د ډوډۍ د خدماتو نه دا ممکنه ده چې پارک ته ننوتلو امنیت په Puerto Jiménez کې د رینجر سټیشن له لارې یقیني کړ خو هغوی کریډټ کارټ نه قبلوي. د اټکل شوي راتګ دمخه یوه میاشت څخه ډیر د پارک خدمت (MINAE) د پارک جواز نه صادروي۔ کېفی نټ ایل سول د ساتلو خدمات د ديرشو30 ډالرو په مقابل کې وراندي کوي، یا هم د لسو ډالرو په مقابل کې د یوې ورځی پاسونه . تفصیلات د هغوي په کورکوواډو پاڼه باندي
mt: 1. It is important to keep your permits safe. In order to stay in Sirena, you need to have a permit. Sirena is the only ranger station in the Osa that has camping and food for sale. La Leonas, Pedrillo, and Las Patos are the only camping options that do not have food service. It is possible to park at the ranger station in Puerto Jimenez, but they do not accept credit cards. The estimated arrival time is more than a month before the park service (MINAE) issues park permits. The Kefi Netel Sol service costs $30 for the day, or $10 for a one-day pass. Details are on their website.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: سکي پنډونه په شا سفرونه: دغه فعالیت ته لرې پرتو سیمو کې سکي، د سکي سیاحت یا سکي لپاره پیاده سفرونه ویل کیږي. دا هغې پورې تړاو لري خو معمولاً پکې د آلپین سټایل سکي یا غرختنه نه دې شامل. غرختنه په معلومو خطونو کېږي او دا قوي بوټونو او سخته ځمکه کېږي. د سکي لاره تصور ولرئ چې د ورته د پیاده اوږد مزل په شان ده. په ښې وضع کې تاسو کولای شې د تش پیاده ګرځېدا په پرتله زیات واټن پوښلای شئ – خو تر څو چې یو درانه پنډ په ملا سره په ښه استعمال شویو لارو ورنشئ تر هغې نادره ده چې د هېواد پورې هورې تېزه سکي لوبه وکړئ.
mt: Backcountry skiing refers to skiing in remote areas, ski tourism or ski touring. It is related to but usually does not include alpine skiing, which is done on marked trails and is done on groomed slopes. Imagine a long hike in the mountains, but with a heavy pack on your back. In good conditions, you can cover more distance than a day hike, but it takes a lot of effort to get there, and it is rare that you can ski the whole way down the country.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: د بیا داخلېدا ټکان د کلتوري ټکان څخه زیات زر راځي (ګبینسپوږمیزې دوره زیاته لنډه وي)، زیات وخت پورې وي، او زیات سنګین کېدلی شي. سفر کوونکي چې د نوي کلتورونو سره د ځان برابرولو کې آسانتیا ویني، بعضې وختونه د خپل ځایي کلتور سره بیرته برابرولو کې له سخت مشکل سره مخامخ کیږي. کله چې د بهر اوسیدو څخه راوګرځېږي نو تاسې نوی کلتور خپل کړی وي او د خپل کورني کلتور ځینې عادتونه مو له لاسه ورکړي دي. چې کله تاسو لومړي ځل خارج ته تللي واست، خلک شاید زیات صبرناک او درکمند وو درسره، په دې علم سره چې په نوي هېواد کې مسافران مطابقت موندلو ته اړتیا لري. خلک ممکن د دې حوصلې تمه ونه کړي او د بیرته راستنیدونکو مسافرینو لپاره پوهه لازمي ده۔

src: موږ (چې ایلک هم ورته وایي) په ذاتی ډول باندي جارحانه نه دي، مګر چې کله خطر محسوس کړي د خپل ځان څخه کلکه دفاع کوي کله چې خلک موږ د ځان لپاره یو ممکنه خطر نه ګڼی، دوي شاید ډیر نږدې ورشي او خپل ځانونه په خطر کې واقع کړي
mt: We (that is, I) are not inherently aggressive, but when we perceive a threat, we will defend ourselves. When people don't see us as a threat, they may get very close and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: د ورځې په تودوخه کې، سفر کوونکې کولی شي کوچني تجربه کړي چې د اوبو بد بریښي (یا نور شیان) ورکوي۔ که چیرې سفر کوونکي سراب پسې ولاړ شي نو دا به ډیره خطرناک وي او د باقیمانده اوبو او انرژۍ د ضایع کیدو سبب کیږي حتی ګرمې صحراوې د شپې یخېږي. Hypothermia د معتدلو کالیو پرته حقیقي خطر دی.
mt: In hot weather, travelers can experience small mirages that appear to be water (or other objects). If travelers follow mirages, it is very dangerous and wastes remaining water and energy, even hot deserts freeze at night. Hypothermia is a real danger in temperate climates.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: د دومینکا جمهوریت (هسپانوي:República Dominicana ) یو کارابیان هیواد دی چې د هیسپانولیا جزیرې مغربي نیمایي برخه چې د هایاتي سره یې شریکوي، تر ولکې لاندې راولي. د سپینو شګو د سمندرې غاړو او غره ایز منظرو سره ، دا هیواد په امیریکاس کې پخوانی اروپایې ښار کور دي، چې اوس د سینټو ډومینګو برخه ګرځیدلی ده به دي ټاپو کې لومړۍ څل تاینوس او کېریبیسtainos and caribes و اوسیدل ،کېریبیس د ارواکان ويونکې وګړی و څوک چې10000 کاله مخکې رارسیدلی و د یو څو لنډو کلونو کې د اروپایې پلټونکو د راتګ څخه وروسته د تاینوس نفوس د هسپانوي ويجاړونکو له خوا ډیر کم شوي و د فری بارټولمو fray bartolomeډی لاس کساس (ټراټاډو ډی لاس انډیاس)tratado de las indias په اساس د 1492 او 1498 تر منځ هسپانوي ويچاړونکو تقریبا یو لک تاینوس ووژل
mt: The Dominican Republic is a Caribbean nation that shares the island of Hispaniola with Haiti to its east. To its north, west and south, the nation borders the Caribbean Sea, Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico, respectively. The country's capital and largest city is Santo Domingo. The Dominican Republic is the second largest nation in the Antilles after Cuba. It is the largest nation in the Caribbean by area, and the third largest by population.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "له غره د کوز حرکت د واورو لوبې، چې سکي او د واورې پاسه په تخته تلنه پکې شامل دي، مشهورې لوبې دي چې په ترڅ کې يې د ستاسو پښې د سکیګانو او د واورې تختو سره تړلې وي او په واوره پټه سیمه کوزې خوا ته خویېږئ. سکي لوبه یو لوی سفري فعالیت دی چې د ګڼشمېر شوقیانو، چې ځنه وخت ""د سکي لوپران"" بلل کیږي، د ټولو رخصتیو منصوبې په یو ځانګړي ځای کې د سکي په لوبه راګرځي. د سکي کولو فکر ډېر زوړ دی — 5000 قبل مسیح وخت کې د سمڅو دننه کښنو کې سکي کوونکي ښکاري. د یوې لوبې په توګه له غره کوزه سکي کول لږ تر لږه شاته 17مې پېړۍ پورې ځي، او په 1861 کې نارویجیانو په اسټرالیا کې لومړی تفریحي سکي کلب خلاص کړی و."
mt: "Downhill skiing, which includes skiing and snowboarding, is a popular sport in which you glide down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard. Skiing is a major recreational activity that draws millions of enthusiasts, known as "ski bums," to designated ski areas during all types of vacations. The idea of skiing is very old — people were skiing down snow-covered slopes as early as 5000 B.C. as evidenced by drawings of skiers in caves. As a sport, downhill skiing is at least as old as the 17th century, and in 1861 Norwegians established the first recreational ski club in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: د افریقا مشرقی جزیرې د هند په سمندر کی دی چی د افریقا د مشرقی ځمکی څخه لری دی. ځنګلي ژوند ته په حواله ماډاګاسکر تر ټولو بسیار زیاته او په خپله ځان ته یوه لویه وچه ده. اکثره زیاتې وړې جزیرې خپلواک ملتونه دي، یا فرانس سره تړاو لري، او دوی ته لوکس ساحلي استراحځایونه ویل کیږي. عربانو دغه وطنونو ته اسلام هم راوړ، او دا په کوموروز او مایوټي کې تر لویه کچه کامیاب شو. یورپي نفوذ او نوابادیت په 15مه پېړۍ کې پیل شو، کله چې پرتګالي مهمجو واسکو ډي ګاما یورپ نه هندوستان ته د کېپ لار وموندله.
mt: Madagascar is an island nation off the coast of East Africa. It is the fourth largest island in the world. Most of the small islands are independent nations, or are part of France, and are known for their luxury beach resorts. Islam was brought to these islands by Arabs, and this was most successful in Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonization began in the 15th century, when Portuguese navigator Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: په یوه ښکاره ځای کې د سهار لمر لیدلو لپاره د ایسټر شپه ویښه تېرول یو دود دی. ددې دود لپاره د مسیحي الهیاتو کې توضیحات شتون لري خو دا به د عیسویت د بهار څخه وړاندې او زرغونتیا غوره وو. ډیر ثقافتي کلیساګانې اکثرا د ایسټر اونۍ په جریان کې د شنبه په شپه د ایسټر نظارت ترسره کوي، د کلیساګانو سره اکثرا د نیمې شپې په تیریدو کې د مسیح بېرته ژونديتوب د لمانځلو لپاره لمانځل کیږي.
mt: A sunrise service on Easter Sunday is a common tradition. Many churches hold a sunrise service on Easter Sunday, often at dawn, to commemorate the resurrection of Jesus. The Easter Vigil, a service held before dawn on Easter Eve, is a traditional service in many Christian churches, including the Catholic Church, the Lutheran Church, and the Anglican Communion. The Easter Vigil is a service of light, and is often held outside, or in a darkened church, with the lighting of candles and other lights. The Easter Vigil is a service of light, and is often held outside, or in a darkened church, with the lighting of candles and other lights.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: ایکوادور د کیوبا د خلکو څخه چی غواړی ایکواډور ته د نړیوال هوایی ډګر اویا هم د ځمکی د لاری داخل شی مخکی د دعوت نامی غوښتنه کوی. دا مکتوب باید د ایکوادور د خارجه چارو وزارت له خوا قانونی شي او د ځانګړو غوښتنو سره مطابقت ولري دا غوښتنی د دواړه هیوادونو تر منځ د هجرت د منظم بهیر منځ ته راوړلو په خاطر طرحه شوي د کیوبا اوسیدونکی چی د امریکا د ایالاتو د ګرین کارډ لرونکی دی باید چی د ایکوادور قونصلی ته مراجعه وکړی چی ددی اړتیا څخه معافیت تر لاسه کړی. ستاسې پاسپورت باید ستاسې د سفر د نيټی څخه اخواته شپږ میاشتی وخت ولري، یو طرفه دوه طرفه ټکټ ولري چې ستاسې د پاتی کېدو د وخت اوږدوالی تر معلوم شي
mt: Ecuador is asking Cubans who want to enter the country by air or sea to apply for a visa in advance. The letter must be approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and be in accordance with specific requirements. This is to establish a regular flow of migration between the two countries. A Cuban resident of the United States who is a green card holder must contact the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for six months from the date of your trip, one-way or round-trip ticket must be valid for the duration of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: دستګو عینکې کېدای شي په خارچې هیوادونو کې نسبتا ارزانه وي ، په خاص ډول د کم عاید لرونکو هیوادونو کې چې د کاریګرو د مزدورۍ اندازه کمه ده په کور کې د سترګو د معا ینی په اړه فکر وکړي ، په ځانګړی توګه چې بیمه یې وي ، او د نسخی راوړل دځان سره چې بل ځای کې یې په قانونی اسنادو کې ثبت کړي د لوړ کېفیت او بیې د نوم د چوکاټ شتون په داسې ځایونو کې ممکن دوه ستونزی ولري: ځینی به یې په رعایتی قیمت وي ، او اصلی وارد شوي به یې د خپل ځای څخه په لوړ قیمت وي
mt: In low-income countries, where labor costs are low, the cost of eyeglasses may be relatively low, especially if they are covered by insurance and the prescription is written in a legal document. In such places, the presence of high quality and expensive frames may present two problems: some may be sold at a discount, and the original imported may be sold at a high price.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: په رسمي ډول د فالکلنډ پولي واحد فالکلنډي پاونډ (FKP) دی چې ارزښت یې د برتانوي پاونډ (GBP) سره مساوي شمیرل کیږي. په ایلیندونو کې پیسې یواځې په یو بانک کې تبادله کیدای شي کوم چې په Stanley کې د FIC مغربي دوکان په هغه بل طرف واقع دی. برطانوي پاونډونه په عمومي دول په جزیرو کې هر ځای کې منل کيږي او د ستېنلي کرېډټ کارډ دننه او متحده ایالاتو کې ډالرې هم اکثره وخت منل کیږي. په څنګ پرتو ټاپوګانو کې په عمومي توګه کرېډټ کارډونه نه منل کیږي، که څه هم برطانوي او متحده امریکايي کرنسۍ کېدې شي واخستل شي؛ له مخې مالکانو څخه تصدیق کړئ چې د تادیې قبول وړ طریقه يې څه ده. د فالکلېنډز کرنسۍ له دغه جزیرو بیرون تبادله کول تقریبا غېرممکن دي، نو ټاپوګانو څخه تلو وړاندې پیسې بدلې کړئ.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is valued at par with the British pound (GBP).  British pounds are accepted in general circulation on the islands, and Falkland Islands Credit Card is accepted in Stanley at the FIC Eastern Store.  British and U.S. credit cards are usually accepted in the outlying islands, but it is recommended that travelers check with their card issuer to confirm that the transaction will be accepted.  Currency exchange is not readily available outside the Falklands, so travelers should exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: ډیری معبدونه کلنی فیستوال لري چې د نومبر څخه پيل او د مۍ په نیمایی کی پای ته رسیږي چې د هر معبد د کلنۍ جنترۍ مطابق په توپیر سره سر ته رسیږی دډیری معبدونو فیستوالونه د معبد د کلیزی په مناسبت یا په معبد کې د موجود معبود د زوکړي په مناسبت یا هم بل کوم غټ کار چې د معبد پورې تړلی وي لپاره لمانځل کېږی د کېرالا د معبد فیستیوال دکتلو لپاره ډیر په زړه پورې وي د ښایسته کړي شوي فیلانو یوه منظمه لړۍ، دمعبد د ارکسترا او نور فیستوالونه
mt: Many temples have annual festivals that begin in November and end in May, depending on the temple's annual calendar. The festivals of many temples are celebrated in honor of the temple's deity, or in honor of the birth of the deity, or in honor of some other major event associated with the temple. The Keralan temple festival is celebrated in honor of the beautiful elephants, the temple's orchestra, and other festivals.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: په لومړي یا سوداګریز ټولګي کې د الوتنې د درک کولو وړ لاره دا ده چې د امتیاز لپاره یو څه پیسي رامینځته کړي (یا، لاهم ښه، خپل شرکت راوباسي چې دا ستاسي لپاره ترسره کړي)۔ خو دا ارزان نه دی: د تخمینې په نامحتاطه قواعدو، تاسو باید ذهن کې ولرئ چې ښايي د بزنس کچې لپاره د بچت د کچې څخه څلور چنده زیاتې پیسې ورکړئ، او فرسټ کلاس لپاره یولس چنده زیاتې. په عمومي توګه، له نقطه الف څخه ب پورې مستقیم پرواز کې د بزنس یا د فرسټ کلاس په سیټونو د رعایت د لټون هیڅ ګټه نشته. هوايي شرکتونه پوهیږي چې یو کم زیات چټک او په ارام د رسېدا امتیاز لپاره د الوتونکو یوه خاص مرکزي ډله شتون لري چې لوړه بیه ورکولو ته راضي دي، او دوی هم د دې مطابق ترې پیسې اخلي.
mt: 1. The first or business class route to understand is to create a little bit of value (or, hey, just ask your company to do this for you). But this is not cheap: you should be aware that you may be paying four times the cost of the business class for the business class, and fifteen times the cost of the first class. In general, there is no benefit to looking for business or first class seats on a direct flight from point A to point B. Airlines know that there is a specific central group of travelers who are willing to pay a little more for a quick and peaceful arrival, and they also get paid for it.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: هوایی شرکتونه لکه امارات، اتحاد هوایی الوتکې، قطر هوایی الوتکې او ترکش هوایی الوتکو خپل خدمات په ډیر ستر ډول سره افریقا ته خپاره کړي او ډیرو مهمو افریقایي ښارونو ته د اروپایي هوایي شرکتونو په مقایسه په رقابتي نرخونو خدمات وړاندې کوي ترکيه هوايي شرکت تر ۲۰۱۴ پورې ۳۰ افریقی هیوادونو کې ۳۹ منزلونو ته الوتنه کوي. که چیرته تاسې د سفر اضافې وخت لرئ، وګورئ چې افریقا ته ستاسې ټوله کرایه د نړۍ د نورو کرایو سره په پرتله څومره ده. د افریقا څخه بیرون ځایونو لپاره د اضافي ویزاګانو، د پریښودو مالیه، ځمکني ترانسپورت او داسې نورو اضافه کول په خپلو اضافي مصارفو کې مه هیروه
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their African routes and offer important African cities at competitive rates compared to European airlines. If you have extra time, check how much your entire trip to Africa costs compared to other parts of the world. Additional visas, exit fees, land transport and other additional costs are included in your additional expenses.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: په لویو بازارونو کې د غذایی موادو پیرل ارزان ترینه لار ده چې غذا وخوړل شي. د پخلي د فرصتونو څخه پرته، د تیارو پخو شویو غذایی موادو انتخابونه محدود دي. سوپر مارکېټونه د مخکې څخه تیارو خوړو لپاره رنګارنګ ځایونه جوړوي ،ځینی خو د خوراک د ګرمولو په موخه مایکرو ويو او نور وسایل ترتیبوي په ځینو هیوادونو او یوډول سټورونو کې کم نه کم یو ځای په ځای رستورانت موجود وي اکثره وخت یو مناسب غیر رسمی چې ټیټی بیې لري
mt: In large markets, the cheapest way to eat is to buy food to eat. Without cooking facilities, the choices of prepared foods are limited. Supermarkets set up colorful places for ready-to-eat foods, some of which prepare food for heating in microwaves and other appliances. In some countries and some stores, there are also restaurants, usually informal and with low prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: د فرانسوۍ ژبه چې په بلجیم او سویس کې ویل کیږي د هغه فرانسوۍ ژبې سره چې په فرانسه کې ویل کیږي یو څه مختلفه ده سره له دې چې دومره ورته والی لري چې په دوه اړخیزه ډول د پوهیدلو وړ ده په ځانګړي ډول د فرانسوۍ ژبې د شمیرو سیستم چې په بلجیم او سویس کې استعمالیږي په فرانسه کې ویل کیدونکې فرانسوۍ ژبې سره لږ څه تفاوت لري او د ځینو کلمو تلفظ هم سره یو څه مختلف دی په هر صورت، ټولو بلژیک او سویس فرانسوي ویونکو به په ښوونځي کې معیاري فرانسوي زده کړې وي نو که چیرې ته د معیاري فرانسوۍ د شمیرو سیستم هم وکاروې هغوی کولای شي ستاسې په خبرو وپوهیږي.
mt: French as spoken in Belgium and Switzerland is somewhat different from the French spoken in France, but similar enough to be mutually intelligible, especially in the phonology of the language, which is the same in both countries. There are some differences in vocabulary and pronunciation, but all Belgian and Swiss French speakers will have learned standard French in school, so they will be able to understand you.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

mt: Only a few airlines still charge for baggage, which can offset the cost of a funeral. These airlines include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, and Lufthansa. However, you must register directly with the airline by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: په زیرک موبایلونو کې د جی پي ایس لارښودنې د پروګرام استعمال تر ټولو اسانه او آرام ورکوونکې لاره ده چې د هیواد څخه بهر پرې لاره پیدا کولای شې. دا کولی شي د جي پي ايس لپاره د نوي نقشو پیرود باندې پیسې وسپموي، یا یو يوازي جي پي ايس آله یا د موټر د کرایې شرکت څخه يو په ګرايه کول. که چيري تاسو خپل ټيليفون لپاره د اړيکي ډيټا نلرۍ، او ستاسو د لاسرسې حد نه بهر وې، نو د دوی فعالیت محدود یا غیر موجود کیدی شي۔
mt: The easiest and most peaceful way to find a route to another country on your mobile phone is to use GPS navigation software. It can help you create new maps for GPS, or a GPS device or a car rental company. If you do not have a connection with your phone, and you are beyond your reach, your activity may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. mt: 1. All nouns begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is a major way to distinguish between nouns and verbs, and it may also help you read more easily, but writing it is a bit of a pain, because you have to remember to capitalize every noun.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. src: "د نړۍ په ډیری برخو کې، لاس خوځول د دوستانه اشاره ده، چې د ""سلام"" ښودنه کوي. خو په مالیزیا کې، حد اقل د مالیزیا په کلیوالي منطقو کې دا د ""راشه"" معنی ورکوي د خپل بدن طرف ته د شهادت ګوتې د را کږولو په شان، یوه اشاره ده چې په بعضو مغربي هیوادونو کې استعمالیږي او باید چې د هماغه هدف لپاره وکاریږي. په ورته ډول، په هسپانیا کې یو بریتانیایی مسافر ممکن د الوداع چپې د لاس د اشارې په توګه د اشاره کونکي د بیرته راسنیدو په توګه (د هغه سړي پر ځای چې اشاره ورته کیږي) غلطي کړي."
mt: "In many parts of the world, a wave is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello." But in rural Malaysia, it means "fuck you" in the same way as a middle finger, which is used in some Western countries and must be interpreted as such. Similarly, a British passenger in Spain may mistake a friendly wave for a middle finger, as a gesture of farewell (to the person being waved at)."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: "د نړۍ په ډیری برخو کې، لاس خوځول د دوستانه اشاره ده، چې د ""سلام"" ښودنه کوي. خو په مالیزیا کې، حد اقل د مالیزیا په کلیوالي منطقو کې دا د ""راشه"" معنی ورکوي د خپل بدن طرف ته د شهادت ګوتې د را کږولو په شان، یوه اشاره ده چې په بعضو مغربي هیوادونو کې استعمالیږي او باید چې د هماغه هدف لپاره وکاریږي. په ورته ډول، په هسپانیا کې یو بریتانیایی مسافر ممکن د الوداع چپې د لاس د اشارې په توګه د اشاره کونکي د بیرته راسنیدو په توګه (د هغه سړي پر ځای چې اشاره ورته کیږي) غلطي کړي."
mt: "In many parts of the world, a wave is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello." But in rural Malaysia, it means "fuck you" in the same way as a middle finger, which is used in some Western countries and must be interpreted as such. Similarly, a British passenger in Spain may mistake a friendly wave for a middle finger, as a gesture of farewell (to the person being waved at)."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: دا یخچالونه ثابت ندي خو د غره څخه لاندې بهیږي. دا د درزونو سبب کیږي چې د واورینو پلونو لخوا پټیږي. د یخ څخه جوړ شويو غارونو دیوالونه او بامونه راغورځیدای شي او درزونه یې بندیدای شي د یخچالونو په څنډه کې سترې ماتیږي، غورځیږي او شاید د څنډې څخه لیرې وتوغیږي او یا ټوپ ووهي.
mt: These refrigerators are not stationary but are carried down from the mountain. This causes cracks that are covered by snow. The walls and ceilings of caves made of ice can crack and cracks can be sealed. Large icicles form, crack, and may fall away from the edge or topple over.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: ګوما لرې لمرخاته کې رووانډا سره نږدې د کانګو جمهوري ریاست کې د سېلګرانو ښار دی. په کال 2002 کی ګوما د نیاراګونګو اور غورځونکی غر د لاوا په واسطه ړنګه شوه . چی دښار ډیر سرکونه یی لاندی کړل . په خاص ډول د ښار منځنی برخه. پداسې حال کی چې ګوما نسبتاً محفوظ دی، مګر د ګوما څخه بهر هر سفر لپاره باید په شمالي کیوو ولایت کی د روانی جهګړی حالاتو په اړه پوهـه ترلاسه کړی شي. دا ښار د نیاراګانګو اتشفشان ته د ختلو وړاندې د اډې په توګه استعمالیږي او سربېره د غرونو ګوریلا کتلو لپاره په افریقا کې تر ټولو زیات ارزان بیې لارې لري. تاسي په ګوما کی ګرځیدلو لپاره د بوډا-بوډا (د موټرسایکل ټیکسي) کارولی شئ۔ د لنډ سفر لپاره معیاري (محلي) نرخ 500 کانګوليسی فرانسه دی۔
mt: Goma is a city in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo, near the Rwandan border. In 2002, Goma was devastated by the eruption of Mount Nyiragongo, which destroyed much of the city, especially its central area. Goma is relatively safe, but travelers to the area should be aware of the volatile situation in North Kivu. Goma is used as a staging point for climbing Nyiragongo and is the cheapest place in Africa to hire a guide to track gorillas. You can get around Goma by moto-taxi. A standard (local) fare for a short trip is 500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: "هر کېمپنګ په ګریڼد کېنین کې د یوې څنډی لاندې د یو شاته پاتی ځای اجازتنامه غواړي اجازه لیکونه د کنیان ساتلو لپاره محدود دي، او د میاشتې په ۱وړوبني ورځ شتون لري، د پیل میاشت څخه څلور میاشتې مخکې. په دي توګه د شاته پاتی ځای اجازت نامه د مۍ د میاشتی د هر یوې د پیل نیټی لپاره د جنوری د اولی نیټی څخه شتون لري د خورا مشهور سیمو لپاره ځای، لکه د فینټم رینچ ته څېرمه د انګیلا روښانه کیمپ ځمکه، عموماً د لومړي نیټې ترلاسه شوي غوښتنو لخوا ډک کړئ دوی د ریزرویشنونو لپاره خلاص شوي. د غوښتنو لپاره د محدود شمیر جوازونه خوندي دي، چې د ""لومړی راغلل، لومړی خدمت"" پر اساس شتون لري."
mt: "Each campground in the Grand Canyon National Park requires a permit for a campsite, and the permits are limited, and are available on a first-come, first-served basis. They are usually full by the first of the month, four months in advance. Thus, the permits for the first night of May are available on January 1st. For the most popular sites, such as the Phantom Ranch site, the Bright Angel Campground, reservations are available. A limited number of permits are held back, on a first-come, first-served basis."
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: ځینی هوټلونه د زرینو وختونو د بخار د ریل او د سمندر د کښتیو د وخت پخوانی شيانو میراث لري، چې د دوهم نړیوال جنګ نه مخکې ،په نوولسمه یا د شلمی پیړۍ په اوایلو کې دا هغه هوټلونه و چېرته چې د نن مشهور او شتمن خلک اوسیدل ، او اکثر وخت به یې ښه ډودۍ او د شپې ژوند لره دپخوانی مود د جامو تناسب ،د اوسنی اسانتیا و کمښت ، او یو خاص ډول فخریه زړښت هم د هغوي د کرکتر یوه برخه وه د عام ډول هغوي شخصی ملکېتونه دي ،دوي څینی وخت د ایالت د رووساو سره او نورو لوړ رتبه اشخاصو سره د کتلو زمینه برابروي . له ډيرو پیسو سره، یو مسافر کولی شي چې په ټوله نړۍ سفر کولو په پام کې ولري، چې دغه سفر به په دې ډیرو هوټلونو کې له پاتې کیدو سره مات شي.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy of steam locomotives and ocean liners from the golden age of travel, before the Second World War, in the nineteenth or early twentieth century, where the famous and wealthy people lived, and often had good food and a life of the old clothes, the lack of modern conveniences, and a certain kind of old-fashioned charm was part of their character, their personal possessions are, they can meet with the state of Russia and other high-ranking individuals. With a lot of money, a traveler can plan a trip around the world, which will end in these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

mt: Walking is a form of human-powered transport in which people walk on foot. It is done for relaxation, exercise, pleasure or shopping and is the norm for transporting oneself in cities or less developed countries. Walking has been an essential part of humans' travel for centuries, and was the only form of motorized foot transport until the invention of the motorcycle in the early 1900s. Walking is also the oldest and in some countries the main means of transportation, but was supplanted by bicycles, automobiles, and airplanes. In the 21st century, walking remains a popular form of exercise and leisure activity, such as walking for health, walking for fitness, and walking for weight loss. ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "په عمومي ډول په ناروې کې مایلې ویالې او درې دي چې په ناڅاپي ډول لوړ زیات او کم هوار میدانونو ته لار پیدا کوي دا پلوشې اکثرا د وډي په نامه یادېږي ""پدې معنی چې پراخه ، خلاصه ونې بې ځایه ځای، بې حد پراخه ده۔ په روګلیند او اګدر کې هغوی په عمومي ډول د ""Hei"" په نامه سره یادیږي چې معنې یې د ونو بغیر د وښو ډک او په ځنګلي ګلانو پوښل شوي ځای ته وایي."
mt: "In general, there are three types of dunes in Norway that are suddenly high and low dunes. These are called "Ved" in general, meaning a wide, dense place, without limit. In Rogaland and Agder, they are generally called "Hei", meaning a place of trees without wigs and covered with wildflowers."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
