mt: 1. Once you are on the beach, everything will be clear. You will see the other boats and they will share their information with you. You will note that you are offering assistance, flags, contact with the sailors, and so on, to inform many people. Soon, everyone will know you. And they will tell you about the boat.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: دا یقیني کړئ چې یو ځل د سمندر غاړې ته ورسیږئ نو هر څه به دیر واضح شي. تاسې به د د بلې کښتۍ سفرکوونکو سره ووینۍ او هغه به تاسې سره خپل معلومات شریک کړي اساسا تاسو به نوټس ورکوی چې ستاسو د مرستې وړاندیز کوي، ډاکونه پول، له خلکو سره د هغوی د کښتونو پاکولو ته رسیدل، هڅه کوي چې په بار کې د بحريانو سره اړیکه ونیسي، او داسې نور هڅه وکړه تر څو د ډیرو خلکو سره خبری وکړی ، لږ وخت وروسته به ټول خلک تا و پیژنی .او د هغی کښتۍ په اړه به درته نښي نښانی ووایی چی د جا په اړه یی پوښتنه وکړی.

ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: د میلمستیا د تبادلې شبکه داسې یوه اداره ده چې مسافر او ځایي خلک سره په هغو ښارونو کې چې غواړي سفر وکړي مخامخ کوي. د داسې شبکې سره یوځای کیدل فقط د یو اونلاین فورمې ډکولو ته ضرورت لري سره لدې چې بعضې شبکې د اضافی تائیدۍ ته ضرورت لري. د موجودو کوربنو لړلیک بیا په چاپ شوي او یا په اونلاین بڼه بعضی وختونه د نورو سفرکوونکو د حوالو او نظریو سره ورکول کیږي. د کاوچ سرفنگ یا Couch Surfing اساس په جنوری 2004 کې وروسته له هغې کیښودل شو چې کمپیوتر پروګرام کوونکي Casey Fenton جزیرې ته یو ارزانه پرواز پیدا کړو خو د اوسیدلو لپاره یې ځای نلرلو. هغه د محلي پوهنتونو محصلینو ته برښنا لیکونه ولیږل او د وړیا اوسیدلو لپاره یې ډیر ښه وړانديزونه تر لاسه کړل
mt: A network of travelers and locals who want to meet each other in cities they want to visit. To join such a network, all you need is a free online form. Some networks require additional verification. A list of available couches is sometimes printed or online, and sometimes includes the references and opinions of other travelers. Couch Surfing was founded in January 2004 after Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Hawaii, but no place to stay. He sent e-mails to college students and got great offers for free lodging.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: د Boomerang ویشتل یو مشهور هنر دی چي ډیری سیلانیان یې لاسته راوړل غواړي. که تاسې غواړئ چې د بومیرنګ ویشتل چې بیرته تاسې ته راګرځې زده کړئ، نو دا یقیني کړئ چې تاسې د بیرته راګرځیدلو لپاره یو مناسب بومیرنګ لرئ ډیری بومیرنګونه چې په استرالیا کې وجود لري په حقیقت کې بیرته نه راګرڅیدونکي وي. دا ډیره د نویو زده کوونکیو لپاره دا غوره ده چې په باد لرونکي وخت کې د ویشتلو کوښښ ونکړي.
mt: The boomerang is a well-known Australian art that many tourists want to take home. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that will return to you, make sure that you have a suitable boomerang. Many of the boomerangs that exist in Australia are not returnable. It is best for new learners to avoid throwing a boomerang in windy weather.

If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: د 17،000 ټاپوګانو څخه انتخاب په حال کې، انډونیشیايي خوراک یوه عمومي اصطلاح ده چې په ټول ملت کې د سیمه ییزو اشپزونو پراخه تنوع پوښي. مګر، که چیرې نور د وړتیا لرونکو پرته وکارول شي، نو اصطلاح دا معنی لري چې خواړه د اصلي ټاپو جاوا مرکزي او ختیځ برخو څخه دي. د جزایرو په مجموعه کې اوس په پراخه ډول ترلاسه جاواني اشپزي په ساده ډول د چاشني شويو کتغونو سلسله لري، غالب ذایقه داره مواد چې جاوانیان يې خوښوي مومپلي، مرچ، شکره (په ځانګړی توګه د جاواني کوپرې شکره) او مختلف خوشبولرونکې مسالې دي.
mt: 17,000 islands, Indonesian cuisine is a general term that refers to the wide variety of food prepared by local chefs throughout the nation. However, if not used in reference to the original Javanese cuisine of the central and eastern parts of the island, the term refers to a series of dishes based on the simple ingredients of Javanese favorites such as mung beans, chili peppers, sugar (especially Javanese gula jawa), and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: هغوۍ چې د طبي اصطلاحاتو سره بلدتیا نلري، infectious او Contagoius کلمي مختلفي معناوي لري یوه انتقالیدونکې ناروغي هغه ده چې د پتوجن له وجې منځته راځې لکه ویروس، بکتریا، فنګس او یا نور پرازیتونه. ساري ناروغي هغه ناروغي ده چې په آسانۍ سره د ککړ شخص سره د نږدیوالي له وجې انتقال کیږي. ډیری هیوادونه لازمي ګڼي چې خپلو هیوادونو ته داخلیدونکي یا بیرون تلونکي نندارچیان د مختلفو مرضونو لپاره واکسین شي. کيدې شي چې دا اړتیاوې د هغه څه پورې اړه ولري چې کومو هیوادونو ته مسافر تللی دی او یا د هغې د لیدو اراده لري.
mt: Those who are not familiar with medical terminology, infectious and Contagoius have different meanings. An infectious disease is one that arises from a pathogen such as a virus, bacteria, fungus, or other parasites. A contagious disease is one that is easily transmitted with close contact with an infected person. Many countries require that visitors to their countries be vaccinated against various diseases. This may be related to what country a passenger has traveled to or intends to see.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: شخصي وی پي این (مجازي شخصي شبکه) عرضه کوونکي د دواړو سیاسي سانسور او تجارتي آی پی جیوفلترنګ د احاطه کولو لپاره یو غوره لار ده . هغوی د ځینو علتونو له وجې د انترنیتي پراکسیانو په پرتله ډیر غوره دي، هغوی ټول انټرنیټي ارتباطات بیرته راګرځوي نه یواځې چې ایچ تی تی پي. هغوی په عادي ډول لوړ بانډوېټ یا چټکوالی او د غوره کیفیت خدماتو سره وړاندې کوي، دا کوډ شوي دي او سخته ده چې جاسوسي یې وشي.
mt: Personal VPN providers are a good way to circumvent both political and commercial IP geofiltering. They are better than proxy servers in some cases, as they route all internet connections, not just HTTP. They usually offer high bandwidth and good quality service, are encrypted and difficult to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: دا ځکه چې تلیفون د انترنیت له لارې پر لیکه کیږي نو د هغه ځای چیرته چې اوسیږي یا سفر کوې د ټلیفون د شرکت استعمال ته اړتیا نه لرې هیڅ داسې کومه اړتیا نشته چې تاسې د هغې ټولنې څخه چې پکې اوسېږئ یو محلي شمېره ترلاسه کړئ، تاسې کولې شئ چې د سټیلایټ انټرنیټي اړیکه د چکن او آلاسکا په ځنګل کې ترلاسه کړئ، همدارنګه یو شمیره وټاکئ چې تاسې یې په لمریز اریزونا کې دعوه لرئ. بعضې وختونه ته باید یو نړیواله شمیره وپیرې کوم چې پي ایس ټې آین تلیفونونو ته اجازه ورکوي چې تاته تلیفون وکړي چیرته شمیره د هغو خلکو لپاره چې تاته تلیفون کوي فرق کوي
mt: Because the phone is connected to the Internet, there is no need for a local number where you are or traveling. You can get a satellite internet connection in the woods of Alaska, and a number in the Arizona desert. Sometimes you need a global number to allow PS TEL phones to call you where the people calling you are different.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: د ایټالیوي ژبې تلفظ نسبتاً آسانه دی هغه ځکه چې تلفظ یې کټ مټ د لیک په څېر دی. خاص حرفونه چې باید ورته پام وشي c او g دي، ځکه چې د دوی تلفظ ورپسې راتلونکي خپلواک غږ یعني واول په تکیه تغیر خوري. او هم اطمینان وکړئ چې د r او د rr تلفظ په بشپړه توګه ادا کوئ: د caro مطلب ګرانه، بلخوا د carro مطلب ټانګه دی.
mt: The Italian language is relatively easy to pronounce, because it is written as it is pronounced. The only letters that need special attention are c and g, because their pronunciation changes according to the following vowel. Also, make sure that you pronounce r and rr fully: caro means "dear", carro means "car".
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: ازمیر په ترکیه کې دریم لوی ترین ښار دی چې شاوخوا 3.7 ملیون نفوس، استنبول پسې دویم لوی ترین بندر، او د ټرانسپورټ یو ډېر ښه مرکز لري. په یو وخت کې د سمرنا لرغونی دا ښار اوس یو جدید، پرمختللی، مصرف تجارتي مرکز دی چې یوه لوی خلیج خواوشا پروت دی او غرونو ترې راتاو دي. که څه هم دا ښار د دودیزې ترکیه نه بلکې د مدتراني اروپا فضا لري، دلته پراخ سړکونه، شیشه تندی ودانیو او جدید سودا مرکزونو په منځ کې د سرو خښتو دودیز چتونه، د 18مې پېړۍ بازار، او زاړه جماتونه او کلیساوې ځای ځای ښکاري.
mt: 3rd largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, after Istanbul, is a major port and transportation hub. Once a small ancient city, Smyrna is now a modern, developed, consumer-oriented center with a large bay and mountains in the background. Although in the traditional Turkey, it is in the Mediterranean Europe, with wide streets, glassy buildings and modern business centers, with traditional stone pavements, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: د غوړېدلو سرکیو تماشا، چې هانامي، د 8مې صدۍ راهیسې د جاپاني کلتور برخه ده. دا فکر له چین راغلی چېرې چې د الوچې ګلونه د خوښې ګل و. په جاپان کې، د ګیلاس ګل لومړۍ میلمستا د شاهنشاه له لورې یوازې خپل ځان او نورو هنرمندو غړو ته په شاهي دربار کې تیاره کړه.
mt: The tradition of viewing cherry blossoms, which has been part of Japanese culture since the 8th century, is thought to have originated in China, where the flowers were used as a symbol of love. In Japan, the first viewing of cherry blossoms was by the emperor's daughter and other court artists in the imperial palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: یروشلم د اسرايلو پايتخت او لوي ښاردي ، که څه هم نور ډیر هیوادونه او ملګری ملتونه یې د اسرایلو د پایتخت په صفت په رسمی توګه نه پیژنی د جوډین تپې پخوانی ښار زړه راښکونکی تاریخ لري چې د زرګونو کلونو څخه اوړي. دا ښار د درېګونو وحدانی اديانو لپاره مقدس دي،یهوديت،عیسایت،او اسلام او د روحانی،دينی او کلتوری مرکز په حیث خدمت کوي د ښار ددېنی مهمیت له مخی او په خاصه توګه د یروشلم په زوړ ښار کې ځینی ځایونه د تورزم اصلی ځایونه دي یروشلم د خوځنده او د خلکو نه ډک د سودا مرکزونه ،کېفی ګانی، او رستورانتونو لرلو سره ډیر تاریخی، لرغونی ،او کلتوری ځایونه ههم لري
mt: Jerusalem is the capital of Israel and the largest city in the country, although other countries and international organizations do not recognize it as such. The city is considered holy to the three major Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity, and Islam—and has been a center of pilgrimage for thousands of years. In 2011, the city had a population of about 801,000 residents. The city is divided into three sectors: the Israeli administered West Jerusalem, East Jerusalem, which was captured and occupied by Israel in the 1967 Six-Day War, and the Jordanian administered Old City. The Old City contains a mix of Jewish, Muslim, Christian and other buildings, including the Dome of the Rock, the Church of the Holy Sepulchre, the Temple Mount, and the Western Wall. The city is home to the Old City, which has been designated as a World Heritage Site by the United Nations.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

The city is considered holy to the three major Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity, and Islam—and has been a center of pilgrimage for thousands of years. In 2011, the city had a population of about 801,000 residents. The city is divided into three sectors: the Israeli administered West Jerusalem, East Jerusalem, which was captured and occupied by Israel in the 1967 Six-Day War, and the Jordanian administered Old City. The Old City contains a mix of Jewish, Muslim, Christian and other buildings, including the Dome of the Rock, the Church of the Holy Sepulchre, the Temple Mount, and the Western Wall. The city is home to the Old City, which has been designated as a World Heritage Site by the United Nations.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: کروګر نېشنل پارک (کې این ایف) د سوېلي افریقا په شمال مشرق کې واقع دی او په مشرق کې موزمبیق سره په پوله پروت تللی دی، زمبابوې يې په شمال کې، او سوېلي پوله يې د مګرمچانو دریاب دی. پارک ۱۹،۵۰۰ کلومتره مربع پوښښ لري او په مختلف ۱۴ ایکو زونونو ویشل شوی دی، چي هر يو د مختلف ځناورو ملاتړ کوي. دا د سوېلي افریقا مرکزي راښکونکو ځایونو څخه یو دی او دا د سوېلي افریقا قامي پارکونو (سېنپارکس) سره تر ټولو مهم پارک دی. د ټولو جنوبي افریقایي ملي پارکونو لپاره، د هر پارک لپاره د محافظت او د داخلې فیسونه وجود لري. دا به د یو کس لپاره ګټور وي چې وايلډ کارت هم واخلي، کوم چې په سویلي افریقا یا ټول سویلي افریقا ملي پارکونو کې د ټاکل شويو پارکونو ته د ننوتلو زمینه برابروي.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa, bordering Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Ohrigstad River to the west. The park is 19,500 square kilometres (7,500 sq mi) in extent and is divided into 14 ecozones, each of which supports different wildlife. It is one of the largest game reserves in Africa and is the flagship of South African national parks. It is the largest of the country's national parks, and is the only one of the country's national parks to have a permanent presence of the Big Five. All of the South African national parks have entrance fees and internal fees. It is advisable to get a Wild Card, which allows access to all of the South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: د مچو پچه شمالي پای ته څیرمه ډیری وختونه د کنډوال ډیری عکسونو ته مخینه دا غره ده۔ دا د لاندې څخه یو څه ډاروونکی ښکاري، او دا یو خورا سخت او ستونزمن پورته حرکت دی، مګر خورا مناسب برابر اشخاص باید د دې توان ولري چې شاوخوا ۴۵ دقیقو کې یې سر کړي. نږدې په ټوله لاره د ډبرین پاټکې جوړ شوي دي ، مخ په ځوړی ځایونو کې د مرستی لپاره د اوپنی کېبلونه لاسی پټلۍ شته دي هغوي وويل چې د ستړتیا تمه لرۍ، او مخ په ځوړی ځایونو کې پام کوۍ په خاصه توګه د لمبدل په حالت کې دا ډیر په تیزۍ سره خطرناک کېدای شي هلته پاس ځای ته نږدېیو وړنکې غار دي چې باید د هغې څخه تیر شو ، دا خورا ټیټ او کلک زبیښونکې دي
mt: The North Face is a common sight in many of the photos of the summit. It is a very steep and difficult climb, but very suitable for those who can manage to get to the top in about 45 minutes. Almost the entire route is made of rock, and in the areas where the rock is loose, there are lassos on the ropes to help. They say to expect nausea, and to be especially careful in the areas where the rock is loose, especially in the area of the summit, it can be very dangerous in this area. There are narrow passages in the cave that must be passed through, these are very narrow and slippery.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: په مدترانه سمندر کې د ورته زونونو اشپزۍ په شان، مایورکايي اشپزۍ کې ډوډۍ، سبزۍ او غوښه (خصوصا د خوګ غوښه) بنیادي شیان دي او د زیتون تېل چې تل استعمالیږي. یوه ساده مشهوره ماښامنۍ، په ځانګړې توګه دوبي کې، پا آمب اولي ده: ډوډۍ سره زیتون تېل، ټماټر، او ذایقه داره چاشني لکه پنیر، ټونا ماهي وغېره.
mt: ډوډۍ، سبزۍ او غوښه (خصوصا د خوګ غوښه) بنیادي شیان دي او د زیتون تېل چې تل استعمالیږي. یوه ساده مشهوره ماښامنۍ، په ځانګړې توګه دوبي کې، پا آمب اولي ده: ډوډۍ سره زیتون تېل، ټماټر، او ذایقه داره چاشني لکه پنیر، ټونا ماهي وغېره.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: د هنګي یا Hangi خوراک د ځمکې په ګرمه کنده کې پخیږي. کندی یا خو د اور د تودو دبرو سره تودوخه مومی او یا په ځینو ځایونو کې د ځمکنۍ تودوخې له وجې بعضې منطقې په طبیعي ډول ګرمېږي Hangi ځنیې وختونه د محلي طرز ماښامنۍ ډوډۍ د پخولو لپاره استعمالیږي د روتوروا ځینې ځایونو کې د ځمکنۍ تودوخې Hangi پیدا کیږي، او نور قسم Hangi په دکرستچرچ، ولنګټن او یا نورو ځایونو کې نمونه کیدای شي.
mt: Hangi is a traditional method of cooking food by placing it in a pit oven and covering it with hot stones. In some areas, the ground naturally heats up to the point where Hangi can be found, and in other areas, such as Rotorua, Wanganui, and other places, it can be found.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: کله چې خانقاوو ته ورځئ، ښخو ته پکار دي چې داسې یو لباس واغوندي چې ځنګنونه او شاته ملا یې پټې کړي. اکثره خانقاوې ناتیارې راغلو ښځو ته د پټووني کالي ورکوي، خو که تاسو خپل راوړئ، ځانګړی یو چې شوخ رنګونه لري، په ور کې راهب یا راهبه به تاسو ته مسکۍ شي. په ورته کرښه کې، سړي اړ دي چې هغه پتلونونه واغوندي چی زنګونونو پوښي. دا هم په ور کې شته ذخیرې څخه پور اخستلای شي خو دا رختونه د هر استعمالوونکي پسې مینځل کیږي نه نو ښايي تاسې دغه سکرټونو اچولو سره ډاډمن نه وئ. سړیو لپاره یو سایز اېښل شوی!
mt: When you visit a temple, women should wear clothes that cover their shoulders and knees. Most temples will provide you with a sash to tie around your waist, but you may not be sure if you are wearing the right thing. Men should wear long pants. There is a size for men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: که تاسي په ژمي کې آرکټک یا انټارکټک سیمو ته سفر وکړئ تاسي به قطبي شپه تجربه کړئ، د دې معنی دا ده چې لمر له افق څخه نه راپورته کیږي. دا د شمالي ګهیځي شفق د لیدلو ښه فرصت لري، ځکه چې اسمان کې نږدې ټوله ورځ او شپه تیاره وي. لکه څنګه چې سیمې ډیر لږ نفوس او سپک ککړتیا لری له همدې امله اکثرا ستونزه نه وي، تاسي به وکولی شئ د ستورو څخه خوند واخلئ.
mt: If you travel to the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will experience polar night, meaning the sun does not rise above the horizon. This is a good time to see the northern lights, as the sky is dark most of the day and night. As the regions have little population and low pollution, this is usually not a problem, and you can enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: په لیرې پرتو ځایونو کې، د ګرځنده تلیفون پوښښ پرته، سپوږمکۍ تلیفون ممکن ستاسي یوازینۍ اختیار کيدي شي. سېټلایټ فون عموماً د یو موبایل فون ځایناستی نه دی، ځکه چې زنګ وهلو لپاره تاسو باید دباندې سپوږمکۍ سره د ارتباط پاکې لیکې ولرئ. خدمت اکثرا د ليښلو له لارې کارول کیږي، د خوښۍ هنر په ګډون، دي سره سره هغه سفرونه چې د ریموټ ډیټا او غږ اړتیاوې لري. ستاسو ځايي ټیلیفون سروس به په غالب امکان تاسو ته خدمت سره د تړون په اړه نور معلومات درکړي.
mt: In remote areas, where there is no cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a mobile phone, as you must dial out to a satellite to establish a connection. Service is usually accessed through a web interface, including things like the joy of art, as well as those trips that require remote data and voice. Your local telephone service will likely provide you with more information on service with a contract.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: د مالډووا دارالحکومت چیسيناو دی. ځايي ژبه رومانوي ده، خو روسي پراخ استعمالیږي. Moldova مختلف ډوله توکمیزه جمهوریت دی کوم چې د توکمیزو نښتو څخه کړیدلی. 1994 کې دغه جګړې په نتیجه کې ختیځه مالډووا کې پخپله خوښه اعلان شوی د ټرانسنسټریا جمهوریه تخلیق شو، چې خپل دولت او کرنسي لري خو د ملل متحد هیڅ یوه غړي لخوا نه ده تسلیم شوی. د سیاسي خبرو اترو د ناکامۍ سره سره بیا هم د Maldova د دواړو برخو تر منځ اقتصادي روابط بیرته رغیدلي. مالډووا کې لوی دین ارتوداکس عیساویت دی.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The official language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has emerged from ethnic strife. In 1994, the Transnistria region declared itself a separate republic with its own government and currency, but it has not been recognized by any United Nations member. Despite political failures, economic ties between the two parts of Moldova have been restored. The largest religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "تر هغې ځایه چې مونټيویډیو د استوا خط جنوب کې واقع دی، هلته اوس ګرمي ده او په شمالي نیمه کره کې بالعکس ژمی دی. مانټیو ویډیو (هغه سیمې چې د استوایی حوزې سره نزدې او سره پوله لري) په فرعي فصلونو کې دی؛ د اوړي په مياشتو کي د تودوخې درجه له + 30 ° C پورته ده۔ د یخنۍ موسم په درغیلګیرانه ډول یخ کېدې شي: تودوخه په نادرو موقع د انجماد له نقطې لاندې ځي، خو هوا او نمجنتیا رایوځای کېدنې سره د تمامیټر د معلوماتو برعکس زیاته یخني جوړه کړي. هیڅ کوم ځانګړی ""باراني"" او ""وچ"" فصلونه نشته: د باران اندازه غونډ کال تقریباً یو شان پاتې کیږي."
mt: "Montevideo, Uruguay, is on the southern hemisphere, so it is summer there and winter in the northern hemisphere. Montevideo (the areas that are close to the equator and border with it) is in a subseasonal period; in the summer months the temperature is above + 30 ° C. The winter season will freeze in a rare way: the temperature will drop below the freezing point, but the air and humidity will create a much colder freeze than the information of the entire world. There are no special ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain remains almost the same from year to year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: ناکاره او خراب شوي رسمونه د ګرافیت په نوم یادېږي. اګر که دا د نوې پدیدې څخه لرې دی، خو ددې احتمال شته چې ډیر خلک د عمومي مالونو تخریب په ځانګړي ډول ځوانان د سپرې رنګ څخه په استفادې پورې تړلی دی. که څه هم ، اوس دګرافیت پر ځای شوي هنرمندان شتون لري.د ګرافیت غونډی او په قانونی توګه ديوالونه.ګرافیت رسمونه په دي مفهوم کې د هنری کار سره ورته والی لري
mt: Graffiti is a form of nonmural public art. The very word "graffiti" is attested from 1911. One modern definition of graffiti is "images or words expressed with paints, markers, and/or sprays on public buildings, public property (objects such as buses, trains, and public toilets), or any other man-made surface (the word is also used by some to describe drawing or writing on paper). Graffiti ranges from simple "scrawl" writing to elaborate artistic works. In the strict sense, the term only refers to works that are spray-painted or applied with similar techniques.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: د ځینې فیستیوالونو لپاره، د موسیقي فیستیوالونو ته ډیر ګډون کوونکی په ساحه کې د کیمپ کولو پریکړه کوي، او ډیری ګډون کونکي دا د تجربې حیاتي برخه ګڼي. که تاسو غواړې چې اېکشن ته نږدې ووسئ نو تاسو باید زر ورورسئ چې موسیقۍ ته نږدې د کېمپ لګولو ځای غوره کړئ. په یاد ولرئ چې که څه هم ښايي مرکزي سټېج باندې موسیقي ختم شوې وي، د مېلې ځنه برخه به لا هم وي چې شپې ناوخته پورې به موسیقي غږوي. ځینې جشنونه دکورنیو او ددوی د ځوانو بچیانو لپاره د خیمې وهلو ځانګړي ځایونه لري.
mt: For some festivals, the music festival is the most popular part of the campsite, and many attendees consider this to be the most exciting part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you should be sure to choose a campsite close to the music. Keep in mind that while the main stage may have finished playing, the campsite will still be alive with music well into the night. Some festivals have special areas for families and their young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: "مهم ځايي جوار شراب 'نمبر ون' دي، او دا کوم پېچلی بییر نه دی، خو طبیعت خوشال او تازه کوونکی دی. بل ځايي بییر ""مانټا"" بلل کیږي. د څښلو لپاره ډېر فرانسوي شرابونه شته، خو د نیوزيلېنډ او د اسټرالیا شرابونه به سفر په ترڅ کې ښه وي. د نلکې ځايي اوبه د څښلو لپاره بالکل برابرې دي، خو که ډارېږئ نو د بوتلې اوبه اسانۍ سره ملاوېږي. اسټرالیاوالو لپاره د 'ساده سپینې' کافي قهوې فکر عجیبه دی. وړې تورې پیالې کې راځي 'ایسپرسو'، د شودو قهوه کې له پاسه د ملایئ ټاپو ولاړ وي (ځګ نه)، او چای شودو نه بغېر ورکوي. د ګرم چاکلیټو معیار د بیلجیمی په معیار دی. د میوو جوسونه قیمته خو ډير خوندور دي."
mt: "Local wines are 'Number 8' and are not complicated, but are natural and refreshing. Another local wine is called 'Montana'. There are many French wines to drink, but New Zealand and Australian wines will be good on the trip. Local bottled water is fine to drink, but if you are worried, bottled water is easy to find. Australians think 'plain white' is strange. Small black cups are good for 'Espresso', with a little island floating in the cup (not stirred), and tea is not served without sugar. The standard for hot chocolate is Belgian. Fruit juices are expensive but very tasty."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "مهم ځايي جوار شراب 'نمبر ون' دي، او دا کوم پېچلی بییر نه دی، خو طبیعت خوشال او تازه کوونکی دی. بل ځايي بییر ""مانټا"" بلل کیږي. د څښلو لپاره ډېر فرانسوي شرابونه شته، خو د نیوزيلېنډ او د اسټرالیا شرابونه به سفر په ترڅ کې ښه وي. د نلکې ځايي اوبه د څښلو لپاره بالکل برابرې دي، خو که ډارېږئ نو د بوتلې اوبه اسانۍ سره ملاوېږي. اسټرالیاوالو لپاره د 'ساده سپینې' کافي قهوې فکر عجیبه دی. وړې تورې پیالې کې راځي 'ایسپرسو'، د شودو قهوه کې له پاسه د ملایئ ټاپو ولاړ وي (ځګ نه)، او چای شودو نه بغېر ورکوي. د ګرم چاکلیټو معیار د بیلجیمی په معیار دی. د میوو جوسونه قیمته خو ډير خوندور دي."
mt: "Local wines are 'Number 8' and are not complicated, but are natural and refreshing. Another local wine is called 'Montana'. There are many French wines to drink, but New Zealand and Australian wines will be good on the trip. Local bottled water is fine to drink, but if you are worried, bottled water is easy to find. Australians think 'plain white' is strange. Small black cups are good for 'Espresso', with a little island floating in the cup (not stirred), and tea is not served without sugar. The standard for hot chocolate is Belgian. Fruit juices are expensive but very tasty."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Guaraní تر ټولو مهم سیمه ییزه ډله ده چې د اوسني پاراګویې کې د نیمه کوچیانو په شکل ژوند کوي چې اوس د کرنې او مالدارۍ تمرینات کوي. د چاکو سیمه د نورو دیسي قبایلو د ډلو لکه ګایوچورو او پایاګووا لپاره کور و، چې دوی په ښکار، خواړه راګړدونه او په ماهي نیونه ګذران کاوه. د 16مې پېړۍ په پېراګوای کې، چې پخوا د ""اینډیز عظیم ولایت"" په نام یادېدله، د اسپانوي فاتحینو او ځايي دیسي ډلو ترمنځ جګړې په پایله کې جوړه شوې وه. هسپانویانو استعمار شروع کړ چی دری پیړی دوام یی و کړ په 1537 کال کې د اسونسیان د تاسیس راهیسې، پاراګوی په دې کې کاميابه شوي چې د خپل اصلي شخصیت او هویت زياته برخه وساتي."
mt: "Guaraní is the most important indigenous group that currently lives in Paraguay as semi-nomads, practicing agriculture and livestock. The Chaco region was the home of other indigenous groups such as the Guaicurú and Payaguá, who were hunters, gatherers, and fishermen. In the 16th century, in what was then called the "Viceroyalty of Peru", the Spanish conquistadors and the local indigenous groups were in conflict. The Spanish began to colonize the region, which lasted for three centuries, since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has been able to preserve much of its original character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "پاریسیان بد او تکبر اناګونسیک شهرت درلودونکي دي۔ په داسې حال کې چې دا یوه نادقیقه کلیشه ده خو پاریس کې د ګذاره چلولو تر ټولو غوره لاره اوس هم غوره ترین سړیتوب خپلول دي، داسې یو تن په شان چلند کول چې ""bien élevé"" دی (ښه پرورش يې شوی دی). دا به هلته ځای ځای ته تلنه خور زیاته اسانه کړي. د پاريسيانو ناڅاپي چلند به په چټکۍ سره ختم شي که تاسو څه لومړني آداب ښکاره کړئ."
mt: "Parisians are bad and arrogant. While this is a cliché, the best way to get around Paris and still maintain a certain level of civility is to behave like a "bien élevé" (well-bred). This will make your travels there much easier. Parisians' rudeness will quickly disappear if you show them some basic courtesy."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: مترو ریل د کیپ تاون په داخل یا شاوخوا کې د سفري اورګاړو دوه قسمونه لري: مترو پلس (چې فرست کلاس هم ورته وایی) او میترو ( چې د ترډ کلاس په نوم هم یادیږي) میترو پلس ډیر زیات آرام ورکوونکی او لږ ابیرو بار لرونکي خو یو لږ څه زیات قیمته دی، خو سره له دې بیا هم په اروپا کې د عادي میترو د ټکټونو څخه ارزانه دی هر اورګاړی دواړه میترو پلس او د میترو کوچونه لري: د میترو بس کوچونه همیشه د کیپ تاون نژدې د اورګاړي په اخره کې وي.
mt: 2 types of commuter trains are available in the inner or near Cape Town: Metro Plus (also called First Class) and Metro (also called Third Class). Metro Plus is a slower, less crowded and more expensive train, but cheaper than the normal European metro tickets. Every train has both Metro Plus and Metro tickets: Metro bus tickets are always at the end of the train.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: د کونج هر دوکان د بې شمیره د وړاندې تادیه شویو تلیفوني کارتونو څخه ډک دی چې په عادي تلیفونونو او د تادیې تلیفونونو څخه د استعمالیدای شي زيات کارتونه زنګ وهلو لپاره ښه دې، ځینې د هیوادونو ځانګړو ډلو ته د غوښتنې غوره نرخونو چمتو کولو کې تخصص لري۔ دې چوپړتیاوو ته د لاسرسی اکثره وخت د مفته تلیفوني شمیرې څخه کیدای شي چې د ډیرو تلیفونونو څخه په وړیا ډول تلیفون کیدای شي
mt: The prepaid phone market is saturated with cards that can be used on regular and pay phones, some of which specialize in offering special rates to certain groups in the country. Access to these services can often be obtained by dialing a toll-free number from many phone numbers.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: د پلتویس لیکس ملي پارک په عمده توګه د بیچ، سپروس، او فرم ونو سره او د الپائن او مدیترانې سبزیجاتو ترکیب ښیېپه پراخه کچه ځنګلونه لري۔ دا د وړو اقلیمونو، بېلابېلو خټو او د لوړوالي متعددو سطحو په برکت د ونو بوټو د اجتماعاتو د پام وړ پراخه بېلابېلتیا لري. سیمه د د ځانورو او د مرغیو د انواعو د یوې بسیارې پراخې تنوع کوربه ده. نایاب ژويو لکه د اروپا نسواري رنګه ايږ، لیوه، عقاب، الو، لینکس، وحشي پیشو او کیپرکیلي دلته موندل کیدی شي، د نورو ډیر عام ډولونو سره.
mt: The National Park is dominated by beach, spruce and fir trees, and a mixture of alpine and Mediterranean herbs. It has a wide variety of forests due to its varied climates, soils and altitudes. The area is home to a very wide variety of birds and mammals. Rare animals such as the European red squirrel, lynx, eagle, falcon, linnet, wild boar and capercaillie can be found here, along with many more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "د میډیا شرکتونه معمولا د دې هدف په اړه دروغ وایی، ادعا کول چې دا د ""د سمندري غلا مخه نیولو"" لپاره دی. په واقعیت کې، منطقوي کوډونه په غیر قانوني نقل اخیستلو باندې هیڅ اغیز نه غورځوي د یو ټیکلي زره په زره نقل به په هره اله باندې هماغسې کار وکړي لکه څرنګه یې چې په اصلي باندې کوي واقعي هدف دادی چې شرکتونو ته د هغوی په بازار باندې نور کنترول هم ورکړی شي دا ټول د پیسو د څرخیدلو په اړه دی"
mt: "Media companies usually lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to prevent piracy. In reality, DRM does not affect illegal copying at all. A cracked copy will work on every device just as well as the original. The real goal is to give companies more control over their market, all of this is about money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: که څه هم خپل هیواد ته د رارسیدو پر مهال مهاجرتي پلټنه وجود نلري او یا هم یو رسمیت وي د ګمرکاتو کنترول یو مشکل کیدای شي ته باید دا خبره یقینی کړی چی ته په دی پوهیږی چی ته څه کولای شی او نه شی کولای چی نوی داسی یو څه معرفی کړی چی د قانونی چوکاټ څخه بیرون وی.
mt: While there may not be immigration checks on arrival or a formal customs control, it is important to be aware of what you can and cannot bring in, and to introduce new things that are outside the legal framework.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: که څه هم خپل هیواد ته د رارسیدو پر مهال مهاجرتي پلټنه وجود نلري او یا هم یو رسمیت وي د ګمرکاتو کنترول یو مشکل کیدای شي ته باید دا خبره یقینی کړی چی ته په دی پوهیږی چی ته څه کولای شی او نه شی کولای چی نوی داسی یو څه معرفی کړی چی د قانونی چوکاټ څخه بیرون وی.

src: کوچامو دره - چلي کې د غر ختنې مهم منزل، چې د سوېلي امریکا یوسمایټ په نوم پېژندل کيږي، بېلابېل ډول د ګرینایټ غټ دیوالونه او کنډې کپرې لري. په څوکو کې یې په زړه پورې منظرې شاملې دي. د نړۍ له ګوټ ګوټ څخه ختونکي په دوامداره توګه پر نه ختمیدونکي قوي دیوال نوې لارې جوړوي.
mt: The southernmost point of South America, known as Cape Horn, is marked by a large granite wall and a lighthouse. It has a lighthouse and a small museum. Climbers from all over the world are constantly adding new routes to the never-ending steep wall.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: که چیرې غواړې چې په جنوبي هیمسفیر کې د نړۍ څخه مکمله الوتنه ترسره کړې نو د تګ د ځایونو او هوایي الوتنو انتخابونه د سمندرګي څخه تیرودونکو لارو د کمښت له وجې محدود دي یو هوایې اتحاد هم نشې کولای ترڅو ټول درې بحري تقاطعات په سهیلي نیمه کره کې عبور کړي ( او SkyTeam یوه تقاطع هم نشې پوښلی.) خو سټار آلاینس د مشرقي جنوبي پاسیفیک د سانتیاګو دي چیلي څخه تر تاهیتي پورې چې د Latam یوه نړۍ سفر دي څخه پرته نور هر څه تر پوښښ لاندې نیسي دا هوایي سفر ددې لپاره چې وغواړي د جنوبي پاسفیک او د جنوبي امریکا جنوبي ساحل څخه صرف نظر وکړې یواځينی اختیار ندي
mt: If you want to fly around the world in the southern hemisphere, you have limited options for departure and arrival airports and air routes due to the reduction of the three sea crossings in the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam has not been able to fly all three).  Star Alliance is the only one that can fly from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a world trip except for Latam, and everything else is under review.  This air trip is to avoid the southern Pacific and the southern coast of South America, which is the only option.
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

mt: 2000+ of the world's most visited sites are now free to visit on four days of the year. Barcelona's Montjuïc, Copenhagen's Little Mermaid, Prague's Castle District, and many more are included.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "افریقا کې ښايي د سفاري چکرونه شاید تر ټولو زیات لوی سیاحت راښکونکي دي او د ډېر چکروهونکو لپاره د سفر مهمې برخې وي. په مشهور استعمال کې د سفاري اصطلاح د افریقي د زړه پورې ځنګلي ځناورو ليدلو لپاره په ځمکه سفر کولو ته اشاره کوي، په ځانګړي ډول په سوانا کې. ځنه ځناور، لکه هاتیان او زرافې، داسې طبیعت لري چې ګاډو ته نږدې راځي او معیاري الات سره يې ښه نظاره کېدلې شي. ببر شېران، یوزان او پلنګان ځنه وخت شرمګیر وي او تاسو به يې دوربین سره زیات ښه نظاره وکړئ. ګرځنده سفاري (چې په ""ځنګله کې چکر""، ""د پښو مزل سفاري""، یا ""پیاده لاره وهل"" هم بلل کیږي) کې په پښو مزل کیږي، چې د څو ساعتونو یا څو ورځو لپاره وي."
mt: "In Africa, safaris may be the most popular large-scale tourism attractions and important parts of many travelers' itineraries. In common usage, the term safari refers to a land-based trip to observe wildlife, especially in the Serengeti. Wildlife such as elephants and zebras have a nature that allows them to approach vehicles and be photographed with standard equipment. Lions, tigers, and bears are shy and you will get better shots with a camera. Mobile safaris (also called "game drives", "foot safaris", or "walking safaris") are on foot, for hours or days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: د لويو ډلو لپاره سفر ارزانه وي ، که ته یواځی او یا هم د یو ملګری سره یې ،کوښښ وکړه چې نور خلکو سره وګوری او د کس په سر د ښه قیمت لپاره د د څلورو نه تر شپږو کسانو پورې ګروپ جوړ کړي به هر صورت دي دا باید ستا لپاره د انديښنی وړ نه وي ،ځکه چې کله تورستان د موټرو د ډکولو په خاطر بدلیږی دا واقعي داسې بریښي چې خلک په دې باور کولو ته اړ کړي چې دوی باید ډیرې پیسې ورکړي.
mt: Travel is cheap for large groups, try to get others to go with you and form a group of four to six people, but it should not be worrying, because when the bus is full, it really looks like people believe they should pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: دا چې د سن فرانسیسکو اقتصاد د نړۍ د لومړۍ درجه ټوورسټ (چکر وهونکو) د توجه سره تړاو لري، اقتصاد یې متنوع دی. د کارموندنې لوی سکتور مسلکي خدمتونه، دولت، مالیه، تجارت، او سیاحت دي. د موسیقی ښه وتلی انځور ،فلم،ادب او نامتو کلتور د ښار سره په نړی کې د مشهوریدو مرسته کړيده سان فرانسسکو د تورزم لويه زیربنا په مخ بوتلی ده چې ډیر هوټلونه ،رستوراتونه او ډیر اعلی د کنوانسیون سهولتونه پکې شامل دي سان فرنسسکو د ملک دنورو ځایونو څخه تر ټولو غوره ځای دي د د اسیایې خوراکونو په لحاظ لکه کوریایې،تایلنډی، هندي او جاپانی خوراکونه
mt: Because of its economy's dependence on tourism, San Francisco is a popular destination for people from around the world. The city's famous landmarks,  such as the Golden Gate Bridge,  cable cars,  and Chinatown,  are tourist attractions. The city is also a popular film site,  and has many well-known attractions such as Alcatraz Island  (where various federal prisoners were kept),  the former prison on Angel Island,  and the cable cars,  which have been in operation since 1873.  Other popular tourist attractions include Pier 39,  the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA),  and the Japanese Tea Garden,  which is the oldest public Japanese garden in the United States.  The only building remaining from the 1915 Panama–Pacific International Exposition is the Palace of Fine Arts.  The palace was originally built to exhibit art from around the world,  and today houses the city's opera company and a chamber orchestra,  as well as a restaurant and cafe.  The de Young Museum  has had an international reputation for its far-eastern art since the late 19th and early 20th centuries,  long before Asian art became popular in the West.  The de Young is also noted for its architecture,  especially that of the Berthold Lubetkin-designed building,  completed in 1929.  The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art,  which first opened in 1945,  moved to its current building in 1995.  The Palace of Fine Arts and the de Young Museum are both part of Golden Gate Park,  which is the largest park in the city.  The park has several attractions,  including a herd of American bison,  a pair of California sea lions,  and an old Dutch windmill built in 1902.  The park also has a number of lakes,  and a few large lakes are used for boating.  The park is also home to a number of museums,  including the California Academy of Sciences,  which is the oldest scientific institution in the city.  The Academy is also home to a planetarium,  an aquarium,  and a natural history museum.  The Academy is also home to a number of research facilities,  including the Institute of Marine Biology and the Institute of Oceanography.  The Academy is also home to a number of research facilities,  including the Institute of Marine Biology and the Institute of Oceanography.  The Academy is also
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: له وړاندې ځای نیول مسافر ته ذهني آرام ورکوي چې کله خپل منزل ته ورسي نو هلته به يې د شپې ځای وي. سفري اېجنټان اکثره وخت ځانګړو هوټلونو سره هوکړې لري، که څه هم ممکنه ده چې تاسو د سفري اېجنټ په مرسته د بل ډول استوګنځای ونیسئ، لکه د کېمپ لګولو کوم ځای. سفري اېجنټان په عمومي ډول داسې پېکجونه ورکوي چې پکې ناشته، ايرپورټ نه/ته د ټرانسپورټ انتظامات یا هم د الوت او د هوټل ګډ پېکجونه. که تاسو د وړاندیز په فکر کول غواړئ یا د خپل منزل لپاره نور اسناد (لکه ویزا) ترلاسه کول غواړئ، نو دوی تاسو لپاره د رېزروېشن ثبتونه تصدیقولو پورې انتظار هم کولې شي. مخکې لدې چې هوټل ته مراجعه وشي باید ټول تعدیلات او پیشنهادات د سفرې نماینده سره شریک شي.
mt: 1. A hotel representative will greet you at the airport and take you to your hotel. If you have a reservation, you will be taken to your room. Most travel agents have special arrangements with specific hotels, but it is possible to arrange for other accommodations, such as camping. Travel agents usually provide a package that includes the airport, transportation, and hotel. If you are considering a recommendation or need to obtain additional documents (such as a visa), you may have to wait for a reservation. Before going to the hotel, all changes and recommendations should be shared with the travel agent.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: د حقیقي وخت د ژباړې لیکلې اپس - داسې یو کاریال دی چې ددې توانایي لري چې په اتوماتیک ډول له یوې ژبې بلې ته د خط ټوله برخه ژباړي. ددې برخې بعضې پروګرامونه حتي په رښتونې نړۍ کې په شیانو یا نښانونو د خارجې ژبو خطونه هم ترجمه کولای شي هغه وخت چې استعمالونکی زیرک تلیفون هغه شیانو ته مخامخ کړي. د ترجمې ماشینونه په حیرانوونکي ډول پرمختګ کړی چې اوس اکثره وخت لږ یا زیات سمې ترجمې ترسره کوي ( او ډیر کم وخت بی معنی وي)، خو یو څه احتیاط ته اړتیا شته ځکه چې کیدای شي ټول یې غلط معنی کړی وي په برخه کې تر ټولو نامتو پروګرام د ګوګل ترجمه ده چې د اړتیا وړ ژبې د داونلودولو وروسته د انترنیت په نه شتون کې هم ترجمه ترسره کوي
mt: Real-time translation - a device that has the ability to automatically translate entire text from one language to another. Some programs can even translate foreign language text into symbols or signs in the real world when the user points a cell phone at them. Translation machines have made great strides, so that most of the time they make accurate translations (and very rarely nonsense), but caution is needed because it may have translated everything wrong in the field. The most popular program is Google Translate, which can translate desired languages even when offline.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: د یخ ښوییدنه غیر نورمال حالت ندی بلکې مایله سطحې یواځې لږ څه اندازه آهسته نیولای شي او اضافي مقدار به د د ښویدلي یخ په شکل لاندې راځې مشکل دادی چې واوره سریښناکه ده نو د لاندې راتلو لپاره حرکت ورکولو ته ضرورت لري او بعضې واوره چې لاندې راشي نو د نورې واورې د راښویدو سبب هم ګرځې کله کله د لمر اصلي محرک پيښه واوري ويلې کوې، ځینې وختونه زياتي واورې، ځینې وختونه نورې طبیعي پیښې، اکثر یو انسان۔
mt: The abnormally low temperatures are not normal, but the surface of the earth can only be slowly cooled and the excess amount will be in the form of snow, which is difficult to melt, so movement is required to bring it down and sometimes snow that comes down is also the cause of melting other snow, sometimes excessive snow, sometimes other natural events, most often a human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "سالن هغه کتغ دی چې له بوټو پاڼو او مسالو سره د غوښې یا سبزیجاتو جوړ وي. یوه شوربه یا ""وچه"" یا ""لونده"" کيدې شي چې د مایع مقدار پورې اړه لري. د هند او پاکستان په دننیو شمالي سیمو کې کتغ ته ماسته اچول عام دي؛ په سوېلي هند او د نیمې لوی وچې په ځنه نورو ساحلي سیمو کې د ناریل شودې ورکې عامې استعمالیږي."
mt: "A salad is a dish consisting of pieces of food in a mixture, or with a vinaigrette. In India and Pakistan, it is common to eat salads with a mastiha (a type of gum). In southern India and other coastal areas, salads are eaten with coconut chutney."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: د جنوبي قطب لوی سرک په راس سمندرباندې د مک موردو اډې څخه تر قطب پورې یوه شپاړلس سوه کیلومتره نرۍ لار ده. دا تخته شوې واوره ده چې درزونه یې ډک او د جنډو پواسطه نښاني شوي. دا یواځې د ځانګړو تراکتورونو او د سپو او آسونو پواسطه کشکوونکو ګاړو چې تیل او نور شیان ولري، سفر کیدلای شي. په حرکت کې دا ډیر چټک ندی نو میدان ته د راتګ لپاره باید ددې لیارې طرف باید د ترانزانتارکتیک غرونو څخه یو اوږد تغیر ومومي.
mt: The South Pole Highway is a 1,160-mile (1,865 km) ice road from McMurdo Station to the South Pole. It is a snow-covered, rutted, and marked track that can only be traveled by specially equipped tractors and sleds carrying fuel and other supplies. It is not very fast, so a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains is required to reach the South Pole.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: د ټولې سیمې ښکلا د کتلو لپاره او همدارنګه هغه ځايونو ته د رسيدو لپاره چې د عادي سیاحتي لارو څخه توپير لري، د موټر په واسطه سویلي افریقا ته ننوتل یوه عجیب لاره ده. دا د هرعادي موټر په کارولو سره تر سره کېدای چې محتاط پلاننګ ولري ،مګر د 4X4 په لوړه کچه مشوره ورکول کېږی، زیات موقعیتونو ته رسیدل د 4X4 د جګی قاعدي موټر نه بغیر ممکن نه دي کله چې تصمیم نیسې په ذهن کې ولره چې سره لدې چې سویلي افریقا باثباته ده نور ټول ګاونډي هیوادونه نه دي. د ويزی لپاره اړین شيان او بیه د هر مملکت لپاره فرق کوي او دا چې تاسی د کوم هیواده راڅۍ په دي اغیزه لري هر هیواد ددې لپاره چي کوم اضطراري شیان باید په موټر کې وجود ولري ځانګړي قوانین لري
mt: 4x4s are the way to go for exploring the South African countryside. While most of the country is stable, its neighbors are not. Make sure you have the right paperwork and fees for the country you are entering, and that you have the right equipment for the country you are entering. Each country has its own set of rules for what you need to have in your car in case of an emergency.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: د نورو لپاره په وړلو کې- هیڅکله خپلې بکسې د خپل نظر څخه لیرې مه پریږدۍ په ځانګړي ډول کله چې تاسې د بین المللي پولو تیریږئ. تاسې کیدای شئ په ناخبرۍ کې د مخدراتو وړونکي واوسئ چې دا به تاسې په ډیر لوی مشکل کې واچوي په دې کې په قطار کې ودریدل هم شامل دي، د مخدراتو د بوی کولو سپیان هر وخت بغیر له محسوسیدو استعمالیدای شی بعضې هیوادونه حتی په لومړي ځل سرغړونو لپاره هم په زیاته کچه سختې سزاګانې لري چې په دې کې تر 10 کالو زندان او یا مرګ شامل دی. پاتې شوي بکسې د غلا ښکار کیدای شي او د مسؤلینو توجه هم د بمونو د خطراتو څخه د احتیاط له وجې را اړولې شي.
mt: For others - Never leave your box unattended, especially when crossing international borders. You could be arrested for possession of illegal drugs, which can include being in a car with someone who has illegal drugs. Some countries have harsh penalties for first time offenders, including up to 10 years in prison or death. Remaining boxes may be confiscated and officials may be armed with the dangers of bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

mt: While some countries do not require a visa for short-term visits for tourism or business, a student visa is required for longer stays. For many countries, you must obtain an invitation letter from the educational institution you wish to attend, and also provide proof of funds to cover the first year of tuition. You must also contact the immigration office of the country you wish to study in for specific requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: سندربنونه په نړۍ کې د ساحلې سیمې تر ټولو لویه د مانګرو ځنګلونو علاقه ده، چې تر 80 کلومیټره (50 میله) د ساحله څخه دننه خوا ته لرې د بنګلادېش او د هندوستان سیمې پورې غځېدلې. سندربنونه د یونیسکو لخوا د جهاني میراث په توګه اعلان شوي دي. د ځنګل هغه برخه چې هند کې راځي د سندربنز نېشنل پارک بلل کیږي. ځنګلونه یوازې د منګرو سمپونه ندي، پداسې حال کې — په دوی کې ځینې د ځنګلونو وروستي پاتې دریځونه شامل دي کوم چې یوځل د ګنګای ساحه پوښلې وه. سندربنونه د 3،850 مربع کلومیټر علاقه پوښلې، چې له دې دریمه برخه يې په اوبو/ډبونو کې پټه ده. 1966 راهیسې سندربنونه د وحشي ژوند لپاره خوندي ځای بلل شوی، او اټکل کیږي چې اوس په سیمه کې 400 شاهي بنګالي پړانګان او خواوشا 30،000 خالدارې هوسۍ دي.
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest single block of tidal halophytic mangrove forest in the world. It is located in the delta of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna rivers on the Bay of Bengal and spreads across a highly undulating and marshy terrain of 10,000 square kilometres (3,900 sq mi), of which forests cover 6,000 square kilometres (2,300 sq mi). It spans the area between Khulna and Barisal Divisions of Bangladesh and Satkhira and Bagerhat Districts of Bangladesh and 24 Parganas and Sundarbans districts of West Bengal, India. The forest is unique for its mangrove vegetation and is a habitat for many endangered species, including the Bengal tiger, saltwater crocodile and Indian python. The Sundarbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

mt: The Sundarbans is the largest single block of tidal halophytic mangrove forest in the world. It is located in the delta of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna rivers on the Bay of Bengal and spreads across a highly undulating and marshy terrain of 10,000 square kilometres (3,900 sq mi), of which forests cover 6,000 square kilometres (2,300 sq mi). It spans the area between Khulna and Barisal Divisions of Bangladesh and Satkhira and Bagerhat Districts of Bangladesh and 24 Parganas and Sundarbans districts of West Bengal, India. The forest is unique for its mangrove vegetation and is a habitat for many endangered species, including the Bengal tiger, saltwater crocodile and Indian python. The Sundarbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: نړۍ له ۵،۰۰۰ څخه زیاتې بیلا بیلي ژبې لري، چې پکې د شل څخه زیات د ۵۰ ملیونه یا ډیرو ویوونکو سره شامل دي. لیکلی شوي کلمی اکثره وخت د ويل شوي کلمو څخه په پوهیدلو کې هم اسانه وي . په ځانګړی ډول دا خبره د ادرسونو په باره کې صدق کوي کوم چې اکثره وخت په ښه ډول نه تلفظ کېږی ډیر هیوادونه په بشپړ ډول په انګلیسي کې روان دي، او حتی په ډیرو کې تاسي د محدود پوهه تمه کولی شئ - د ځوانانو ترمنيځ په ځانګړي توګه باندي. تصور وکړئ، که چیرې تاسو یو مانکونیان، بوسټونیان، جمیکان او سیډنیسیډر یاست په ټورنټو کې په یوه رستورانت کې د ماښام ډوډۍ خوړلو میز ته ناست وی. هغوي یو بل پسی د خپل اصلی ښارونو سلسله واری قصی کوي ، په خپلو بیلا بیلو لهجو او محلي ژبو باندي
mt: There are over 5,000 languages in the world, with over half of them having more than 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true of adverbs, which are often mispronounced. Many countries are almost entirely in English, and even in many others you can get by with limited knowledge - especially among the young. Imagine, if you were a Manchurian, Bostonian, Jamaican, and Sydneyan, sitting at a dinner table in Toronto. They would be talking about their respective cities in their various dialects and local languages.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: بسونه د ولسوالۍ دننه د ورځې په اوږدو کې د بس د اډې څخه ووځي (د سیند پر غاړه) په ځانګړي ډول دیری هاغه چې د 06:30 او 07:30 ترمنځ ختیځ لورې او Jakar/Bumthang ته ځي. ځکه چې د اولسوالیو تر منځه چلېدونکي بسونه ډېری وخت ډک وي، نو ښه سلا ده چې ټکټونه څو ورځې وړاندې واخستل شي. اکثره اولسوالیو کې واړه جاپاني کوسټر بسونه، چې ارام بخښونکي او محکم وي، خدمت وړاندې کوي. شریکې ټکسیانې د بیلګې په ډول پارو (Nu 150) او پوناخو (Nu 200) د نږدې ځایونو د سفر لپاره تیزې او آرامه ټکسیانې دي.
mt: Buses leave the town during the day from the bus station (on the river side) eastward to Jakar/Bumthang between 6:30 and 7:30 am. As buses between villages are often full, it is advisable to book tickets a few days in advance. Most villages offer Japanese coster buses, which are comfortable and air-conditioned. Shared taxis, for example Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200), are fast and comfortable for nearby destinations.
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "سره له دې چې په پرتله ییزه توګه ناقابل رسون دی، ""ټمبکټو"" د عجیبه او لرې پرتو وطنونو لپاره یو تشبیه په توګه کارول شوی. نن ټمبکټو یوه غریبه ښاریه ده، که څه هم خپل شهرت له وجې سېلګران راښکي، او دا یو اېیرپورټ لري. په 1990 کې دا په نړۍ کې خطر کې پرتو د عالمي ورثې ځایونو په لسټ کې د صحرايي شګې څخه د خطر له وجې واچول شو. دا د هنري لویس ګیتس په وخت کې تر ټولو مهم تمځای ود افریقایي نړئ PBS ځانګړیې عجوبه وه. دا ښار د هېواد نورو ښارونو سره ډېر ښکار بېلوالی لري، ځکه چې دا د افریقايي په پرتله عربي خوند زیات لري."
mt: "Tombuctu" is a remote place, though it is a well-known city, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was listed as one of the most dangerous places in the world due to the risk of the Sahara sandstorm. It was the most important place in the world in the time of Henry Louis Gates, Jr. It is more Arabic than African.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: د پارالمپیک بازۍ به له 24 اګست څخه تر 5 ستمبر 2021 پورې ترسره کیږي. ځنه مسابقې به د ټول جاپان په نورو ځایونو کې کیږي. ټوکیو به یواځینۍ آسیايي ښار جوړ شي چې د اوړي اولمپکس کوربتوب يې دوه ځله کړی دی، دا چې وړاندې داسې په 1964 کې کړي وو. که تاسو د 2020 لپاره خپلې الوتنې او استوګنځای د معطلۍ د اعلان څخه وړاندې ثبت کړي وو، تاسو ښايي په یوه حالت ښوی حالت ګېر یاست. د کېنسل کولو پالیسۍ تغیر خوري، خو د مارچ وروستیو راهیسې د کورونا وایرس په بنسټ د کېنسلونې پالیسۍ جولای 2020 پورې نه غځیږي، هغه وخت چې کوم لپاره اولمپک بازۍ مهالوېش شوې وې. تمه کیږي چې د پیښې ډیری ټیکټونه به د ۲،۵۰۰ څخه تر ¥ ۱۳۰،۰۰۰ ين پورې وي، د معمول ټیکټونو شاوخوا ۷،۰۰۰ لګښت لري۔
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. The games will be held in other parts of Japan, with Tokyo being the only Asian city to host the Summer Olympics twice, having previously done so in 1964. If you have already booked your flights and accommodation before the announcement of the postponement, you may be entitled to a refund. Immigration policies change, but the immigration policy for the coronavirus is not expected to change until July 2020, when the postponed Olympics were originally scheduled to take place. It is expected that most tickets will cost between ¥ 2,500 and ¥ 130,000, around the price of a regular ticket.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: بوړبوړکۍ د هوا د ټیټ فشار تاویدونکې برخه ده چې خپل دشاوخوا هوا داخل او پورته کش کوي هغوی ډیر پورته بادونه تولیدوي( بعضی وخت له سلو تر دوه سوو میله فی ساعت) او چې څنګه بوړبوړکۍ حرکت کوي کولای شي درانده شیان په هوا کې پورته کړي هغوۍ لومړی د قیف په شکل چې له طوفاني وریځو لاندې راکوزیږي او کله چې د ځمکې سره ولګیږي نو د بوړبوړکۍ ترې جوړه شي
mt: The spinning blades of a tornado are the result of the low pressure area that sucks in and lifts surrounding air, creating high winds (sometimes over 200 mph) as the tornado moves. They first form in the shape of a funnel, which is sucked into a tornado, and when they hit the ground, they form the tornado.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
