src: که هغه هېواد چې تاسو چکر وروهئ په اړه سفري تنبیهي سلاوو ورکړل شي، نو کېدې شي سفر کې د ستاسو صحي بیمه یا د ستاسو د دورې د کېنسل کېدا بیمه اغېزمنه شي. تاسو کېدې شي وغواړئ چې د خپل پرته د بل دولت سلا مشوره واخلئ خو د هغوی سلامشوره د خپلو شهریانو لپاره ده. د یوه مثال په توګه، په منځني ختیځ کې کېدې شي امریکايي تبعه اروپایانو یا عربانو څخه زیات بل ډول حالاتو سره مخ شي. مشاوریتونه د هیواد د سیاسی وضعیت یو ډیره دقیقه خلاصه ده. وړاندې شوي نظریات اکثرا د نورو تفصیلاتو معلوماتو په پرتله ډیر سرسري، عمومي او ډیر سپک شوي دي.
mt: If you are traveling to a country that has issued a travel advisory, your health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may want to consult with the embassy of the country you are visiting, but their advice is for their citizens. For example, Americans in the Middle East may be more likely to encounter certain situations than Europeans or Arabs. Advisory reports are often a very brief summary of the political situation. Preceding reports are often more general, more vague, and more optimistic than the details.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: که هغه هېواد چې تاسو چکر وروهئ په اړه سفري تنبیهي سلاوو ورکړل شي، نو کېدې شي سفر کې د ستاسو صحي بیمه یا د ستاسو د دورې د کېنسل کېدا بیمه اغېزمنه شي. تاسو کېدې شي وغواړئ چې د خپل پرته د بل دولت سلا مشوره واخلئ خو د هغوی سلامشوره د خپلو شهریانو لپاره ده. د یوه مثال په توګه، په منځني ختیځ کې کېدې شي امریکايي تبعه اروپایانو یا عربانو څخه زیات بل ډول حالاتو سره مخ شي. مشاوریتونه د هیواد د سیاسی وضعیت یو ډیره دقیقه خلاصه ده. وړاندې شوي نظریات اکثرا د نورو تفصیلاتو معلوماتو په پرتله ډیر سرسري، عمومي او ډیر سپک شوي دي.
mt: If you are traveling to a country that has issued a travel advisory, your health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. src: سیاحتی شرکتونه د نورلسمې پیړۍ نه موجود دي ، د سفر لپاره د سفر نماینده یو ښه انتخاب دي د هغه سفر لپاره چې د سفر کوونکې د تیری تجربی څخه تجاوز کوي د طبیعت کلتور ژبی او د کم عاید هیواودونو که څه هم اکثره ایجنسیانی په دي راضی وي چې عادي بوکنګ وکړي یو څه استازي داسې وي چې په یو ځانګړی سفر کې تخصص کوي د بودجې اندازه یا هم د ځای غوره به دا وي چی یو اجنټ وکاروئ څوک چی اکثراً تاسي لپاره داسی شان سفرونه ترتیبوي- وګوره چې کوم یو سفر ته ایجنټ وده ورکوي هغه که په ويب سايټ وي او که د دوکان به کړکي کې
mt: 11th century travel companies are not available, a good choice for travel representatives a good experience of travel, nature, culture, language and low-income countries, although most agencies are happy to do ordinary booking, but the agent is such that specializes in a particular trip, budget size or location, or the agent will work, who usually arrange such trips for you - see what agent is working on a trip, whether it is on the web site and whether the store is on the street
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "دلته ډیر شیان دي چې تاسي یې باید مخکې په پام کې ونیسئ او کله چې تاسي چیرې سفر کوئ. کله چې تاسو سفر کوئ، تمه وکړئ شیان داسې نه وي لکه دوی ""بیرته کور"" وي. آداب، قانون، خواړه، ترافیک، موقتى استوګنځى، معیارونه، ژبه او داسې نور به د یو څه حد پورې به ستاسو د اوسیدو ځای څخه توپیر ولرئ. دا داسې یو څه دي چې ته یې باید همیشه په فکر کې وساتي، چې د خواشينۍ څخه ځان وژغوری او شاید په محل لارو باندي ډسټیت چې کارونه وکړي"
mt: "There are so many things you need to be aware of when you travel. When you travel, expect things to be different than they are at home. Manners, laws, food, traffic, temporary housing, standards, language, and so on will be different to some degree from your home. These are things you should always be aware of, to avoid getting upset and maybe even getting lost on the way."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: که پرمخ تلونکي هیواد ته د لومړي ځل لپاره ځې یا د نړئ نوې برخې ته، نو د بالقوې دود او رواج حیرانتیا د نظره ونه غورځوې. ډیر شمیر ثابت او وړ سفرکوونکي د پرمختلونکې نړئ د سفر د نوي والي څخه په بریالیتوب تیریږي چیرته چې زیات شمیر واړه د دود او رواج بدلونونو سره د ځان سمول په تیزئ سره اضافه کیږي. په ځانګړي ډول په خپلو لومړیو ورځو کې په مغربي طرز او با کیفیته هوټلونو، خوړو او چوپړتیاوو باندې پیسې مصرفول په نظر کې ونیسه چې د یو ځای یا شیانو سره د ځان په سمولو او عیارولو کې مرسته کوي. په هغه ځایونو کې چې ځایي حیوانات یې نه پیژنې په ځمکه په توشک مه څملئ. که تاسو باهر خيمه لګولو ته راوان ياست، نو ځان سره د خيمي کاټ او ځوړنده بستره مارانو او لړامانو څخه خوندي پاتي کيدو لپاره يوسئ۔
mt: If you're traveling to a new country or a new part of the world for the first time, don't be surprised by the unfamiliar customs and traditions. Many experienced travelers successfully navigate the changes in customs and traditions as they travel to new places. In particular, in your first few days, you may be tempted to spend money on Western-style hotels, food, and entertainment. Consider that spending money on one thing or another helps you to get used to the place. In places where you don't know the local animals, don't step on the ground. If you're camping, bring a tent and mosquito net to keep yourself safe from mosquitoes and ticks.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "د خپلې پالیسۍ او د خپلې بیمه کونکي معاهدې د توضیحاتو نقلونه جوړ کړئ او له ځان سره يې ولرئ. دوي ته په کار دي چې د بیمی والا د برښنالیک ادرس او نړیوالی تلیفونی شمیری د مشوری/اجازی او د دعوي لپاره وښایې په خپل سامان او آن لاین کې بله کاپي ولرئ (ځان ته ضمیمي سره بريښنا ليک وکړئ ، یا یې په ""کلاؤډ"" کې ذخیره کړئ). که تاسی چیرته د لیپ ټاپ یا هم د ټابلیټ سره سفر کوی . دحافظی یوه کاپی یی جوړه کړی ( تر څو وکولای شی چی د انتر نت څخه بغیر هم ورته لاسرسی ولرئ ) د سفر ملګرو او خپلوانو یا ملګرو ته د پالیسۍ / تماس نقلونه هم ورکړئ چې بيرته په کور کې مرسته کول غواړي."
mt: 1. Make copies of your policy and your insurance company's contact information and keep it with you. They will be glad to provide you with a copy of your policy and a claim form (save it to your "cloud" or print it out). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, make a copy of your policy (so you can access it without the internet). Give copies of your policy and contact information to friends and family who can help you at home.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: د فلم ډیری نوعی شته دي چې د کلونو راهیسی تری کار اخستل کېږی،معیاری 35 ملی متره فلم (36/24ملی متره نیګټیو) تر ټولو ډی عام دي په عادي ډول دا کېدای چې په مناسبه توګه په اسانۍ سره بیا جوړ شي که چېرته تا سره ختم شي. او DSLR سره په تناسب کې نږدې ریزلوشن ورکوي ځینې منځنۍ بڼي فلم کیمرې د ۶ لخوا ۶ سانتي متره بڼه کاروي، په دقیق ډول د ۵۶ لخوا ۵۶ ملي متره منفي. دا د ۳۵ ملي مترو په پرتله نږدې څلور ځله تحلیل وړاندې کوي (د ۳۱۳۶ ملي متر۲ په مقابل کې ۸۶۴).
mt: 35mm film has been in use for decades, the most common is the standard 35mm (36/24mm negative) which can be easily reprocessed if you run out. In comparison to DSLR it gives nearly the same resolution. Some mid-range film cameras use a 6x6cm format, specifically 56x56mm negative. This gives nearly four times the resolution of 35mm (3136mm2 vs 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: د سفر په اړه د لیکنې کاروبار د شروع کولو لپاره آسانه لار داده چې په یو مشهور د سفر اړوند ویبپاڼه باندې خپل مهارتونو ته وده ورکړې کله چې په انترنیت کې د سمونې او بڼې جوړونې سره راحته شوې نو وروسته بیا کولای شې چې خپله ویبپاڼه جوړه کړې
mt: To start a travel writing business, it is easy to improve your skills on a popular travel website when you are comfortable with editing and formatting on the Internet, and then you can create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: په کور کې، ځایي مکروبونو ته د ثابت مخامخیدو له وجې، ددې امکان ډیر زیات دی چې تاسې له هغوی څخه معافیت پیدا کړی. خو د نړئ په نورو برخو کې چیرته چې بکتریالوژیکي ژویي تاسي ته نوی دي، تاسې مشکلاتو سره لاس او ګریوان کیدای شي. همدارنګه، په ګرمسیرو اقلیمونو کې بکتریاګانې د بدن څخه بیرون دواړه په تیزۍ سره وده کوي او د ډیر وخت لپاره بقا مومي. نو د ډلي بیلي، د فرعون د لعنت، مونتیزوما د انتقام او د هغې زیات شمیر ملګرو، مشکلات زیږونکي. همدارنګه په یخ موسم کې تنفسي ستونزې او په ګرم موسم کې بیا د کولمو ستونزې بیخې عامي دي او په ډيرو حالاتو کې ځورونکي دي اما په حقیقت کې خطرناکې نه دي.
mt: In your home, you are likely to be immune to the local microbes. But in other parts of the world, where you are a stranger to bacteria, you may have problems. In addition, in hot climates, bacteria grow quickly outside the body and survive for a long time. So, the likes of the plague, the curse of the pharaoh, Montezuma's revenge, and their many friends, are problems for the newborn. In addition, respiratory problems in cold climates and again gastrointestinal problems in hot climates are common and in many cases debilitating but not dangerous in fact.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: اروپا یوه لویه وچه ده چې تقابلي ډول واړه خو ډېر شمېر ازاد هېوادونه لري. په عامه توګه ګڼ شمېر هېوادونو باندې راتېر سفر کولو لپاره تاسو اړ یاست چې د وېزو لپاره خواستونو او د پاسپورټ معاېنه کوونکو ځایونو کې څو ځله ایسار شئ. د شینګین زون خلک، په هر صورت د یو هیواد په څېر کار کوي. تر څو چې دغه زون کې اوسېږئ، تاسو عموما د پاسپورټ د کنټرول لپاره د معاینې پوستو باندې بیا راتېرېدو پرته په پولو اوړېدلای شئ. دغه شان، د شنګن ویزه لرلو په برکت، تاسو نه اړ کېږئ چې د شنګن هر یوه غړي هېواد ته د ویزا خواست ورکړئ، نو دغه د وخت، پیسو، او د کاغذي کاروايئ څخه بچ کېږئ.
mt: Europe is a large continent with many independent countries. In general, you will need to fill out customs forms and have your passport checked at several points when traveling to other countries. People in the Schengen zone, however, act as if they were in one country. As long as you are in the Schengen zone, you can usually pass through without stopping at passport control points. This, thanks to the Schengen visa, you do not need to request a visa for each Schengen member state, so you save time, money, and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: بوين ټاپو bowen island د یوې ورځی مشهور سفر دي یا هم د یوې اوونی د خوند سفر دي چې د کایاکنګ ،پیاده تګ ،دوکانونه،رستورانتونه او نور ډیر څه لري دا مستنده ټولنه په هووي ساوڼد کې موقعیت لري د وينکوور څخه لږ اخواته ،او په اسانی سره ورته د اوبو ډتاکل شوي تیکسیس له لارې ورته رسیدل کېدلای شي چې د ینکوور کې د ښار د لاندېني برخه کې د ګرینويل ټاپو څخه راوځی د هغوي لپاره چې بیرونی فعالیتونوڅخه ګټه اخلی د تګ را تګ لپاره ورته د سمندر څخه د اسمان ته کاریدور حتمی دي ويسلر ( د وينکوور څخه 1.5 ساعته د موټر سفر) یو ګران بیه مګر د 2010 کال د ژمی د اولمپګ به سبب مشهور دي په ژمی کې د شمالی امریکا د سکې لوبې څخه خوند واخلۍ ، او په دوبی کې صحیح غره ایزی سایکل چلولو امتحان کړي
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway that has kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and more. It is located in Howe Sound, a little west of Vancouver, and is easily accessible by water taxi from Horseshoe Bay, which is a part of the city of West Vancouver. For those who enjoy the outdoors, the ferry is a must for getting to and from the island, as the drive from Vancouver is 1.5 hours by car. It is a pricey trip, but is expected to be popular during the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver, as it is a great place to watch the Northern American ski events, and to do a proper mountain biking test run.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: وکتوریا فال ` د زمبابوي په مشرقی برخه کې یو ښارګوټی دي د لیوېنګ سټون د سرحد نه هغې غاړی ته ، زمبیا او بټسوانا ته نزدي مرکز ښار سمدلاسه رازې او ډير لوې پام لرې، مګر دا مشهور سیاحت ځای دواړه د سفر ساتونکي او لیدونکي د اوږدې مودې لپاره کافی فرصتونه وړاندې کوي۔ په بارانی موسم کې (نومبرنه مارچ پورې)، د اوبوسطحه اندازه ډیره وي او ابشار به نور هم ډراماتیک وي که چېرته تاسی د پل څخه تیر شي او یا هم د ابشار سره نږدې د لارې په اوږدو قدم ووهۍ دا حتمی ده چې تاسی به لامده شۍ له بله پلوه دا په دقت سره د اوبو د ډیری اندازی په سبب اصلی ابشار پټیږي، چې تاسی به یې و نه شي لیدلی، د ټولو اوبوسره
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in eastern Zimbabwe, near the Victoria Falls, one of the largest waterfalls in the world. The town is connected by road with the tourist-heavy city of Bulawayo (about 407 kilometres (253 mi) away) and with Livingstone, Zambia, the town near the falls on the Zambian side. The city is a tourist hub, with a number of lodges and hotels, and is a popular stop for visitors to the falls. The city is also a centre for the surrounding area's agricultural and commercial activity. The city is served by Victoria Falls Airport, with flights to Bulawayo, Harare, Johannesburg, and Livingstone. The city is named after Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom, and is locally referred to as "Vic Falls". The Victoria Falls Bridge, built in 1905, crosses the river between Zimbabwe and Zambia. ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: د عادي عکاسۍ لپاره قوانین د فلمبردارۍ ثبت لپاره هم تطبقیږي د امکان په صورت کې تر ډیره حده که چیرې د یو شي د عکس اخیستل اجازه نلري نو د هغه د فلمبردارۍ د ثبت کولو په اړه باید هیڅ فکر ونکړې که چیرې ډرون طیاره استعمالوې نو مخکې له مخکې پلټنه وکړه چې د څه شي د فلمبردارۍ اجازه لرې او کوم ډول اجازتنامو او جواز ته اړتیا شته د ډرون طیارې الوزول د هوایي میدان او یا د خلکو د ګڼې ګوڼې په نژدې ځایونو کې هر وخت یوه بد نظر دی که څه هم ستاسې په ځاې کې غیر قانوني نه وي
mt: Laws for still photography apply to filming as well, if possible, if you are not allowed to take a picture of something, don't think about filming it, if you are using a drone, check beforehand if you are allowed to film and what kind of permits or licenses are required, flying a drone over an airport or a crowded area is always a bad idea, even if it is legal in your country.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: نوملیکنه د ويزی د پروسی یو اضافی غوښتنه ده ، په ځینی هیوادونو کې تاسی باید خپله حاضری او د استګنی ځّای ادرس د محلي چارواکو سره ثبت کړي دا ممکن د ځایي پولیسو سره د یوې فورمې ډکولو او یا د مهاجرت د دفترونو ته ورتګ ته اړتیا ولري. په ډیرو ملکونو کې چې دا سی قانون لري، ځایې هوټلونه راجستریشن سمبالوي (یقینی کوي چې پوښتنه وکړي) په نورو معاملو کې یواځی هغوي چې د تورستی هستوګن ځایونو نه بیرون اوسیږی اړ دي چې راجستریشن وکړي ، خو دا کار قانون نو هم مبهم کوي نو ځان پری د مخکې نه پوهه کړه
mt: A visa application is an additional requirement, in some countries you must register your presence and address with local authorities, which may require a form to be filled out with local police or immigration offices. In many countries where this is the law, hotels register guests (make sure they ask you) in other cases only those who are not staying in registered accommodations are required to register, but this is also ambiguous so don't assume you know
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: د سفر پرمهال داوطلبي د بدلون راوستلو لپاره يوه غوره لاره ده مګر دا یوازې ورکول نه دي. په بهرني هیواد کې اوسیدل او په داوطلبۍ سره کار کول د نوي دود او رواج سره د آشنا کیدلو، نویو خلکو سره لیدلو، د خپل ځان په اړه پوهیدلو، د فکر کولو په اړه حس او حتی د نویو هنرونو زده کولو لپاره ښه لاره ده دا به ډیره ښه لار وي چې بودیجه پراخه شي او چیرې اوسیدل زیات شي ځکه چې ډیر دواطلبه دندې زمینه برابروي او ځینو ته ممکن ترې لږ معاش هم ورکړل شي.
mt: Traveling abroad is a great way to learn about new customs and traditions, meet new people, learn about yourself, think about things, and even learn new skills. It's a great way to broaden your horizons and increase your budget, as many volunteer jobs provide opportunities for little pay and lots of experience.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "د والټ ډزنی نړی ته تګ د ډیرو امریکایې فامیلونو لپاره د لوي مقدسی غونډی حیثیت لري یو عادي سفر د اولانډو نړیوال هوایي ډکرته الوتنی.ډ ډزنی ځایې هوټل ته په بس کې ، نږدې یوه اوونی د ډزنی په ځمکه بغیر ددې چې بل چېرته ولاړ شي ، اوکور ته بیرته راستنیدل شامل دي د لامحدودو تغیراتو شتون امکان لري، مګر دا هغه څه پاتې دي چې ډیر خلک یې دا مطلب وړاندې کوي کله چې دوی د ""ډیزني نړۍ ته د تللو"" په اړه خبرې کوي. د نیلامي ویب پاڼو له لارې آنلاین ډیر ټیکټونه پلورل شوي لکه eBay یا Craigslist په جزوي توګه کارول شوي د څو ورځو پارک - هپر ټیکټونه دی. که څه هم دا یو عادي کړنه ده ، خو بیا هم د Disney د لورې ممنوع ده : ټکټونه د انتقال قابل ندي."
mt: "For many American families, a trip to Walt Disney World is a once-in-a-lifetime pilgrimage to a holy land. A typical journey includes a bus ride to the Orlando International Airport, a flight to Orlando, a bus ride to the Disney hotel, a day at the Disney park, and a bus ride back to the airport. The trip can be expensive, but it's the kind of thing people talk about when they talk about "going to Disney World." Online ticket sellers like eBay or Craigslist have been used to sell tickets, sometimes for a few days' parking. While this is a common practice, it's not allowed by Disney: Tickets are not transferable."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: "هر څوک چې داسې هېواد ته تلو پلان جوړوي چې جنګځپلې سیمه بلل کېدای شي باید د مسلکي روزنې په ترلاسي فکر وکړي. د انترنیت د څیړنې "" چاپیریال ضدکورس"" ممکن د یو محلي شرکت ادرس ورکړي. یو کورس به په نورماله توګه دلته بحث شوې ټولې ستونزې په خورا زیات تفصیل، عموماً سره د عملي روزنې، سره وپوښي. یو کورس به عموماً 2-5 ورځې اخلي چې نقشي بازۍ، ډېر زیات لومړني کمکونه او ځنه موقعو کې د وسلو روزنه به يې برخه وي. کتابونه او مجلې چې د دښته بقا سره معامله کوي عام دي، مګر د جنګ زونونو په اړه خپرونې لږ دي۔"
mt: "Anyone planning to go to a country that is considered a war zone should consider taking a professional training course. The Environmental Studies course may provide the address of a local company. A course will discuss all the issues discussed here in great detail, usually with practical training, with the help of maps, a lot of initial assistance and self-defense training. Books and magazines that deal with survival in the wilderness are common, but there are few publications about war zones."
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: د اوبو د پاکولو مختلفې طریقې دي، چې ځنه د ځانګړو خطرونو په زیاتې اغېزمنې دي. په ځنه سیمو کې اوبه یو منټ لپاره خوټول پوره وي، په نورو کې څو منټه غواړي. د فلټرونو اغېزمنتیا تغیر لري، او مبادا که اندېښنه لرئ، نو خپلې اوبه د یوې نومیالي شرکت سره په مهرشویو بوتلو کې په اخستلو غور وکړئ.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some of which are more effective against certain hazards. In some areas, water can be purified in one minute, in others it takes several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies, and if you are unsure, have your water tested by a certified laboratory.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: په ساحل راختونکې څپې هغه راستنېدونکې څپې وي چې د ساحل په څنډه کومې سمندري اوټکي یا ورته څیز سره ټکړ خوري. اوبو لاندې جغرافیايي وضعیت له امله ستون بهاند په څو زیاتو ژورو برخو ته ورټول وي، او ښايي ژورو اوبو ته چټکه څپه ښايي له هغه ځایه جوړه شي. ډير مرګونه د ستړیا په پایله کې پیښیږي کله چې دوی د څپې په وړاندې د بیرته لامبو وهلو هڅه کوي، چې دا يوه ناممکنه خبره کيدې شي. هرڅومره ژر چې تاسي د اوسني حالت څخه وځئ، بیرته لامبو وهل د نورمال څخه ډیر مشکل ندي. داسې ځای هدف وګرځوه چېرې چې تاسو بیا ګېر نه شئ یا، خو دې ته په کتو چې ستاسو هنرونه څومره ښه دي او ایا تاسو چا ته په نظر راغلي یاست یا نه، کولای شئ ژغورل کېدا پورې انتظار وباسئ.
mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that moves away from the beach, parallel to the shore. The rip current is a result of the complex interaction of waves, wind, and the shape of the beach and bottom. Rip currents can be very dangerous to swimmers, as they can quickly carry them away from shore. Most drownings in rip currents are due to panic and exhaustion from trying to swim against the current. The sooner you get out of the rip current, the easier it will be. The best way to avoid rip currents is to stay out of the water. If you do go in, stay close to shore and don't go out too far. If you do get caught in a rip current, don't panic. Swim parallel to shore until you are out of the current, then head toward shore. If you can't swim, float or tread water until you are out of the current, then yell or wave for help.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that moves away from the beach, parallel to the shore. The rip current is a result of the complex interaction of waves, wind, and the shape of the beach and bottom. Rip currents can be very dangerous to swimmers, as they can quickly carry them away from shore. Most drownings in rip currents are due to panic and exhaustion from trying to swim against the current. The sooner you get out of the rip current, the easier it will be. The best way to avoid rip currents is to stay out of the water. If you do go in, stay close to shore and don't go out too far. If you do get caught in a rip current, don't panic. Swim parallel to shore until you are out of the current, then head toward shore. If you can't swim, float or tread water until you are out of the current, then yell or wave for help.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

mt: Wildlife photography is one of the most challenging forms of photography, and requires patience, luck, and good equipment. Wildlife photography is not as popular as portrait photography, but a picture of a wild animal is worth a thousand words of a wild animal. Wildlife photography often requires telephoto lenses, but for bird photography or small animals, other lenses are more appropriate. Finding wildlife is difficult, and some parks have laws against taking pictures for commercial purposes. Wildlife can be shy and aggressive, the environment can be cold, and the habitat can be hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. mt: If you are not a diplomat, then working abroad means that the tax structure in the country you live in is different from the tax structure in your home country, and tax rates and amounts vary widely from one country to another. In some central countries such as the United States and Canada, tax is exempt at the central and local level. The rates and amounts vary between one region and another.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

These shows typically last for six months and can be held in large cities or specifically built fairgrounds, mainly in order to demonstrate the latest in technology in a particular field, though they are commonly of a general nature that is often centred on education, culture and modern industries. ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: د نړۍ میله ( په عام ډول د نړۍ ښکارندوي ،او یا ساده نمایش ) د هنر او ساینس یو لوي بین المللی فیستیوال دي برخه اخیستونکي هیوادونه په ملي پویلینونو کې هنري او تعلیمي نندارې وړاندې کوي چې د نړۍ مسلي یا د خپل هیواد کلتور او تاریخ وښيي. د میوو او نباتاتو د کرلو نړیوال نمایش یو ځانګړی کړي شوي پروګرام دي چې د ګلانو ښودنه، بوتانیک باغونه ،او هر هغه څه چې د نباتاتو پورې تړلی وي پکې شامل وي که څه هم په تیوري کې هر کال دوی کولی شي (تر هغه چې دوی په بیلا بیلو هیوادونو کې وي) چې دوی پکې ندي تمرین ترسره کړي. دغه ډول پیښې په عادي ډول هر چیرې د درېو تر شپږو میاشتو پورې تر منځ وخت نیسي، او د 50 هکتاره څخه کوچنی ځای کې ترسره کېږي.
mt: The World's Fair (commonly known as the World's Fair, or Exposition, or Expos) is a large international exhibition designed as an experiential contrast to an ordinary national fair. These shows typically last for six months and can be held in large cities or specifically built fairgrounds, mainly in order to demonstrate the latest in technology in a particular field, though they are commonly of a general nature that is often centred on education, culture and modern industries. The displays at fairs are often run by non-profit organisations. The World's Fair is a major attraction for tourists, and is often accompanied by a large number of other events, such as international sporting events, or religious festivals. ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: که څه پارک کې اکثره ځناور انسانان لیدلو سره اموخته دي، خو بیا هم وحشي ژوند بیا هم وحشي وي او باید خواړه ورنکړای شي یا نه ناارامه کړای شي. د پارک چارواکو په وینا، لږترلږه ۱۰۰ ګزه/میټره د یږ، او لیوه څخه او 25 ګزه/متره د نورو وحشي ځناورو څخه لرې اوسئ! مهمه نده چې دوی څومره باحوصله وګوري، بایسن، الک، هوسۍ، یږان او نږدې ټول لوی څاروي برید کولی شي. هر کال لسګونه خلک مناسبه فاصله نه ساتلو له امله ټپي کیږي. دا ځناور غټ، وحشي، او ممکناً خطرناک دي، نو خپل ځای کې یه ځان ته پرېږدئ. سره له دې، خبر ووسئ چې بویونه میلوګان او نور ځنګلي ژوي راښکي، نو بوی لرونکي خواړه ګرځولو یا پخولو څخه ډډ وکړئ او کېمپ پاک وساتئ.

ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
